This distillery is building upon the region's storied past, aiming to add to the town's reputation as a destination worthy of road trips and weekend visits. Housed in a renovated 40,000 square foot historical facility that once served as a carriage manufacturer, the Augusta Distillery will soon be home to a host of top-shelf bourbon-centric events and activities. The distillery produces a limited-release Kentucky straight bourbon whiskey called Buckner's, a 13-year single barrel expression that captures the spirit of adventure and benevolence of Augusta's revered founder and statesman. With its exceptional balance and complexity, warm golden color, haunting nose, and unforgettable finish, the Augusta Distillery's Buckner's bourbon positions the facility as a premier destination on the Kentucky Bourbon Trail, leveraging the town's scenic location and rich history to offer a unique bourbon-focused experience.
baxus_class_name: Augusta 8 Year Single Barrel #39 Old Route 8 For Justin's House Of Bourbon

name: Karuizawa 1990 Single Cask #679 Geisha Label Bottled 2012
description: A 1990 vintage single cask expression of the closed Japanese distillery Karuizawa. Matured in a 1st fill sherry cask it was bottled at 56.1% Abv in 2012 by Number One Drinks featuring a beautiful Geisha label.
baxus_class_name: Karuizawa 1990 Single Cask #679 Geisha Label Bottled 2012

name: Ardbeg 1978 Bottled 1998
description: An old school vintage Ardbeg distilled in 1978 and bottled in 1998. This era of Ardbeg hails from a period when the spirit was primarily sold to blenders, so vintages from before the 1990s are relatively few and far between. This 1998 bottling comes not long after LVMH purchased and revived the distillery.

name: Pappy Van Winkle 23 Year Family Reserve 2019 Bottling
description: A 2019 bottling of Papy Van Winkle 23 year old bourbon crafted from a historic wheated recipe now distilled by Buffalo Trace. Each release of Pappy is hand selected by Julian Van Winkle, the grandson of the original Pappy. Although originally produced using barrels from the closed Stitzel-Weller distillery, since 2002 Julian has had an agreement with Buffalo Trace to use their stocks once his stored barrels ran dry.
baxus_class_name: Pappy Van Winkle 23 Year Family Reserve 2019 Bottling

name: Arran Cask Strength 12 year - 2012
description: Plum jam, now noticeable tingling on the tongue, becomes tart and sour, good oak flavor develops. In addition, a nice sweetness, water also helps and provides a creamy impression.

name: Hanyu 1991 Cask #401 Card Series 9 Of Clubs
description: A 1991 vintage expression of Hanyu, the closed Japanese distillery. First matured in a hogshead it was recasked into a bourbon barrel and bottled in 2011 at 57.3% Abv with just 238 bottles produced. This cask is the 9 of clubs in the Ichiro's Card Series, a selection of legendary bottlings featuring the remaining casks of spirit from the lost Hanyu distillery.
baxus_class_name: Hanyu 1991 Cask #401 Card Series 9 Of Clubs

name: Barrell 15 Year Grey Label Bourbon
description: A premium label offering from Barrell Craft Spirits, this 15 year old bourbon is a part of their gray label offerings. This blend was crafted from bourbon sourced from Tennessee, Kentucky and Indiana and bottled at 50.2% Abv.

name: Old Forester 1973 Bonded Bottled 1979
description: A 1973 vintage expression of Old Forester bottled in bond at 100 proof in 1979.

name: Karuizawa 1981 31 Year Old Single Cask #8775 Noh For K&L
description: Karuizawa produced outstanding whiskies, many of which have received international acclaim. They have released almost 300 single casks which are becoming increasingly rarer and rarer as demand soars. This series features different masks used in Noh, one of Japan's traditional performing arts. This image features the mask of the Noh character, Ko-Tobide, a divine spirit and demon-hunter. This limited bottling was distilled in 1981 and bottled in 2013. Produced from a single sherry butt, cask #8775, which yielded only 196 bottles. This bottle was released as an exclusive to Californian wine and spirit merchants, K&L Wines, and is as such 75cl. Bottled at cask strength.
baxus_class_name: Karuizawa 1981 31 Year Old Single Cask #8775 Noh For K&L

name: SMWS 33.134 Ardbeg 2007 8 Year
description: A 2007 vintage single cask expression of Ardbeg matured for 7 years in a 2nd fill sherry butt. It was bottled at 60.9% Abv by The Scotch Malt Whisky Society.

name: Old Overholt Made 1911
description: Distilled in 1911 at the now-defunct West Overton Distillery, this bottle has passed through the hands of numerous avid whiskey collectors over the course of more than a century. Its journey includes surviving the tumultuous years of Prohibition, a time when the production and distribution of alcohol was banned.

name: Pappy Van Winkle 23 Year Family Reserve
description: Papy Van Winkle 23 year old bourbon is crafted from a historic wheated recipe now distilled by Buffalo Trace. Each release of Pappy is hand selected by Julian Van Winkle, the grandson of the original Pappy. Although originally produced using barrels from the closed Stitzel-Weller distillery, since 2002 Julian has had an agreement with Buffalo Trace to use their stocks once his stored barrels ran dry.
baxus_class_name: Pappy Van Winkle 23 Year Family Reserve

name: King of Kentucky Single Barrel 14 year - 2021
description: It's a 14 year old bourbon made with a mash bill of 79% corn  11% rye  and 10% malted barley. A total of 33 barrels were selected for the release producing approximately 2 700 bottles  but each is released as a single barrel  therefore ranging between a staggering 125 and 135 proof.
baxus_class_name: King of Kentucky Single Barrel 14 year - 2021

name: Old Hickory 8 Year
description: Produced in Philadelphia by Continental Distillers at their Publicker distillery. Publicker would go on to invest heavily in the Scotch market founding Inver House distillers. The Old Hickory brand exists again today revived by the R.S. Lipman company. With the Pulicker distillery long gone the brand is produced using sourced whiskey from MGP in Indiana. This bottle is a great example of the original product.

name: Garrison Brothers Cowboy Bourbon 2022
description:
Garrison Brothers Cowboy Bourbon 2022 Release is an exceptional and highly sought-after expression from this pioneering Texas distillery. Bottled at a formidable 134.8 proof (67.4% ABV), this uncut and unfiltered bourbon showcases the intense flavors developed through aging in the extreme Texas climate.

Master Distiller Donnis Todd handpicks the barrels for Cowboy Bourbon from his "piggy bank" of exceptional casks that are deemed too flavorful to bottle immediately. These barrels, aged for at least 6 years, are further matured in the harsh Texas heat, resulting in a bourbon of remarkable depth and complexity.

On the nose, this Cowboy Bourbon offers a powerful bouquet of aromas, including rich maple syrup, cinnamon, leather, and robust oak notes. The palate delivers an intense flavor explosion, with initial waves of heat giving way to a complex interplay of flavors. Expect bold notes of campfire smoke, dark maple candy, leather, and cinnamon, underpinned by a strong oak presence.

The finish is exceptionally long and warming, with lingering notes of wintergreen, leather, and oak, complemented by a subtle sweetness reminiscent of maple candy. Despite its high proof, this bourbon maintains a surprising balance, with the intense flavors standing up to and complementing the alcohol heat.

name: Springbank 2000 12 Year Calvados Cask
description: A 2000 vintage small batch expression of Springbank matured for 6 years in refill bourbon barrels before a further 6 years of maturation in fresh Calvados casks. An apple brandy spirit, Calvados casks are not common in Scotch whisky. This edition was bottled in 2012 at 52.7% Abv with 9420 bottles produced.

name: Bowmore 1989 23 Year Port Cask Matured
description: A 1989 vintage expression of Bowmore matured entirely in port casks for 23 years. Bottled as a limited release of 12,000 bottles it was produced at 50.8% Abv.

name: Tomintoul 1969 30 Year Single Cask #5347 The Stillman’s Dram
description: A very early vintage expression from the Tomintoul distillery, this single cask was distilled in 1969 and matured for 30 years. It was bottled in 1999 at 45% Abv as part of their The Stillman’s Dram series. Tomintoul was first founded in 1965 and spent much of its life producing malt whisky for blends like Whyte & Mackay. This 1969 vintage was produced during a period when the distillery had just two stills.
baxus_class_name: Tomintoul 1969 30 Year Single Cask #5347 The Stillman’s Dram

name: Old Crow 4/5th Quart Traveler
description: This Old Crow Traveler Fifth is part of the Traveler series, that was launched in the 1960s and ran until the 80s. A fifth is a unit of volume formerly used for distilled beverages in the United States. It equals one fifth of a US liquid gallon, or 757 ml.  The Traveler Series was designed to be and marketed as a travel companion to travelers who did not want to leave the house without a good bottle of bourbon (because, you know, imagine you’re in an airplane and you have the sudden urge to get stupefyingly drunk, but you don’t have any bourbon with you… The humanity!). That’s why the bottle design is flat: it’s the ideal fit for a businessman’s briefcase. Or in their own words: ‘The tuckaway fifth that packs as flat as your shirt.’ Become the dandy you have always wanted to become.

name: Heaven Hill 27 Year Barrel Proof
description: A pre fire expression of Heaven Hill bottled in 2018 at a barrel proof of 47.35% Abv. The original Heaven Hill springs distillery was destroyed in a fire in 1996 with 25% of their barrel inventory lost. This crazy matured bourbon likely uses barrels left over from that pre fire era of the distillery's history.

name: SMWS 127.38 Port Charlotte 2003 10 Year
description: A 2003 vintage single cask expression of Port Charlotte, a heavily peated spirit produced at Bruichladdich. This cask was matured for 10 years in a refilled sherry butt and bottled at 66.3% Abv by the Scotch Malt Whisky Society.
series: Enticing Fume of a Peat Reek

name: Glenmorangie a Tale Of Winter
description: A warm and spicy single malt from Glenmorangie that embodies all of the comfort of a Christmas jumper. Matured for 13 years and finished in Marsala wine casks from Sicily  this whisky offers aromas of orange toffee  lavender honey  rose petals and overripe fruits that fill the nose. The palate offers notes of cocoa powder  red pepper  brazil nuts  toffee  white pepper spice  sweet malt  ginger and cinnamon that linger in the finish.

name: The Lakes Voyage - 2023
description:
Within The Whiskymaker's Editions, aficionados encounter a realm where the boundaries of tradition are transcended, and the art of whisky-making is elevated to new heights. Each release serves as a testament to the boundless creativity and daring spirit of our master whiskymaker, who fearlessly explores uncharted territories in pursuit of exceptional flavors and sensory experiences.

These limited-edition whiskies offer a tantalizing glimpse into the diverse palette of possibilities that exist within The Lakes Distillery. With each expression, whisky enthusiasts are invited to embark on a captivating journey of discovery, where every sip unveils a tapestry of nuanced flavors and textures, crafted with meticulous attention to detail.

The Whiskymaker's Editions stand as a testament to the unwavering commitment to excellence and innovation that defines The Lakes Distillery. Each bottle represents a moment of inspiration, a triumph of craftsmanship, and a celebration of the artistry that lies at the heart of our whisky-making philosophy.

name: Nikka Taketsuru Pure Malt
description:
From the producer: "This is a signature label in honor of Nikka's founder Masataka Taketsuru, the first Japanese who mastered whisky-making in Scotland and brought this expertise back to Japan. While being a disciplined craftsman, he was also a person of curiosity and open-mindedness. This is a tribute to Masataka from his successors, highlighting a perfect balance with complexity achieved by precise blending inherited from the founder.
 
A "pure malt" is a blend of malt whiskies from various distilleries, whereas a "single malt" is a whisky made exclusively from one distillery. A "pure malt" is also known as a "blended malt"."

name: Chichibu On the Way 3 Year - 2013
description: A great release from Ichiro Akuto's Chichibu, who are now firmly on the way to releasing their first five year old whisky. This is a multi-vintage vatting of whisky distilled at various times since they opened in 2008, including some of their oldest, five year old whisky. The whiskies that went in to this started their lives in bourbon casks but have all been finished in mizunara, Japanese oak.

name: 15 Stars 10 Year Sherry Cask Finished
description: A limited release from the 15 Stars brand, this unique blend of bourbons has been finished in Sherry Casks. The recipient of several awards, the 10 year old bourbon is part of the distillery's "First West" series.

name: Benriach 1994 19 Year Single Butt #7352
description: A peated expression from Benriach distilled in 1994 and matured for 19 years. Crafted from peated malt this single cask was finished in an Oloroso sherry butt and then bottled in 2013 at 53.2% Abv for the US market.

name: A. Smith Bowman 50th Anniversary Virginia Bourbon
description:
Bottled in honor of the 50th anniversary of the A. Smith Bowman Distillery, this limited edition Virginia Bourbon is a unique find that is packaged in a beautiful bottle. 

Bottled at 90 Proof (45% ABV), this bottle is highly sought after by collectors.
baxus_class_name: A. Smith Bowman 50th Anniversary Virginia Bourbon

name: Macallan 1988 30 Year Single Cask East Asia Whisky Company
description: A single cask expression of Macallan distilled in 1988 and matured for 29 years in a bourbon cask. It was then recasked into ex Mizunara wood and bottled at 48.6% Abv at 30 years of age. Bottled by East Asia Whisky Company in partnership with JapanWhiskys.
baxus_class_name: Macallan 1988 30 Year Single Cask East Asia Whisky Company

name: Hibiki 30 Year Gold Label
description: Suntory shines again! Of all the Hibiki bottles the Hibiki 30 Years Old is the cream of the crop. It was awarded at the International Spirits Challenge in 2004, 2006, and 2008, and received the coveted title of “World’s Best Blended Whisky” at the World Whiskies Award in 2007 and 2008. Comprising of grain and malt whiskies aged for 30 years and over, a dram doesn’t get much better than this.

name: Booker's 6 Year "Tagalong Batch" 2021 Bottling
description:
Booker's 2021-02 "Tagalong Batch" is a distinctive release in the renowned Booker's Bourbon lineup, paying homage to the tradition of knowledge passing between generations at the Jim Beam distillery. This small batch bourbon was aged for 6 years, 5 months, and 0 days before being bottled at a robust 127.9 proof (63.95% ABV).

On the nose, this expression offers pronounced aromas of caramel and vanilla, balanced with "sweet brown" wood sugar notes from the charred white oak barrels. The palate delivers a bold flavor profile characteristic of Booker's, featuring rich notes of vanilla, caramel, and toasted nuts, complemented by a subtle spiciness from the high rye content in the mash bill.

The batch is composed of barrels from three production dates, aged in six different rackhouse locations. This careful selection process contributes to the whiskey's complexity and depth of flavor. The deep, rich color comes from the mid-to-high rackhouse floor locations where these barrels matured.

Despite its high proof, Tagalong Batch is described as having a surprisingly clean finish, inviting the drinker back for another sip. This release exemplifies the Booker's tradition of uncut, unfiltered bourbon that showcases the full flavor and character of the distillate.

Named to celebrate how Booker Noe learned the craft by "tagging along" with his grandfather Jim Beam at the distillery, this batch embodies the legacy and expertise passed down through generations of master distillers at Jim Beam.

name: SMWS 4.197 Highland Park 1999 14 Year
description: A 1999 vintage single cask expression of Highland Park matured for 14 years in a 1st fill barrel. It was bottled at 56.4% Abv by the Scotch Malt Whisky Society.

name: Willowbank 18 Year Double Wood
description:
This exceptional blend encapsulates the epitome of unparalleled craftsmanship and unwavering commitment to excellence.

Each constituent of our MasterBlend embarks on a meticulous maturation process, spending six years in American Bourbon barrels, where it develops its foundational character and intricacy. However, our dedication to perfection extends beyond this initial stage. Following this period, the blend undergoes an additional 12 years of refinement in French Oak New Zealand wine barrels.

This distinctive finishing technique imparts a captivating ruby hue to our MasterBlend, infusing it with a profound depth of character and complexity that distinguishes it from its counterparts. The culmination is a symphony of flavors that grace the palate, revealing layers of richness and subtlety with every sip.

name: Glenfarclas 1991 22 Year Single Cask For Binny's Hunter Laing
description: A 1991 vintage single cask expression of Glenfarclas matured for 22 years in a refill hogshead. 'Probably Speyside's Finest' is the name Hunter Laing uses to refer to Glenfarclas as the distillery doesn't allow their name to be used with independent bottlers. This cask was bottled at 52.4% Abv as part of the Old Malt Cask label exclusively for Binny's.
baxus_class_name: Glenfarclas 1991 22 Year Single Cask For Binny's Hunter Laing

name: Dalmore 28 Year The Stillman’s Dram 2000 Bottling
description: Distilled in the early 1970’s, this small batch release of Highland single malt whisky from Dalmore was matured for 3028years. It was bottled in 2000 at 45% Abv as part of the Stillman’s Dram. This series featured a variety of Whyte & Mackay and Invergordon distillers in both small batch and single cask forms.
baxus_class_name: Dalmore 28 Year The Stillman’s Dram 2000 Bottling

name: I.W.Harper 1917 16 Year Old Bottled In Bond
description: A pre-prohibition era bottling of bourbon from the I.W.Harper brand, an exceptionally popular label historically produced at the Bernheim distillery. This expression was distilled in 1917 and matured for 16 years before being bottled in bond at 100 proof in 1933.
baxus_class_name: I.W.Harper 1917 16 Year Old Bottled In Bond

name: Old Stagg 6 Year - 1970s
description: Old Stagg was at one point the best selling bourbon brand in the US. An early convert to the 86 proof (as opposed to traditional 100) provided them with more available stock when supply was thin during the second world war, and a better taste as a straight whiskey than the competing blends.  This bottle was produced by Schenley in the 1970's at George T. Stagg distillery , better known today as Buffalo Trace.  German import.

name: Hibiki 30 Year Kacho Fugetstu
description: The Hibiki 30 Year Old Kacho Fugetsu is a limited edition Japanese whisky from Suntory, representing the pinnacle of the Hibiki range and embodying the beauty of Japanese nature through its name, which translates to "Flowers, Birds, Wind, and Moon." Bottled at 43% ABV, this exquisite whisky is a blend of carefully selected malt and grain whiskies aged for a minimum of 30 years. It offers a deep amber color and a complex nose with notes of rose, lychee, rosemary, mature woodiness, and sandalwood. On the palate, it delivers honey-like sweetness, candied orange peel, and white chocolate, leading to a subtle, tender, and long finish with a hint of Mizunara (Japanese oak). The bottle design is equally impressive, featuring traditional Japanese motifs that celebrate the harmony and beauty of nature, making it a true masterpiece both inside and out.

name: Bunnahabhain 1978 33 Year Single Butt Douglas Laing
description: A 1978 vintage single cask expression of Bunnahabhain matured for 33 years and bottled at 53.9% Abv. This cask was bottled as part of Douglas Laing's Old & Rare label with just 172 bottles produced from this cask.
baxus_class_name: Bunnahabhain 1978 33 Year Single Butt Douglas Laing

name: Old Rip Van Winkle 1989 25 Year
description: Distilled in 1989 at the legendary Stitzel-Weller distillery in Shively, Lousville this exceptionally rare expression of bourbon was matured for 25 years! An incredible age statement even older than the industry leading Pappy Van Winkle 23 year, this limited offering was crafted from 11 barrels Julian Van Winkle carefully nurtured. After carefully assessing the barrels he vatted and tanked the liquid in 2014 to prevent any further wood interaction. Bottled at 100 proof just a tiny amount, 710 bottles, were produced from this 11 barrel run. A typical barrel should produce north of 270 bottles, so 25 years of maturation has lead to considerable angel's share. Bottled at 100 proof in a Glencairn crystal decanter and presented in a handmade wooden box. This presentation box was crafted with the staves from the 11 barrels in the vatting.

name: Seagram's Seven Crown Mini
description:
Seagram's is a historic blended whiskey brand that has played a significant role in the American spirits industry. Originally established by Joseph E. Seagram & Sons in the late 19th century, the brand rose to prominence under the leadership of the Bronfman family, particularly Samuel Bronfman, who expanded the company significantly during the Prohibition era and beyond.

Seagram's most famous product, Seagram's 7 Crown, is an American blended whiskey known for its smoothness and versatility. It is often enjoyed in cocktails, particularly the popular "Seven and Seven," which combines Seagram's 7 with 7 Up. The whiskey is crafted using a blend of aged neutral spirits and is characterized by its consistent flavor profile, achieved through meticulous blending and aging processes.

In 2000, Seagram's beverage division was acquired by Diageo and Pernod Ricard, leading to the continued production of its iconic brands. Today, Seagram's remains a staple in bars and homes across America, celebrated for its rich heritage and enduring popularity in the blended whiskey category.

name: Pappy Van Winkle 23 Year Family Reserve 2021 Bottling
description: A 2021 bottling of Papy Van Winkle 23 year old bourbon crafted from a historic wheated recipe now distilled by Buffalo Trace. Each release of Pappy is hand selected by Julian Van Winkle, the grandson of the original Pappy. Although originally produced using barrels from the closed Stitzel-Weller distillery, since 2002 Julian has had an agreement with Buffalo Trace to use their stocks once his stored barrels ran dry.
baxus_class_name: Pappy Van Winkle 23 Year Family Reserve 2021 Bottling

name: Yellow Rose of Texas 8 Year
description:
The Yellow Rose of Texas Bourbon is meticulously distilled at Bardstown by the esteemed Heaven Hill Distillery expressly for the discerning Japanese market.

Crafted with precision and expertise, each batch of The Yellow Rose of Texas embodies the pinnacle of bourbon craftsmanship, marrying tradition with innovation in every golden drop. Distilled with the finest ingredients and aged to perfection in small American oak barrels, this bourbon epitomizes the artistry and dedication synonymous with both Texas and Japanese whiskey-making traditions.

The dynamic climate of Bardstown imparts a distinctive character to The Yellow Rose of Texas, as it matures gracefully under the careful watch of master distillers. With each passing year, a portion of the bourbon evaporates naturally, known as the "angel's share," adding a touch of rarity and allure to this exceptional spirit.

Elevate your whiskey experience with The Yellow Rose of Texas Bourbon—an exquisite fusion of craftsmanship, sophistication, and tradition crafted exclusively for the Japanese palate.

name: Springbank 10 Year Old 2015 Bottling
description: A 2015 era bottling of Springbank’s signature 10 year old expression typically matured in a combination of bourbon and sherry casks. This older edition release features their gothic black labels and this 750ml US Import was bottled at 46% Abv.

name: G&M Macallan Speymalt 42 year - 2013
description: Situated on a ridge above the banks of the River Spey the Easter Elchies House has been the spiritual home of The Macallan for over three centuries. In 1820 Alexander Reid began renting the home from Sir Lewis Grant. Reid was a farmer and soon after he sowed the fields surrounding the home with barley Reid established the first licensed distillery on the estate which he named Macallan after an ancient church that had been destroyed by fire during the 15th century. In the winter when there was little activity on the farm Reid would ferment and distill his excess grains into whisky which was often drunk straight from the still or sold to travelers passing through the town. Today the Macallan Estate encompasses 370 acres 95 of which are devoted to the production of the Macallan Estate's Minstrel barley (a single acre produces about 2.5 tons of barley each year enough to yield 1800 bottles of The Macallan). In addition the distillery contracts with farmers to purchase barley that is low in nitrogen and high in starch resulting in a rich and oily whisky. After the barley is harvested in late August and early September it is malted before being mashed in one of The Macallan's two mash tuns a process that takes between four and eight hours. Then the barley is fermented with a specially cultured yeast before being distilled twice through copper-pot stills. The copper comprising the stills acts as a catalyst and enhances the formation of sweet esters while minimizing impurities such as sulphur. In addition the curiously small stills some of the smallest stills within the Scotch whisky industryaccording to production manager Alexander Tweedie produce a whisky with a heavy oily flavor. Following distillation The Macallan distillers remove the heads and tails of the whisky and collect approximately 16% of the spirit to fill into casks for maturation. This cutwhich is among the highest of any Scottish distillery results in a more full-bodied and and rich whisky. Bottled by Gordon & MacPhail one of the most prominent independent bottlers in Scotland The Macallan Speymalt 42 Year Old Single Malt Scotch Whisky was originally distilled in 1970 and matured for over four decades in a cask that was previously used to mature sherry. After its maturation the whisky was bottled in 2013. The single-barrel whisky has an aroma of vanilla raisins toasted almonds and a touch of caramel. The aroma gives way to notes of dried fruits particularly cherries and strawberries along with hints of dark chocolate warm spices and Christmas cake. The finish is long and smooth and ends with a touch of creamy vanilla. The Macallan Speymalt 42 Year Old Single Malt Scotch Whisky represents a unique opportunity for Scotch aficionados to try a limited edition bottling from one of the most prestigious distilleries in Scotland. Pick up one of these rare treasures today!

name: Tomintoul 1966 33 Year Single Cask #3404 The Stillman’s Dram
description: A very early vintage expression from the Tomintoul distillery, this single cask was distilled in 1966 and matured for 33 years. It was bottled in 2000 at 45% Abv as part of their The Stillman’s Dram series. Tomintoul was first founded in 1965 and spent much of its life producing malt whisky for blends like Whyte & Mackay. This 1966 vintage was produced just one year after opening and during a period when the distillery had just two stills.
baxus_class_name: Tomintoul 1966 33 Year Single Cask #3404 The Stillman’s Dram

name: Glenmorangie Artein 1996 15 Year 2011 Release
description: The taste is very rich and creamy again with strong sweet wine flavours and honey-driven toffee notes within a firm wooden structure. The nose offers a bold sweet winey and vanilla-toffee profile with some delicious homegrown fruits aromas that is all nicely balanced.The finish is of medium length and adds some spicier flavours to the taste that are highly welcome here. Some water releases more aromas both in the nose and on the palate.

name: Port Ellen 1983 21 Year Old Single Cask Douglas Laing
description: This expression was distilled in 1983, which you may recognise as the year that Port Ellen closed its doors, making this whisky some of the last Port Ellen whisky ever made. It was bottled as part of Douglas Laing’s Old Malt Cask range in 2004. Only 525 bottles were ever produced.
baxus_class_name: Port Ellen 1983 21 Year Old Single Cask Douglas Laing

name: Macallan 1963 Special Selection
description: An exceptionally old Special Selection bottling from The Macallan. Distilled 1963 and matured in Sherry Wood.

name: I.W. Harper 1962 Bottled 1967 Bottled In Bond
description: A 1962 vintage bottled in bond decanter from I.W. Harper produced at the Bernheim distillery in Lousville. Bottled in 1967 at 100 proof this old school bottling was produced under the ownership of Schenley.
baxus_class_name: I.W. Harper 1962 Bottled 1967 Bottled In Bond

name: Talisker 30 Year Old 2006 Release
description: Talisker is the oldest (and up until recently, only) distillery on the Isle of Skye. It is part of the Diageo stable, and as such is regularly included in the highly anticipated annual Diageo Special Releases. This 2006 edition was the oldest official bottling of Talisker ever released at the time. It proved to be extremely popular and sold out within no time. Talisker 30 Years Old Diageo Special Releases 2006 has been drawn from sherry casks aged for three decades, and is bottled at a natural cask strength of 51.9%. This release is limited to 3000 numbered bottles.

name: Compass Box Hedonism
description:
From the producer: 

"At their best, aged in good quality American oak casks, brimming with vanilla and echoing rich pastry cream on the finish, grain whiskies are amongst the most delicious whiskies in the world.

They are the perfect whiskies to name...Hedonism.

Hedonism will always be lush, soft and creamy but each year we use different whiskies, in different combinations, to achieve this. To learn what exactly is in your bottle of Hedonism, click the RECIPE & FACTSHEET download link below and check the code on the back label.

The inspiration behind our whisky HEDONISM is just that – pleasure, enjoyment, a celebration of that ideal marriage between distilled spirit and high quality oak maturation.

The aromas and flavours hint of vanilla, caramel, a delicate fruitiness, accented by flashes of coconut in the finish.

This is a whisky that will appeal to both the ardent whisky enthusiast and newcomers to whisky alike."

name: Clase Azul Tequila Día de Muertos Colores - 2022
description: The añejo tequila of this limited edition is inspired by Calaveritas de Azucar, a colorful sweet traditionally made during Día de Muertos.
baxus_class_name: Clase Azul Tequila Día de Muertos Colores - 2022

name: Ardbeg 1998 Single Cask #1189 Bottled 2008
description: A rare single cask expression of Ardbeg distilled in 1998 and bottled in 2008. Matured in a unique new toasted oak hogshead it was bottled at 54% Abv.

name: Nikka Miyagikyo Single Malt Grande
description: Bottled as a travel retail exlusive, this bottle is part of a larger range of single malts from Nikka known as Miyagikyo Single Malts. These whiskies are from the second distillery created by Masataka Taketsuru, Nikka's founder.

name: Macallan 1938 Handwritten Red Ribbon
description: A 1938 vintage expression of Macallan bottled as part of the legendary handwritten red ribbon series. This release was bottled between 1980-1983 just after Macallan began bottling its own whisky, as they had previously contracted all bottling to Gordon & Macphail.  5 different vintages were released in this line including a 1938, 1940, 1950, 1957 and a 1973 that were all bottled between 1980 and 1983. The series is known by the handwritten red ribbon name as the labels for each release look to be handwritten, despite being printed, and each bottle has a red ribbon with a red wax print on it.

name: Jim Beam Lineage 15 Year - 2021
description: This is a 2021 release from Jim Beam which was made exclusive to the Travel Retail market. This is the very first collaboration between father and son Fred and Freddie Noe. The whiskey itself was distilled in 2004 and aged for a total of 15 years. Upon it's release Lineage became the first bourbon in the Jim Beam portfolio to bear Freddie’s name. The Beam family (anglicised from the German surname Böhm in the 18th century) are the greatest dynasty in all of American distilling with members involved in nearly every Kentucky distillery during the 20th century. Perhaps none more important however than James Jim Beauregard Beam who rebuilt his family business following the repeal of Prohibition re-opening the famous Clermont distillery in 1935. The company is now the best-selling bourbon brand in the world (due to Jack Daniel's refusing to be categorised as such). They operate two Kentucky distilleries the eponymous Jim Beam in Clermont and the Booker Noe distillery in nearby Boston and since their purchase of National Distillers in 1987 also have a wealth of historic brands under their banner. Since 2014 the company has been a subsidiary of Suntory in Japan which has widened its portfolio into the Scotch and Japanese whisky industries as well.

name: Red Satin Mini
description:
Schenley Distillery, established in the early 20th century, became a prominent player in the American spirits industry. Originally founded as the Schenley Distilling Company in Pennsylvania, it gained notoriety for producing high-quality whiskey, particularly during the Prohibition era when it was one of the few distilleries licensed to produce medicinal spirits.

Under the leadership of Lewis Rosenstiel, Schenley expanded rapidly in the 1920s and 1930s, acquiring multiple distilleries and brands, including notable names such as I.W. Harper and Old Charter. The company was known for its innovative practices and strategic acquisitions, which allowed it to thrive after Prohibition was repealed in 1933.

By the mid-20th century, Schenley had become one of the largest liquor companies in the United States, with a diverse portfolio that included bourbon, rye, gin, vodka, and rum. The company also played a significant role in the Scotch whisky market through its ownership of various distilleries and brands.

Schenley Industries, as it was later known, continued to grow until it was acquired by Guinness in the late 1980s. Despite its eventual decline and closure of its distilleries, Schenley's legacy remains significant in the history of American whiskey production.

name: Nikka Gold & Gold Mini
description:
Nikka Gold & Gold is a distinguished blended whisky from Nikka Whisky Distilling Co., one of Japan's most celebrated producers of whisky. Founded by Masataka Taketsuru, who studied the art of whisky making in Scotland, Nikka has built a reputation for crafting high-quality spirits that reflect both traditional techniques and innovative practices.

Gold & Gold stands out not only for its quality but also for its striking packaging, which features a removable samurai armor and helmet design. This eye-catching presentation makes it a popular choice among collectors and a sought-after item in duty-free shops.

The whisky itself is a blend of malt and grain whiskies sourced from Nikka's renowned Yoichi and Miyagikyo distilleries. This expression exemplifies Nikka's commitment to craftsmanship, showcasing the brand's dedication to producing smooth and approachable whiskies that appeal to a broad audience.

Nikka Gold & Gold embodies the spirit of Japanese whisky culture, combining artistry with heritage. It serves as an accessible introduction to the world of Japanese blended whiskies, reflecting the brand's philosophy of quality and excellence that has garnered global acclaim.

name: Buffalo Trace Kosher Wheat 7 Year
description: From the distiller: "Buffalo Trace Distillery produced this Wheat Recipe Bourbon in a partnership with the Chicago Rabbinical Council (cRc). Made with the same high quality grains as W.L. Weller Bourbon Whiskey, this Kosher spirit was aged in specifically designated Kosher barrels. In order to satisfy Passover requirements, these barrels were sold to a non-Jewish executive in a ceremony witnessed by a representative from the cRc. After aging for seven years, this Wheat Recipe Bourbon was bottled at 94 proof after ensuring the bottling lines were cleaned beforehand and that no contact was made with non-Kosher spirits. Released after Passover each year, this Wheat Recipe Bourbon stands alone, a tribute to the legacy of America’s oldest continually-operating distillery."

name: Yellow Rose of Texas 12 Year
description:
The Yellow Rose of Texas Bourbon is meticulously distilled at Bardstown by the esteemed Heaven Hill Distillery expressly for the discerning Japanese market.

Crafted with precision and expertise, each batch of The Yellow Rose of Texas embodies the pinnacle of bourbon craftsmanship, marrying tradition with innovation in every golden drop. Distilled with the finest ingredients and aged to perfection in small American oak barrels, this bourbon epitomizes the artistry and dedication synonymous with both Texas and Japanese whiskey-making traditions.

The dynamic climate of Bardstown imparts a distinctive character to The Yellow Rose of Texas, as it matures gracefully under the careful watch of master distillers. With each passing year, a portion of the bourbon evaporates naturally, known as the "angel's share," adding a touch of rarity and allure to this exceptional spirit.

Elevate your whiskey experience with The Yellow Rose of Texas Bourbon—an exquisite fusion of craftsmanship, sophistication, and tradition crafted exclusively for the Japanese palate.

name: Cameronbridge 1979 30 Year Single Cask #3584 Duncan Taylor
description: A 1979 vintage single cask expression of single grain whisky matured for 30 years. Bottled at 49.5% Abv by Duncan Taylor in 2009.
baxus_class_name: Cameronbridge 1979 30 Year Single Cask #3584 Duncan Taylor

name: Macallan 1841 Replica - 2002
description: The Macallan 1841 Replica 2002 is a meticulously crafted single malt Scotch whisky that pays homage to the distillery's storied past. This limited edition bottling is a modern interpretation of the original 1841 Macallan whisky, designed to replicate the style and essence of the era. The bottle's label bears the traditional "Macallan Malt Whisky of Speyside" inscription, established in 1824, and features the names of the proprietors "Priest & Davidson." The label's design evokes the historical significance of the Macallan distillery, which has been producing exceptional single malts since the 19th century. This 1841 Replica is a collector's item, offering whisky enthusiasts a taste of history with its rich flavor profile and classic presentation.

name: SMWS 127.14 Port Charlotte 2002 9 Year Old
description: A 2002 vintage single cask expression of Port Charlotte, the heavily peated spirit produced at Bruichladdich. This cask was matured for 9 years in a 2nd fill bourbon cask and bottled at 65.7% Abv by the Scotch Malt Whisky Society.

name: Clase Azul Ultra
description: Clase Azul Tequila Ultra is our most time-intensive creation. Its exquisitely complex tequila and masterfully decorated decanter are crafted to be contemplated by true connoisseurs.   The sublime character of Clase Azul Tequila Ultra’s extra añejo tequila is only possible through an extended aging period of five years in American whiskey and sherry casks.   TASTING NOTES COLOR: Dark amber with copper highlights.  BODY: Full body.  AROMA: Sherry, dried plums, apricot, ripe cherries, maple syrup, hazelnut and intense oak notes.  PALATE: toasted oak, dried plums, cinnamon, vanilla, candied ginger and clove  PAIRING CHEESE: Aged goat cheese.  FRUIT: Black cherries or fig.  CHOCOLATE: Bitter chocolate.   DECANTER Clase Azul Tequila Ultra’s decanter is delicately decorated in platinum, silver and 24-karat gold.   Our most highly skilled artisans recreate our distinctive feathered motif on its sheer black surface completely from memory, as the platinum brushstrokes are visible only after the ceramic is fired.

name: Russell’s Reserve Private Barrel Select 9 Year 2022
baxus_class_name: Russell’s Reserve Private Barrel Select 9 Year 2022

name: Old Man Winter From The Black Hills
description: Old Man Winter Bourbon from the Black Hills is a unique and storied whiskey that blends Kentucky and Indiana bourbons, crafted by Preservation Distillery. The bottle features a distinctive label with a black and white photograph of a man in a cowboy hat standing in front of rustic cabins, evoking a rugged, old-west aesthetic. This bourbon is known for its rich flavor profile, which includes notes of dark pitted fruits, sweet spice, caramel, and a hint of anisette. The whiskey has a rich mouthfeel and a warm, lingering finish, making it a standout in its category. The bottle is also notable for its hand-dipped winter wax seal, adding to its artisanal appeal.
baxus_class_name: Old Man Winter From The Black Hills

name: Highland Park 18 Year 1990s Bottling
description: A 1990s era bottling of Highland Park matured for 18 years and bottled at 43% Abv in a unique dumpy format bottling

name: Glen Mhor 1980 Bottled 2011 Gordon & Macphail
description: A 1980 vintage expression of the closed Inverness distillery Glen Mhor. Bottled in 2011 at 43% Abv this expression comes from Gordon & Macphail who have long held sizeable stocks of Scotland's best single malts.

name: Wild Turkey Rare Breed
description:
The Wild Turkey Rare Breed from the late 1990s and early 2000s, particularly batches like the renowned W-T-01-99, represents a pinnacle in bourbon craftsmanship that many enthusiasts consider legendary. These expressions, bottled at barrel proof (typically around 108.4 proof), showcase the distillery's commitment to producing complex, full-flavored whiskeys during a time when the bourbon industry was experiencing a glut of aged stocks. This era of Rare Breed is particularly prized for its rich, multifaceted flavor profile that balances intensity with elegance.

Tasting notes for these vintage Rare Breed releases often describe a dense, classic Wild Turkey profile with remarkable depth. The nose typically offers a fragrant bouquet of brandy-like fruitiness, honey-maple sweetness, and medicinal cherry, complemented by caramel creme, sweet oak, and herbal-floral spices. On the palate, enthusiasts report an oily mouthfeel delivering waves of cherry-vanilla, butter toffee, and brown sugar, intertwined with sweet herbs, citrus notes, and warm baking spices. The finish is characteristically long and flavorful, leaving a lasting impression of vanilla bean, cola, and molasses. These batches are often cited as being superior to modern releases, showcasing a perfect harmony of aged stocks that's difficult to replicate in today's high-demand bourbon market.

name: Macallan 1950 Handwritten Red Ribbon
description: A 1950 vintage expression of Macallan bottled as part of the legendary handwritten red ribbon series. This release was bottled in between 1980-1983 just after Macallan began bottling its own whisky, as they had previously contracted all bottling to Gordon & Macphail.  5 different vintages were released in this line including a 1938, 1940, 1950, 1957 and a 1973 that were all bottled between 1980 and 1983. The series is known by the handwritten red ribbon name as the labels for each release look to be handwritten, despite being printed, and each bottle has a red ribbon with a red wax print on it.

name: Russell’s Reserve Private Barrel Select 10 Year 2020
baxus_class_name: Russell’s Reserve Private Barrel Select 10 Year 2020

name: Fettercairn 12 Year
description: From the distiller: "After years of maturing in American white oak ex-bourbon barrels, our 12 Year Old is the colour of sunlight and amber honey. Come closer and discover the taste of our signature tropical house style with this welcoming single malt whisky."

name: Very Olde St. Nick 16 Year Notorious O.S.N Lot #2
description: Very Olde St. Nick 16 Year Notorious O.S.N. Kentucky Bourbon Whiskey is a distinguished and highly sought-after bourbon, celebrated for its exceptional quality and depth. This limited edition release has been meticulously aged for 16 years, resulting in a rich, complex flavor profile. The bottle features a distinctive label with an illustration of a bearded man, presumably St. Nick, and prominently displays the "Very Olde St. Nick" branding along with the "Notorious O.S.N" and "16 Year Old" designations. The bourbon is noted for its dark brown color, suggesting a well-aged, high-quality spirit. The label also indicates that this is a special release, as evidenced by the "Lot #2" text. This bourbon is revered as one of the final stocks from a minuscule lot of rare barrels.
baxus_class_name: Very Olde St. Nick 16 Year Notorious O.S.N Lot #2

name: Springbank Special Reserve Ceramic Jug
description: This particular edition of Springbank is part of the distillery's tradition of releasing limited edition and special reserve whiskies, which are highly prized in the whisky collecting community. The use of ceramic jugs for bottling is a nod to traditional methods and adds an element of historical charm to the presentation of the whisky.

name: Blanton's Single Barrel 30th Anniversary 2014 Bottling
description: Blanton's is a bourbon brand from the portfolio of Age International, the company formed by former Fleischmann's Distilling director's, Bob Baranaskas and Ferdie Falke. They had approached Schenley in the early 1980s with a view to purchasing its Old Charter brand, but were instead offered Ancient Age and the George T. Stagg distillery where it was produced. The deal was completed in 1983, two years before the retirement of George T. Stagg master distiller, Elmer T. Lee, who had served there for 36 years, working his way from the bottom up. One of his final pioneering triumphs before doing so was the introduction of mass produced single barrel bourbon, specifically through the creation of the Blanton's brand in 1984.  Normally a 6 to 8 year old bourbon, it is aged in Warehouse H at Buffalo Trace, which is the only metal-clad warehouse at the distillery, commissioned for construction by Albert B. Blanton, after whom the whiskey is named. The warehouse was built shortly after prohibition and being metal, transfers heat quicker than brick warehouses, allowing for more rapid ageing.  The popularity of these products was particularly high in Japan, coinciding with a market boom for American whiskey there in the 1980s. In 1991, with Age International in some financial trouble, a Japanese company called Takaro Shuzo stepped in and acquired a 22.5% stake in the company. In an unusual series of events, they then scuppered a deal the following year that was to see the remaining shares sold to Heublein (a subsidiary of Grand Metropolitan). Their deal the year before had included a 30 day right of refusal to purchase the shares for themselves should they be put up for sale. With the deal all but done, the Japanese company stepped in on the final day of the window to acquire full control of the company. As it turned out, their only interest was in the brands, and they had used the 30 days to negotiate a deal with the Sazerac Company of  New Orleans. This saw the American company take ownership of the distillery (which they renamed Buffalo Trace in 1999), as well as the exclusive production and US distribution rights for the Age International labels. This is an arrangement that is still in place today.  This is a 2014 bottling, released for the Japanese market in order to commemorate the 30th anniversary of the creation of the Blanton's brand in 1984.   Since 1999, every bottle of Blanton's has one of 8 different stoppers, each depicting a horse and jockey at a different stage of finishing a race. The designs are all lettered so that a complete set laid out side by side will spell "BLANTONS."

name: Echo Spring Bourbon
description:
Echo Spring is a historic Kentucky straight bourbon whiskey with roots tracing back to the late 19th century. Originally produced at the Murphy-Barber distillery in Clermont, which opened in 1881, the brand has a rich heritage in American whiskey-making.

During the Prohibition era, the Dowling Brothers Distillery was responsible for distilling Echo Spring, which was later bottled by Schenley after they acquired the company. This connection to pre-Prohibition whiskey production adds to the brand's historical significance.

In more recent times, Echo Spring has been produced by Heaven Hill Distilleries, known for their quality bourbon production. The bourbon is typically aged for at least 3 years, developing a deep gold to orange color with a pale gold hue. On the nose, Echo Spring offers prominent spicy notes, while the palate likely presents a balanced blend of traditional bourbon flavors.

name: Russell’s Reserve Private Barrel Select 8 Year 2020
baxus_class_name: Russell’s Reserve Private Barrel Select 8 Year 2020

name: Clase Azul Joven Puebla - 2019
description: The Clase Azul Joven Puebla 2019 Limited Edition is a luxurious and exclusive tequila, celebrated for its exceptional craftsmanship and unique flavor profile. This edition is part of Clase Azul's tradition of creating premium tequilas that honor Mexican culture and heritage, with the 2019 release being particularly notable for its stunning hand-painted ceramic decanter, a hallmark of Clase Azul's dedication to artistry and detail. The tequila itself is a joven, a blend of Clase Azul Plata and Clase Azul Reposado with touches of Clase Azul Ultra, offering a balanced and complex taste experience that includes notes of cooked agave, vanilla, caramel, and a hint of spice. This limited edition, with only 1800 bottles produced, is a collector's item sought after by connoisseurs and enthusiasts for its rarity, exquisite craftsmanship of both the tequila and its presentation, and its celebration of Mexican cultural pride and the rich heritage of tequila making.

name: Heaven Hill 2009 13 Year Single Puncheon #3448530 The Distinctive Spirits Co
description: Distilled and aged in Kentucky. Re-Racked 2019 & Bottled in Scotland. Distilled in 2009. Bottled in 2022 one of 629 Bottles Made. Single Cask, Sherry Puncheon Bottled at Cask Strength.
baxus_class_name: Heaven Hill 2009 13 Year Single Puncheon #3448530 The Distinctive Spirits Co

name: Glenmorangie 1993 Ealanta Bottled 2012
description: Distilled in 1993 this special release from Glenmorangie as part of their Private Edition series was matured in heavily charred American white oak casks from Missouri. It was bottled in 2012 at 46% Abv.

name: Hanyu Sanmi-Ittai Trinitas - 2018
description: A blended malt whisky from Toashuzo Co, the previous owners of the now closed distillery, Hanyu. Sanmi-Ittai is a Japanese translation of the Latin, Trinitas, in reference to the three founders of the distillery. The blend is married in a single cask and released in small batches.

name: Bowmore 1989 16 Year Old Cask Strength
description: This limited edition Bowmore is from a selection of only 134 (predominantly) bourbon casks. Distilled in 1989, matured for 16 years and bottled at natural cask strength.

name: Very Olde St. Nick 16 Year "Notorious O.S.N." Lot #1
description: An extremely hard-to-find release, this limited edition from the Preservation distillery in Bardstown is a true gem. Crafted in adherence to time-honored bourbon-making traditions, The Very Olde St Nick 16 Year Notorious O.S.N. Bourbon is a true embodiment of excellence. Carefully chosen after 16 years of maturation, it epitomizes the harmonious blend of maturity, authenticity, and refinement. Each bottle narrates a unique tale of aging, rendering it a prized possession among aficionados, rightfully earning its 'notorious' reputation.
baxus_class_name: Very Olde St. Nick 16 Year "Notorious O.S.N." Lot #1

name: SMWS 4.226 Highland Park 2004 12 Year
description: A 2004 single cask expression of Highland Park matured for 12 years in a refill sherry puncheon. It was bottled at 64.5% Abv by the Scotch Malt Whisky Society.

name: Tesla Anejo Tequila
description: Tesla Tequila is a premium 100% de agave tequila añejo made from sustainably sourced highland and lowland agaves. It is aged for 15 months in French oak barrels, and bottled at 40% ABV.

name: American Whiskey 2006 Single Cask #1568 Bottled 2020 For Milwaukee’s Club
description: One of the most fascinating bottlings we've ever come across. What started as Wild Turkey (non disclosed on label) Bourbon in 2006, after 6yrs of aging the original whiskey was moved to Chichibu in Japan and finished aging for an additional 8yrs in a refill puncheon. Bottled from a single cask at natural cask strength, this is one of the best and most improbable 14yr "Bourbons" we have ever seen, echoing the legendary Beyond Duplication series by WT themselves.
baxus_class_name: American Whiskey 2006 Single Cask #1568 Bottled 2020 For Milwaukee’s Club

name: Benrinnes 1996 14 Year Single Hogshead #6463 A.D. Rattray
description: A 1996 vintage single cask expression of Benrinnes matured for 14 years in a sherry hogshead. Bottled in 2011 at 56.1% Abv by A.D. Rattray.
baxus_class_name: Benrinnes 1996 14 Year Single Hogshead #6463 A.D. Rattray

name: Blanton's Gold 2017 Bottling
description: The world’s first single barrel bourbon was created in 1984 by Elmer T. Lee. Named after former distillery president Colonel Albert B. Blanton. Elmer recalled how Colonel Blanton would sometimes handpick a ‘honey barrel’ from the center of Warehouse H to enjoy with others. Many years later, the Blanton’s brand was created. Today, Blanton’s Single Barrel has become one of the most revered and award-winning bourbons on the market. The Gold Edition was the second version created, after the Original 93 proof. This 103 proof Blanton’s Gold is very limited, but a favorite among discerning bourbon aficionados.

name: Very Olde St. Nick Ancient Cask Curia 118.2 Proof
description: A rare release from an already elusive line, this bottling from the Very Olde St. Nick brand, from the Preservation Distillery in Bardstown, is quite the find. Available in a limited run, the details of the whiskey within are hard to find. This mystique speaks to the legendary status of the Very Olde St. Nick brand, and this bottle is an excellent addition to any collection.
baxus_class_name: Very Olde St. Nick Ancient Cask Curia 118.2 Proof

name: The Last Drop Distillers Limited Glenrothes 49 Year - 2018
description: This remarkable release comprises two Single Casks, both filled in 1968. These Glenrothes Single Malt Scotch Whiskies have spent their entire lives – nearly 50 years – maturing in the same oak casks.
baxus_class_name: The Last Drop Distillers Limited Glenrothes 49 Year - 2018

name: Clase Azul 25 Aniversario - 2022
description: From the producer: "The tequila created for this edition pays homage to our signature Clase Azul Tequila Reposado. Our Master Distiller, Viridiana Tinoco, reimagined its creation to give it a special touch. Part of the agave used to make this blend was milled using a traditional stone mill called a tahona, a practice that dates back to the origins of tequila. In addition, the fermentation process was extended to accentuate the liquid’s citrus and fruity notes. This blend was aged for eight months in two different first-use American whiskey casks, each one imparting its own distinct and rich tasting notes."

name: Bowmore 25 Year Pre-2013 Bottling
description: An older expression of Bowmore’s 25 year old age stated expression. Bottled before 2013, this black label offering was first released in 2007 before a refresh of the line in 2013. Matured in both bourbon and sherry casks it was bottled at 43% Abv.

name: Macallan 2005 Single Butt #7802 Bottled 2017 For MGM Macau 2020 Exceptional Cask
description: The 11th cask selected by Macallan master distiller Bob Dalgarno as part of the esteemed Exceptional Casks collection from the Speyside giant. Cask #7802 was distilled on the 18th of May 2005 and bottled after 12 years of maturation in a European oak ex-sherry butt. Bottled at a cask strength of 63.4% Abv this cask was chosen especially for MGM Macau 2020 Chinese new year and had just 552 bottles produced.
baxus_class_name: Macallan 2005 Single Butt #7802 Bottled 2017 For MGM Macau 2020 Exceptional Cask

name: Old Overholt 6 Year
description: Old Overholt, said to be America's oldest continually maintained brand of whiskey, was founded in West Overton, Pennsylvania, in 1810.

name: Glenfarclas 1959 Single Cask #1838 Bottled 2009
description: A huge mature expression from Glenfarclas distilled in 1959 and left to mature for approximately 50 years! This 1959 era cask was produced whilst Glenfarclas had just two small stills and used malted barley from their own malt floors. Bottled in 2009 as part of the Family Casks series at 48.8% Abv.

name: Talisker Distillers Edition - 2009
description:
Talisker Distillers Edition Double Matured Single Malt Whisky is a distinguished expression crafted by one of Scotland's most renowned distilleries, Talisker, situated on the rugged Isle of Skye. This exceptional whisky exemplifies the mastery of traditional distillation techniques and the artistry of maturation.

At its core, Talisker Distillers Edition begins with the distinct character of Talisker's signature single malt whisky, known for its robust maritime influence and complex flavor profile. The whisky is crafted using malted barley, water sourced from the springs of Hawk Hill, and traditional copper pot stills that impart depth and character to the spirit.

What sets the Distillers Edition apart is its unique double maturation process. After the initial aging in American oak barrels, the whisky undergoes a secondary maturation in carefully selected Amoroso sherry casks. This additional period of aging allows the whisky to absorb the rich, sweet flavors of the sherry wood, enhancing its complexity and adding layers of depth to the final product.

The result is a whisky of remarkable balance and sophistication. On the nose, the Talisker Distillers Edition greets the senses with a captivating blend of smoky peat, maritime brine, and hints of dried fruits and spices. The palate is rich and full-bodied, with flavors of dark chocolate, caramelized nuts, and a subtle sweetness from the sherry influence. The finish is long and warming, with lingering notes of oak, pepper, and sea salt.

Talisker Distillers Edition Double Matured Single Malt Whisky embodies the spirit of its island home, capturing the rugged beauty and untamed nature of the Isle of Skye in every sip. It is a whisky to be savored and appreciated, enjoyed by enthusiasts and connoisseurs alike for its complexity, depth, and timeless appeal.

name: Fettercairn 1978 30 Year
description: A 1978 vintage small batch expression from Fettercairn matured for 30 years. Bottled at 43.3% Abv just 3000 bottles of this release were produced.

name: SMWS 4.217 Highland Park 1995 19 Year
description: A 1995 vintage single cask expression of Highland Park matured for 19 years in a refill bourbon hogshead. It was bottled at 53.9% Abv by the Scotch Malt Whisky Society.

name: Glen Mhor 1965 50 Year Single Butt #3934 Signatory Vintage
description: An absolutely huge age statement of the closed Scottish distillery Glen Mhor! Distilled in 1965, this single cask was matured in a refill sherry butt before being finished for 88 months in an Oloroso sherry cask. Bottled in 2016 at 47.1% Abv by Signatory Vintage. Glen Mhor was a highly praised Highland distillery in Inverness and was a core malt in the Mackinlay's blend for much of the 20th century. The distillery sadly closed in 1983 amid the Scotch whisky downturn, with the buildings demolished in 1986.
baxus_class_name: Glen Mhor 1965 50 Year Single Butt #3934 Signatory Vintage

name: Old Fitzgerald 1956 10 Year Bottled In Bond
description: A 1956 vintage expression of Old Fitzgerald produced by Pappy Van Winkle himself at the Stitzel-Weller distillery. This Very Xtra Old bourbon was matured for 10 years and bottled in bond at 50% Abv in 1966.
baxus_class_name: Old Fitzgerald 1956 10 Year Bottled In Bond

name: Macallan 30 Year Old Sherry Oak Pre-2018 Bottling
description: An older presentation version of Macallan’s grand aged 30 year old sherry oak release. Bottled before 2018 this three decade old single malt was exclusively matured in sherry seasoned oak casks. This presentation of the 30 year old was first launched in 2012 and was discontinued in 2018 for an updated design. Presented in a wooden box this era featured whisky tints, an innovation from Macallan whisky maker Bob Dalgarno which highlighted the natural dark colour of the sherry matured spirit.
baxus_class_name: Macallan 30 Year Old Sherry Oak Pre-2018 Bottling

name: Old McBrayer 1917 Bottled In Bond 1933
description: A 1917 vintage expression of Old McBrayer whiskey bottled in 1933 by American Medicinal Spirits Company from barrels sourced from the Fern Cliff Distillery. Also known as the Joseph S. Schwab Jr distillery it was closed at the beginning of prohibition and barrels moved to the AMS warehouses for bottling as medicinal whiskey.

name: Glenmorangie 1991 Grand Vintage Bottled 2018
description: This expression was distilled in 1991 and aged for roughly 27 years before being bottled at 43% Abv. This edition of the grand vintage series is crafted from two vattings of 1991 spirit. Both were matured in bourbon casks, with one batch finished in Oloroso sherry casks for 10 years and the other batch finished in bordeaux red wine casks. They were then vatted together and bottled in 2018.

name: Willett 10 Year Single Barrel Rye #2368 For Cerbaco 2023
description: A 10 year old expression of Kentucky rye whiskey from Willett. Bottled at 57.9% Abv it was chosen exclusively for the Australian importer of Willett, Cerbaco in 2023.
baxus_class_name: Willett 10 Year Single Barrel Rye #2368 For Cerbaco 2023

name: I.W. Harper 1955 Bottled 1960 Bottled In Bond
description: A 1955 vintage bottled in bond decanter from I.W. Harper produced at the Bernheim distillery in Lousville. Bottled in 1960 at 100 proof this old school bottling was produced under the ownership of Schenley.
baxus_class_name: I.W. Harper 1955 Bottled 1960 Bottled In Bond

name: Willett 10 Year Single Barrel Bourbon #2026 For Cerbaco 2023
description: A 10 year old expression of Kentucky bourbon from Willett. Bottled at 63.6% Abv it was chosen exclusively for the Australian importer of Willett, Cerbaco in 2023.
baxus_class_name: Willett 10 Year Single Barrel Bourbon #2026 For Cerbaco 2023

name: Glenmorangie 1989 Grand Vintage Bottled 2017
description: This expression was distilled in 1989 and aged for roughly 27 years before being bottled at 43% Abv. This edition of the grand vintage series is finished in Côte-Rôtie wine casks.

name: Karuizawa 33 Year Single Cask #8908 Emerald Geisha
description: A 33-year-old Karuizawa single malt  matured in a single sherry cask for more than three decades before being bottled by Elixir Distillers exclusively for The Whisky Exchange's Karuizawa Geishas series. The bottle features a label designed by creative director Raj Chavda  paying homage to the exquisite  inaccessible beauty of the meiko on her way to become geisha.
baxus_class_name: Karuizawa 33 Year Single Cask #8908 Emerald Geisha

name: Springbank 1964 34 Year Old Single Cask Cadenhead’s
description: A hyper legendary release of Springbank distilled in 1964 and matured for 34 years in sherry wood. Bottled in 1998 at 52.2% Abv this cask was chosen by Cadenhead’s and was drawn from the private stocks of their chairman. 1960s era Springbanks are amongst the distillery’s most sought after and this vintage especially has produced some mythical offerings including the local barley series.
baxus_class_name: Springbank 1964 34 Year Old Single Cask Cadenhead’s

name: Game of Thrones Clynelish House Tyrell - 2019
description: House Tyrell of Highgarden, rulers of the Reach, are used to lush green scenery, echoed in the green pastures and rolling hills surrounding Clynelish Distillery. A House known best for their wealth and their emblem – the golden rose – the Tyrells are a proud and noble family, and like the golden rose are hiding thorns beneath their petals. Clynelish Reserve has a sweet and fruity flavor, with a spicy undercurrent, just enough to prove it still has bite. Made with water said to come from Clynemilton burn where the water runs over veins of gold in the rock, this single malt is light and floral like Highgarden, but should not be underestimated as it still holds a strong Highland character.  This light-gold Scotch initially offers fresh fruit flavours - such as mango and pineapple - before slipping into rich, sweet vanilla notes. It finishes with sweet, maritime notes that mingle with the light floral flavours which warm and build throughout, leaving the signature sweet Clynelish waxiness behind.
baxus_class_name: Game of Thrones Clynelish House Tyrell - 2019

name: SMWS 4.145 Highland Park 1989 21 Year
description: A 1989 vintage single cask expression of Highland Park matured for 21 years in a refill bourbon hogshead. It was bottled at 52% Abv by the Scotch Malt Whisky Society.

name: Littlemill 1988 26 Year Single Hogshead Hunter Laing
description: Distilled in November 1988, this single malt from Littlemill was filled into a single refill hogshead, where it spent the next 26 years. In March 2015, the cask was opened by independent bottler Hunter Laing, releasing just 75 bottles for its Old & Rare Platinum collection.
baxus_class_name: Littlemill 1988 26 Year Single Hogshead Hunter Laing

name: Ben Nevis 2013 6 Year Single Butt #1278 Single Cask Nation
description: A 2013 vintage single cask expression of the Highland distillery Ben Nevis. Matured for 6 years in a 1st fill Amontillado sherry cask it was bottled in 2020 at a huge 67.6% Abv by Single Cask Nation.
baxus_class_name: Ben Nevis 2013 6 Year Single Butt #1278 Single Cask Nation

name: Mackmyra 2008 13 Year Single Hogshead #11876 Single Cask Nation
description: A 2008 vintage single cask expression of Swedish whisky from Mackmyra. Matured for 13 years in a virgin oak hogshead it was bottled at 47.4% Abv by Single Cask Nation.
baxus_class_name: Mackmyra 2008 13 Year Single Hogshead #11876 Single Cask Nation

name: Glendronach Allardice 18 year - 2022
description:
Founded in 1826 by James Allardice, the Glendronach distillery has a storied history, including a rebuild after a fire in 1852 and ownership by Scotland's renowned distilling dynasty, the Grants of Glenfiddich. The distillery was mothballed in 1996 but was revived in 2002, becoming one of the strongest single malt brands globally. 

The Glendronach 18 Years Old Allardice is a tribute to the distillery's founder, James Allardice. This exceptional single malt whisky has been matured for 18 years in the finest Spanish Oloroso sherry casks, offering a rich and unforgettable experience. Bottled at 46%, this whisky is a natural in color and non-chill filtered, preserving its authentic flavors and aromas. 

The Allardice expression was first introduced in 2009 and has since become a heavily-sherried signature of the Glendronach distillery. While older versions may have contained much older whisky due to the distillery's brief closure in 1996, the 2022 release does not have the gentle peat influence found in pre-1996 distillations. 

Limited to 1 per customer, this whisky is a collector's item and a must-have for any aficionado of rich, sherried malts. Whether you're a seasoned whisky enthusiast or a newcomer, the Glendronach 18 Years Old Allardice 2022 Release offers a luxurious and deeply satisfying experience.

name: Caol Ila 1983 30 Year Cask Strength
description: A stunning 1983 vintage Caol Ila released at 30 years of age as part of Diageo's 2014 Special Releases. Aged in a combination of refill American and refill European oak.

name: Ben Holladay 6 Year Bottled-in-Bond - 2022
description:
Rooted in time-honored methods, this bourbon is produced using original two-grain cooker system, maintaining consistent distillation proofs and barrel entry proof to preserve its distinctive character.

Handcrafted with care, each batch of Ben Holladay Bourbon is a testament to dedication to quality. Monthly, the master distiller selects barrels from different floors of two seven-story rickhouses, carefully blending them to meet stringent flavor profile criteria.

Primarily sourced from barrels aged on the fifth floor of Warehouse C, the largest rickhouse on-site, approximately 80% of the very first batch embodies the essence of this storied location. The remaining 20% hails from barrels on the first floor of the same rickhouse.

Embracing the unique aging conditions of each floor, subsequent batches of Ben Holladay Bourbon feature varying ratios, reflecting the diverse flavors imparted by temperature variations and humidity levels. From the cooler, more humid conditions of the first floor to the warmer, drier atmospheres of the higher floors, each barrel contributes distinct nuances to the final blend.

To honor the individuality of each batch, the Ben Holladay Bourbon label showcases a blending chart, guiding consumers through the intricate blending process and enabling them to discern the unique characteristics of each expression. Experience the artistry and tradition of Ben Holladay Bourbon—a true embodiment of quality and craftsmanship.

name: Glen Scotia 2016 6 Year Single Cask #21/769-4 For Drammers Club
description: A 2016 vintage single cask expression of Glen Scotia matured for 6 years in a 1st fill Oloroso hogshead. It was bottled at 56.5% Abv for the Drammers Club.
baxus_class_name: Glen Scotia 2016 6 Year Single Cask #21/769-4 For Drammers Club

name: Ardbeg 1990 Airigh Nam Beist 2008 Bottling
description: Airigh Nam Beist 1990 is a delicious vintage bottling from the ongoing success story that is Ardbeg. Sadly now discontinued due to exhausted stocks, 'the Beist' was an extremely popular Ardbeg, with assertive and powerful peatiness and a lovely honeyed edge. Oh, and it's pronounced 'Arry nam Baysht'.

name: High West Yippee Ki-Yay - 2017
description: High West Yippee Ki-Yay Barrel Aged Rye Whiskey is double rye whiskey aged in two different types of wine barrels, creating an all-natural sipping whiskey with just the right amount of sweetness.

name: Hard Truth High Road Rye Sweet Mash 3 year - 2023
description:
Founded in 2015, Hard Truth Distilling Co. has quickly become a name to reckon with in the spirits industry. The distillery recently underwent a major expansion, including the construction of its second rackhouse, tripling its storage capacity from 4,000 to 12,000 barrels. Their campus spans 325 wooded acres in Brown County, Indiana, making it a must-visit destination for spirit enthusiasts.

This is the High Road Sweet Mash Rye, a groundbreaking rye whiskey that is setting the stage for a sweet mash rye revolution. Crafted by Indiana-based Hard Truth Distilling Co., this expression is developed to offer rye whiskey enthusiasts a chance to explore the intricate flavors, nuances, and subtleties of the sweet mash rye distilling process.

Whether you're a rye aficionado or new to the world of whiskey, Hard Truth High Road Sweet Mash Rye offers a unique and delicious experience that is both distinctive and revolutionary.
baxus_class_name: Hard Truth High Road Rye Sweet Mash 3 year - 2023

name: Willett 10 Year Single Barrel Bourbon #1050 For Cerbaco 2023
description: A 10 year old expression of Kentucky bourbon from Willett. Bottled at 53.4% Abv it was chosen exclusively for the Australian importer of Willett, Cerbaco in 2023.
baxus_class_name: Willett 10 Year Single Barrel Bourbon #1050 For Cerbaco 2023

name: Ardbeg Supernova Stellar Release
description: A 2009 special edition from Ardbeg peated to their highest level ever of 100ppm! No age was given but rumours suggested this spirit was in the range of 5 years old. This 2009 first edition was bottled at 58.9% and was so popular it was repeated for the Ardbeg committee in later years.

name: Glenfarclas 40 Year
description: A much adored expression here - 40 year old single malt Scotch whisky from the legendary Glenfarclas, offering up generous helpings of Sherried notes that the distillery are famous for. Bottled at 43% ABV, and presented alongside a handsome box reminiscent of the iconic doors of Glenfarclas' warehouse.

name: Rare Character 16 Year Exceptional Series - 2024
description:
The Rare Character's Exceptional Series Kentucky Straight Malt Whiskey embodies the brand's fundamental commitment to providing the most distinguished and superior quality spirits. Departing from the customization and innovation of the Single Barrel Series, this collection signifies a shift towards meticulous curation and the pursuit of exceptional whiskey.

Distinguished not only by their flavor profiles but also by their age and limited availability, the whiskeys within this series stand apart from other offerings. Each bottle within The Exceptional Series serves as a testament to rarity, boasting a minimum age of 9 years and epitomizing the essence of Rare Character. This series pays homage to the craft of whiskey-making, offering aficionados an opportunity to indulge in a product that is scarce, aged to perfection, and unmatched in quality.

name: Ardbeg Galileo
description: A 1999 distillation of Ardbeg matured in American oak casks for 12-13 years before being finished in marsala wine casks. It was bottled at 49% Abv to celebrate Ardbeg sending whisky to mature in space, aiming to find out how it might impact the spirit.

name: Hard Truth Mash Bill 1 2 year- 2022
description: Hard Truth Sweet Mash Rye Whiskey is Hard Truth’s debut sweet mash whiskey, a culmination of years of careful planning and precise crafting. The result is a complex, pleasant, quality rye that we’re excited to share with the world. Sweet mash is the distilling process in which each batch of whiskey begins with entirely fresh ingredients. Mash bill one features 94 percent rye and 6 percent malted barley.

name: Lagavulin 10 Year
description: A 10 year old expression of Lagavulin bottled exclusively for duty free at 43% Abv.

name: Wild Turkey Brown Label 1991 Bottling
description: An older expression of Wild Turkey's 80 proof brown label bottled in 1991. This era of Wild Turkey is highly praised amongst enthusiasts, with the distillery still utilising Cypress wood fermenters and a lower barrel entry proof of 107. This combination is suggested to be the reason behind the old Wild Turkey "funk" and is the driving force behind vintage Turkey bottlings being so desired.

name: Wild Turkey Brown Label 1991 Bottling
description: An older expression of Wild Turkey's 80 proof brown label bottled in 1991. This era of Wild Turkey is highly praised amongst enthusiasts, with the distillery still utilising Cypress wood fermenters and a lower barrel entry proof of 107. This combination is suggested to be the reason behind the old Wild Turkey "funk" and is the driving force behind vintage Turkey bottlings being so desired.

name: Blackened X Willett Masters of Whiskey
description: The Blackened X Willett Masters of Whiskey Series Rye Whiskey Finished in Madeira Casks is a limited edition release that represents a bold collaboration between two renowned whiskey makers. This expression is the inaugural release in the BLACKENED's Master of Whiskey series, showcasing the talents of BLACKENED Master Distiller & Blender Rob Dietrich and Willett Distillery's Master Distiller Drew Kulsveen. The whiskey is a blend of high rye and low rye mashbills from Willett, aged for an average of 6.5 years, with some barrels as old as 8 years. After aging, the whiskey is finished in Madeira casks for 14 weeks and subjected to BLACKENED's proprietary Black Noise process, which uses low hertz frequencies from Metallica's music to vibrate the barrels, enhancing the interaction between the whiskey and the wood. The result is a whiskey with a deep amber color and a rich, complex flavor profile that includes notes of red raspberries, strawberry, mint, charred oak, brown sugar, and a hint of grape, leading to a finish with rhubarb, fig, plum, and spice. Bottled at 109.6 proof, this whiskey is a testament to the art of collaboration and innovation in the whiskey-making process.
baxus_class_name: Blackened X Willett Masters of Whiskey

name: Hard Truth Mash Bill 1 2 year - 2021
description: Hard Truth Sweet Mash Rye Whiskey is Hard Truth’s debut sweet mash whiskey, a culmination of years of careful planning and precise crafting. The result is a complex, pleasant, quality rye that we’re excited to share with the world. Sweet mash is the distilling process in which each batch of whiskey begins with entirely fresh ingredients. Mash bill one features 94 percent rye and 6 percent malted barley.

name: Glenfarclas 30 Year
description: Superb single malt from the Glenfarclas distillery, aged for 30 years. Three decades of maturation have resulted in a fantastically full-bodied, satisfyingly Sherried and all-around awesome flavour profile. Now presented with a box designed as an homage to the unmistakable red door of the Glenfarclas warehouse.

name: Pappy Van Winkle 15 Year Family Reserve 2019 Bottling
description: A 15 year old expression of wheated bourbon carefully chosen by Julian Van Winkle, the grandson of the original Pappy Van Winkle. Early Van Winkle offerings were crafted from barrels sourced from the legendary closed Stitzel-Weller distillery, but in 2002 Julian struck a deal with Buffalo Trace to use their wheated bourbon once his stored barrels ran empty. This 2019 bottling will have been crafted from Buffalo Trace's wheated bourbon mashbill and carefully blended by Julian Van Winkle.
baxus_class_name: Pappy Van Winkle 15 Year Family Reserve 2019 Bottling

name: Jameson Caskmates Kelso - 2016
description: Jameson Irish Whiskey’s passion for craft, quality and neighborhood collaboration continues with the release of this one-of-a-kind limited edition whiskey. Jameson Caskmates™ KelSo Pale Ale Edition was born from a collaboration between the world’s best selling Irish whiskey and Brooklyn microbrewer KelSo Beer Co.

name: SMWS 125.56 Glenmorangie 2003 8 Year Old
description: A 2003 vintage single cask expression of Glenmorangie matured for 8 years in 1 st fill bourbon barrel. It was bottled at 60.8% Abv by the Scotch Malt Whisky Society.

name: Very Olde St. Nick 19 Year BELIEVE
description: An extremely rare release from the illustrious Very Olde St. Nick brand, the "BELIEVE" series is a wholly unique bourbon, aged for 19 years in their "Antique Cask." Featuring a beautiful red wax top and bottled at 61% ABV, this is a serious bourbon for serious connoisseurs.
baxus_class_name: Very Olde St. Nick 19 Year BELIEVE

name: Garrison Brothers 8 year Laguna Madre 3rd Edition- 2023
