description: From The Producer: It is our great pleasure to introduce you to Garrison Brothers Laguna Madre, straight bourbon seasoned in rare Limousin oak casks. These French barrels are true works of art – highly sought-after, allocated, and incredibly expensive to boot Toasting this majestic oak activates unforgettable flavors of woody vanilla, sweet candy cacao and thick, white chocolate that you won’t soon forget.  The creamy finish of this bourbon is both sensuous and aromatic, like the endorphin-fueled natural high one feels in one’s soul while spending a beautiful day away from all the daily stresses life has to offer … perhaps under early afternoon sunlight, on the first day of spring, when the Laguna Madre shines forth like an azure band of aquamarine beckoning all to come out and play.  LAGUNA MADRE TASTING NOTES Intense A&W Root Beer meets Dublin Dr. Pepper. Vanilla bean. Hazelnut. Saltwater taffy. Hershey’s Kisses. Frosty white chocolate and “Adults only” Almond Joy candy bar finish. 101 proof.
baxus_class_name: Garrison Brothers 8 year Laguna Madre 3rd Edition- 2023

name: Ardbeg Supernova SN2010
description: The 2010 edition of Ardbeg's Supernova series. This second release follows the hugely popular 2009 Supernova Stellar release and is bottled at 60.1% Abv.

name: W.L. Weller Special Reserve 7 Year Mini
baxus_class_name: W.L. Weller Special Reserve 7 Year Mini

name: Hard Truth Malted Rye Mash Bill 6 2 year - 2022
description:
Hard Truth Master Distiller’s Reserve Malted Rye Sweet Mash Rye Whiskey (RW-6) is a remarkable expression of 100 percent rye whiskey, showcasing the incredible depth and richness that can only come from the malting process.

This, and the other two whiskeys in the 2022 Hard Truth Master Distiller’s Reserve collection, are the first of an extremely limited, annual release of sweet mash whiskeys that have been handcrafted, aged, custom-blended, and bottled by the distillers at Hard Truth.
baxus_class_name: Hard Truth Malted Rye Mash Bill 6 2 year - 2022

name: Garrison Brothers 8 year Laguna Madre 2nd Edition - 2022
description: From The Producer: It is our great pleasure to introduce you to Garrison Brothers Laguna Madre, straight bourbon seasoned in rare Limousin oak casks. These French barrels are true works of art – highly sought-after, allocated, and incredibly expensive to boot Toasting this majestic oak activates unforgettable flavors of woody vanilla, sweet candy cacao and thick, white chocolate that you won’t soon forget.  The creamy finish of this bourbon is both sensuous and aromatic, like the endorphin-fueled natural high one feels in one’s soul while spending a beautiful day away from all the daily stresses life has to offer … perhaps under early afternoon sunlight, on the first day of spring, when the Laguna Madre shines forth like an azure band of aquamarine beckoning all to come out and play.  LAGUNA MADRE TASTING NOTES Intense A&W Root Beer meets Dublin Dr. Pepper. Vanilla bean. Hazelnut. Saltwater taffy. Hershey’s Kisses. Frosty white chocolate and “Adults only” Almond Joy candy bar finish. 101 proof.

name: SMWS 4.211 Highland Park 1991 24 Year
description: A 1991 vintage single cask expression of Highland Park matured for 24 years in a refill bourbon hogshead. It was bottled by the Scotch Malt Whisky Society at 52.2% Abv.

name: Glenglassaugh 1978 35 Year Single Hogshead #1810
description: Stored over 35 years, finished in a former Port wine barrel, this Glenglassaugh was bottled in February 2014 to 279 bottles. The barrel was chosen by Master Distiller Billy Walker, the bottles are individually numbered and packed in elaborate gift boxes - including tasting notes.

name: Jameson 12 year Special Reserve
description: medium-long, soft finish; medium-long aftertaste with oak aroma. spicy oak, clear sherry note, delicate vanilla

name: Wilderness Trail Single Barrel Bourbon
description:
Wilderness Trail Single Barrel Bourbon is a premium Kentucky straight bourbon whiskey that showcases the distillery's commitment to quality and innovation. This expression is bottled at cask strength, typically ranging from 56-58% ABV, offering a bold and intense drinking experience.

On the nose, Wilderness Trail Single Barrel Bourbon presents rich aromas of caramel, vanilla, and toasted oak, with hints of dried fruit and baking spices. The palate delivers a full-bodied and complex flavor profile, featuring a harmonious blend of sweet and spicy notes. Common flavors include honey, toffee, cinnamon, and dark chocolate, balanced by charred oak and a touch of rye spice. The finish is long and warming, with lingering notes of caramel, oak, and spice.

Each bottle is hand-selected from individual barrels, ensuring a unique tasting experience that can vary slightly from barrel to barrel. The bourbon is typically aged for 4 to 5 years, allowing it to develop depth and character while retaining some youthful vibrancy. Wilderness Trail's use of sweet mash fermentation and a lower barrel entry proof contributes to the bourbon's distinctive flavor profile.

Wilderness Trail Single Barrel Bourbon is highly regarded among bourbon enthusiasts for its quality and complexity. Whether enjoyed neat, on the rocks, or in a classic cocktail, this bourbon offers a premium and satisfying experience that reflects the distillery's dedication to craftsmanship and innovation in whiskey-making.

name: Hunter Laing Port Ellen 33 Year - 2016
description: A stunning rare bottle from the silent Port Ellen Distillery. Released as part of Hunter Laing's Old and Rare Series, the expression was distilled in March 1983 and spent 33 years maturing in a single sherry butt. Just 174 bottles of this impressive expression have been produced.

name: Pappy Van Winkle 15 Year Family Reserve 2020 Bottling
description: A 15 year old expression of wheated bourbon carefully chosen by Julian Van Winkle, the grandson of the original Pappy Van Winkle. Early Van Winkle offerings were crafted from barrels sourced from the legendary closed Stitzel-Weller distillery, but in 2002 Julian struck a deal with Buffalo Trace to use their wheated bourbon once his stored barrels ran empty. This 2020 bottling will have been crafted from Buffalo Trace's wheated bourbon mashbill and carefully blended by Julian and his son Preston Van Winkle.
baxus_class_name: Pappy Van Winkle 15 Year Family Reserve 2020 Bottling

name: Old Crow Mini
description:
Old Crow is a historic bourbon brand with roots dating back to the 1830s, when Scottish immigrant Dr. James C. Crow began distilling whiskey in Kentucky. Known for his scientific approach to whiskey-making, particularly in refining the sour mash process, Dr. Crow's bourbon gained a reputation for exceptional quality and consistency.

In its heyday during the late 19th and early-to-mid 20th centuries, Old Crow was considered a premium bourbon, favored by notable figures including Ulysses S. Grant and Mark Twain. The brand reached its peak under National Distillers' ownership, becoming America's best-selling bourbon by the mid-20th century.

Antique versions of Old Crow, particularly those produced before the 1960s, are highly prized by collectors and enthusiasts. These older expressions are noted for their rich, complex flavor profiles, often described as having notes of dried fruits, leather, and well-integrated oak. The brand's decline began in the 1960s due to changes in production methods, but vintage bottles from earlier eras remain sought after for their representation of classic Kentucky bourbon craftsmanship[1][3][4].

name: The Glen Grant Devotion 70 Year Bottle 4/7
description: The Glen Grant Devotion 70-Year-Old Single Malt whisky is a remarkable release from The Glen Grant distillery, with only seven decanters created in total. Decanter 4/7 highlights the Clematis flower, inspired by its presence in the gardens of Buckingham Palace and Windsor Castle, which have been home to the British royal family for over 1,000 years. This exceptional whisky was distilled in 1953 and matured for 70 years in a single Oloroso Sherry-seasoned French oak butt at the distillery in Rothes, Scotland. The Devotion series pays tribute to Queen Elizabeth II's 70-year reign and her devotion to nature, a passion shared by The Glen Grant's founder James 'The Major' Grant. Each decanter is hand-blown and features seven facets, representing the seven decades of maturation, making it a true collector's item and a testament to the distillery's craftsmanship and heritage.  Sources
baxus_class_name: The Glen Grant Devotion 70 Year Bottle 4/7

name: Blanton's Gold 2016 Bottling
description: The world’s first single barrel bourbon was created in 1984 by Elmer T. Lee. Named after former distillery president Colonel Albert B. Blanton. Elmer recalled how Colonel Blanton would sometimes handpick a ‘honey barrel’ from the center of Warehouse H to enjoy with others. Many years later, the Blanton’s brand was created. Today, Blanton’s Single Barrel has become one of the most revered and award-winning bourbons on the market. The Gold Edition was the second version created, after the Original 93 proof. This 103 proof Blanton’s Gold is very limited, but a favorite among discerning bourbon aficionados.

name: Hard Truth Chocolate Malt Mash Bill 3 2 year - 2022
description:
Hard Truth Master Distiller’s Reserve Chocolate Malt Sweet Mash Rye Whiskey (RW-3) brings the deep, roasted chocolate espresso notes from chocolate malted barley to play with the sweetness of corn and the nice baking spice of rye grain.

This, and the other two whiskeys in the 2022 Hard Truth Master Distiller’s Reserve collection, are the first of an extremely limited, annual release of sweet mash whiskeys that have been handcrafted, aged, custom-blended, and bottled by the distillers at Hard Truth.
baxus_class_name: Hard Truth Chocolate Malt Mash Bill 3 2 year - 2022

name: Heaven’s Door 18 Year Old Bourbon The Bootleg Series Volume 5
description: A 2023 special release from Heaven’s Door as part of their signature The Bootleg Series. This edition sees a rare 18 year old bourbon finished in Spanish vermouth rouge casks.
baxus_class_name: Heaven’s Door 18 Year Old Bourbon The Bootleg Series Volume 5

name: Augusta 8 Year Single Barrel #12 Old Route 8
description:
Perched on the limestone banks of the quaint Kentucky river town of Augusta, the Augusta Distillery is a beacon of tradition and craftsmanship. With its strategic location along the Ohio River, Augusta serves as a vital link connecting historic river towns to bustling cities. The distillery's dedication to quality and heritage is evident in every bottle, capturing the very essence of Kentucky's bourbon culture.

Take the off ramp and wander along the very river banks where bourbon whiskey first flowed. Old Route 8 invites you to slow down and explore. This exceptional 8-year, cask strength; single barrel bourbon has been crafted in the true Kentucky tradition and patiently matured to offer an elevated experience that can be enjoyed every day. 

Color & Nose - Graham crackers, vanilla, and salted caramel greet you as you approach, suggesting that this is a true Kentucky Bourbon. These early notes give way to undertones of cedar and oak foreshadowing that this bourbon has come of age. 

Palate - The hints of flavor and complexity created upon nosing are reinforced on the palate.  Flavors of brown sugar, vanilla, and a dash of oak are balanced and revealed in smooth, cascading layers that only time and great liquid can deliver. 

Finsih - Long, smooth and lingering, the finish extends the joy of this pour, delivering a classic “Kentucky hug.” Oak, baking spices, with a touch of sweetness are reminders that this is a traditional straight Kentucky bourbon that deserves further exploration.
baxus_class_name: Augusta 8 Year Single Barrel #12 Old Route 8

name: Blackout 15 Year Single Barrel #5 American Straight Whiskey
description: A 15 year old single barrel expression of American whiskey distilled in Indiana. Bottled at 68.2% Abv by Blackout.
baxus_class_name: Blackout 15 Year Single Barrel #5 American Straight Whiskey

name: Blanton's Gold 1997 Bottling
description: Buffalo Trace Distillery, situated along the banks of the Kentucky River, is one of America's oldest and most renowned distilleries. With a rich history dating back to 1775, Buffalo Trace has been producing exceptional bourbon whiskey for over two centuries. The distillery is known for its commitment to heritage, craftsmanship, and innovation, consistently producing award-winning bourbons under the guidance of Master Distiller Harlen Wheatley.  Blanton's is a distinguished brand within the Buffalo Trace Distillery portfolio, revered for its exceptional single barrel bourbons. Each bottle of Blanton's represents a pinnacle of craftsmanship and quality, showcasing rich and complex flavors derived from carefully selected mash bills and aging processes. Blanton's is known for its signature horse and jockey stoppers, which denote individual barrels and add a unique touch of luxury to this esteemed bourbon brand.   Blanton's Gold is a prestigious expression from the Blanton's Single Barrel Bourbon range, renowned for its exceptional quality and distinctive character. Bottled at a robust 51.5% ABV, this bourbon showcases rich flavors of caramel, vanilla, and oak, complemented by hints of spice and honey. Each bottle of Blanton's Gold is drawn from a single barrel, ensuring unique variations in flavor and complexity. This expression embodies the epitome of craftsmanship and attention to detail, making it a coveted choice among bourbon enthusiasts worldwide.

name: Johnnie Walker Blue Label Toronto
description: Johnnie Walker's most prestigious whisky. Probably THE most famous super-premium blend, made up of the finest old-aged malt and grain whiskies.  This edition was exclusively produced for Toronto.

name: J.Mattingly Old Baldy Blended Whiskey Batch 2 - Signed Bottle
description: The second edition of Old Baldy, a special blend of barrels from J.Mattingly. This release’s blend consists of 60% 11 year old whiskey, 30% 8 year old whiskey and 10% 4 year old whiskey. The spirits were distilled in both Indiana and Kentucky before being bottled in 2018 at 56% Abv.
baxus_class_name: J.Mattingly Old Baldy Blended Whiskey Batch 2 - Signed Bottle

name: Hard Truth Caramel Malt Mash Bill 4 2 year - 2022
description:
Hard Truth Master Distiller’s Reserve Caramel Malt Sweet Mash Rye Whiskey (RW-4) brings the caramel corn and sticky toffee notes of caramel malted barley to match with the whiskey’s inherent sweetness and rye spice.

This, and the other two whiskeys in the 2022 Hard Truth Master Distiller’s Reserve collection, are the first of an extremely limited, annual release of sweet mash whiskeys that have been handcrafted, aged, custom-blended, and bottled by the distillers at Hard Truth.
baxus_class_name: Hard Truth Caramel Malt Mash Bill 4 2 year - 2022

name: Wilderness Trail Small Batch Rye
description:
Wilderness Trail Small Batch Rye is a premium Kentucky straight rye whiskey that showcases the distillery's commitment to quality and innovation. 

The mashbill for this rye consists of 56% rye, 33% corn, and 11% malted barley, creating a balanced and flavorful profile. On the nose, it offers inviting aromas of butterscotch, maple, and orange peel, with a subtle hint of mint. The palate delivers a harmonious blend of flavors, including citrus notes, brown sugar, clove, and root beer. The finish is spicy and satisfying, featuring black pepper, pumpernickel bread, barrel spice, and oak, with lingering citrus notes.

Wilderness Trail's unique approach to whiskey-making, including their use of sweet mash fermentation and a lower barrel entry proof of around 100 proof, contributes to the rye's distinctive character. This results in a whiskey that requires less proofing down after aging, preserving more of its natural flavors.

name: Foursquare 2009 12 Year Exceptional Cask Selection
description: A blend of rums distilled in the copper double retort pot still and the continuous twin column still of Foursquare and aged for 12 years in ex-bourbon casks, this bottle is a truly unique one.

name: Thomas H Handy 6 Year - 2018
description: From the distiler: "Named after the New Orleans bartender who first used rye whiskey in the Sazerac Cocktail, this uncut and unfiltered Straight Rye Whiskey is bottled directly from the barrel, just as it was over a century ago. Full of rich flavors, this authentic American rye whiskey is a symbol of the timeless history of New Orleans and the legacy of Thomas H. Handy."

name: Glenlivet 21 Year Archive - 2020
description: The Glenlivet 21 Year Old Archive is a distinguished single malt Scotch whisky from the Glenlivet distillery, located in the Speyside region of Scotland. This expression is produced in small, bespoke batches, with each cask being individually nosed and approved, ensuring a unique and high-quality product. Aged for 21 years in a combination of hand-selected American oak and ex-sherry casks, the whisky boasts a rich and complex flavor profile. The nose features aromas of dried fruit with a sherry influence, while the palate offers notes of cinnamon, ginger, and a syrupy mouthfeel. The finish is long and warm, with a hint of toasted hazelnuts. The Glenlivet 21 Year Old Archive has garnered numerous awards, including Gold medals at the International Wine & Spirit Competition in 2005, 2006, and 2007, and is celebrated for its elegant and refined character.

name: Wilderness Trail Single Barrel Rye
description:
Wilderness Trail Single Barrel Rye is a premium Kentucky straight rye whiskey produced by Wilderness Trail Distillery, known for its meticulous craftsmanship and innovative use of sweet mash fermentation. Bottled at cask strength, this single barrel rye typically features an ABV around 55%, offering a bold and robust drinking experience.

On the nose, Wilderness Trail Single Barrel Rye presents inviting aromas of caramel, vanilla, and toasted oak, with hints of dried fruit and baking spices. The palate is rich and complex, delivering flavors of toffee, cinnamon, and dark chocolate, balanced by notes of charred oak and a touch of rye spice. The finish is long and warming, with lingering notes of caramel, oak, and spice.

This rye whiskey is aged for at least four years in new, charred oak barrels, allowing it to develop deep complexity and character. Each bottle is hand-labeled with its specific barrel number, ensuring a unique tasting experience that can vary slightly from barrel to barrel. The use of sweet mash fermentation, which starts each batch fresh, results in a cleaner and more consistent distillate, setting Wilderness Trail apart in the whiskey market.

Wilderness Trail Single Barrel Rye is celebrated for its exceptional quality and distinctive flavor profile, making it a favorite among rye whiskey enthusiasts. Whether enjoyed neat, on the rocks, or in a classic cocktail, this single barrel rye offers a premium and satisfying tasting experience that reflects the distillery's dedication to excellence and innovation in whiskey-making.

name: Michter's Limited Release 20 Year - 2019
description: Carefully aged to perfection for two decades, this bourbon showcases the artistry and dedication of Michter's distillers. Housed in a distinguished vessel, the bourbon's deep amber hue invites exploration. Upon opening, aromas of rich caramel, toasted oak, and warm spices gracefully emerge, tantalizing the senses with each inhalation. The first sip reveals a symphony of flavors, from velvety caramel and dark chocolate to hints of vanilla and dried fruits, all seamlessly intertwined with a lingering warmth. Michter's 20 Year Old Limited Release Bourbon is a testament to patience and precision, offering aficionados a rare and unforgettable tasting experience that transcends time.

name: Glendronach 1995 19 Year Cask Strength
description: Distilled in 1995 and aged for at least 19 years in Pedro Ximénez sherry casks, this Glendronach was bottled at a cask strength of 55.8% Abv.

name: Rare Perfection 15 Year Cask Strength
description: Rare Perfection 15 Year Cask Strength is a Canadian whisky that has garnered attention for its unique characteristics and mysterious background. Distilled in Canada and aged for a minimum of 15 years, this whisky is bottled at a potent 59.85% ABV, offering a rich and intense flavor profile. The whisky is made with a four-grain bourbon mash bill consisting of corn, rye, wheat, and malted barley, and it is matured in new charred oak barrels, which contribute to its complex tasting notes. The nose is described as dessert-forward with creamy vanilla pudding, toffee, maple syrup, and crème brûlée, while the palate shifts to spicier notes of rye, cloves, jalapeños, and ginger, followed by dark chocolate, burnt popcorn, and coffee grounds. The finish showcases some heat with tannic oak, wood shavings, cedar box, peppermint, and molasses.

name: Pappy Van Winkle 15 Year Family Reserve 2018 Bottling
description: A 15 year old expression of wheated bourbon carefully chosen by Julian Van Winkle, the grandson of the original Pappy Van Winkle. Early Van Winkle offerings were crafted from barrels sourced from the legendary closed Stitzel-Weller distillery, but in 2002 Julian struck a deal with Buffalo Trace to use their wheated bourbon once his stored barrels ran empty. This 2018 bottling will have been crafted from Buffalo Trace's wheated bourbon mashbill and carefully blended by Julian Van Winkle.
baxus_class_name: Pappy Van Winkle 15 Year Family Reserve 2018 Bottling

name: Wilderness Trail Small Batch Bourbon
description:
The Bottled in Bond version of Wilderness Trail Bourbon is a premium expression that adheres to the strict regulations of the Bottled in Bond Act of 1897. This Kentucky straight bourbon whiskey is distilled, aged, and bottled entirely at Wilderness Trail Distillery, showcasing their commitment to quality and transparency.

On the nose, this bourbon offers rich aromas of caramel, vanilla, and toasted oak, with hints of dried fruit and baking spices. The palate is full-bodied and complex, featuring flavors of toffee, cinnamon, and dark chocolate, balanced by notes of charred oak and a touch of rye spice. The finish is long and warming, with lingering notes of caramel, oak, and spice.
Wilderness Trail's Bottled in Bond Bourbon stands out for its exceptional quality and adherence to traditional bourbon-making standards. It offers whiskey enthusiasts a pure and unadulterated bourbon experience, true to the spirit of the Bottled in Bond designation. Whether enjoyed neat, on the rocks, or in classic cocktails, this bourbon delivers a bold and satisfying taste that reflects the distillery's commitment to craftsmanship and heritage.

name: SMWS 127.12 Port Charlotte 2002 8 Year
description: A 2002 vintage single cask expression of Port Charlotte, a heavily peated spirit produced at Bruichladdich. This cask was matured for 8 years in a refill bourbon barrel and bottled at 66.3% Abv by the Scotch Malt Whisky Society.

name: Sherwood Rye Spring 1897
description:
An exceptionally rare example of American Rye Whiskey, from the historic Sherwood Distillery in Maryland. The distillery operated from 1882 to 1919, when Prohibition took effect. 

The "Sherwood" moniker came from the nearby Sherwood Episcopal Church.

name: Russell's Reserve Private Barrel 2021
description: Russell's Reserve Private Barrel 2021 is a distinguished bourbon crafted by the Wild Turkey Distilling Co. Each barrel is meticulously selected by Master Distillers Eddie and Jimmy Russell, ensuring a unique and high-quality experience. Bottled at 110 proof, this single-barrel bourbon is non-chill filtered to preserve its rich flavors.

name: Green Spot 12 Year
description: Green Spot Single Pot Still Irish Whiskey is a celebrated expression from Mitchell & Son, a historic Irish wine and spirits company. This whiskey is triple distilled and matured in a combination of bourbon barrels, sherry butts, and Bordeaux wine casks, which imparts a rich and complex flavor profile. The bottle features a distinctive green label with the "Green Spot" logo prominently displayed, and the label details its unique maturation process and heritage. The whiskey itself is known for its vibrant amber color and offers a nose with hints of peppermint, malt, sweet barley, creamy vanilla, papaya, and citrus. On the palate, it is spicy and soft, with gentle bourbon oak, green woods, and menthol notes. The finish is creamy and long, with lingering vanilla. This single pot still whiskey is a testament to traditional Irish distillation methods, combining malted and unmalted barley for a unique and robust flavor.

name: SMWS 48.46 Balmenach 2001 12 Year
description: A 2001 vintage single cask expression of Balmenach matured for 12 years in a 1st fill barrel. It was bottled at 57.4% Abv by the Scotch Malt Whisky Society.

name: Michter's 10 Year Single Barrel Rye 2021 Bottling
description: A 2021 bottling of 10 year old rye bottled from a single barrel by Michter's. Prior to 2015 Michter's was contract producing its spirits at an undisclosed Brown-Forman distillery, rumoured to be Early Times/Old Forester. In 2015 the company established their full scale distillery in Shively, slowly transitioning to their own spirit. This 2021 bottling will have been crafted from spirit contract distilled by Michter's at the undisclosed Brown-Forman site.
baxus_class_name: Michter's 10 Year Single Barrel Rye 2021 Bottling

name: A Midwinter Night’s Dram Act 10 Scene 5 - 2022
description: "Are you sure That we are awake? It seems to me That yet we sleep, we dream." - Demetrius, A Midsummer Night's Dream, Act 4, Scene 1 - Wm. Shakespeare  Greetings good gentles and ladies. At High West, we consider whiskey an indispensable part of making it through the long cold winter. One taste of A Midwinter Night's Dram alongside a cozy fire will surely transport you to a dreamlike state. This limited release whiskey is a sumptuous marriage of our Rendezvous Rye finished in both port and French oak barrels. The rye forms a beautiful base of vanilla, caramel and cinnamon; the port barrels enhance with plums and dried fruits; the French oak provides a spice accent. For us, A Midwinter Night's Dram tastes like a proper Christmas plum pudding with lovely mulling spices, dried fruits, and crème anglaise.
baxus_class_name: A Midwinter Night’s Dram Act 10 Scene 5 - 2022

name: Glendronach 1993 26 Year Old Single Cask #7405 Whisky Exchange Anniversary
description: Distilled in 1993 this single cask expression of Highland whisky from Glendronach was matured for 26 years in a PX sherry puncheon. It was bottled in 2019 at 52.9% Abv exclusively for The Whisky Exchange to celebrate their 20th anniversary.
baxus_class_name: Glendronach 1993 26 Year Old Single Cask #7405 Whisky Exchange Anniversary

name: Blackout 16 Year Single Barrel #9 American Whiskey
description: A 16 year old expression of American whiskey distilled in Indiana bottled by Blackout. This single barrel offering was bottled at 68.6% Abv.
baxus_class_name: Blackout 16 Year Single Barrel #9 American Whiskey

name: Russell's Reserve 10 Year
description: A flagship bottle from Wild Turkey, Russell's Reserve 10 year old was first launched in 2001 as a 101 proof bourbon before becoming a 90 proof expression in 2005. The mashbill for Wild Turkey has long been a close trade secret passed down from Russell to Russell but rumours suggest a relatively low quantity of rye is used, approximately 11-13%. This 10 year old has been a staple of the Wild Turkey portfolio and was even joined by a higher proof single barrel version in 2013.

name: Russell's Reserve 13 Year Batch 1
description: First released in 2021. Russell's Reserve 13 year is a barrel proof expression hand crafted by the Russell family. Batch 1 was a high quality vatting of 135 barrels of 13 year old bourbon and 35 barrels of 19 year old bourbon. Bottled at a barrel proof of 57.4% Abv.

name: Balvenie 21 Year Madeira Cask - 2019
description: Nose: fruity and not too sweet. There’s honey, floral blossom, hints of apples and mirabelles. Creamy vanilla. Light leathery notes, touches of white pepper ginger. Whiffs of shoe polish. Little Madeira to be found, is that a good thing?  Mouth: still quite juicy but rather weak, now with more American oak, leading to cinnamon and ginger. A big malty core, some dark honey now and more of these leathery notes. Herbal tea towards the end.  Finish: medium long, with more woody notes. Some herbs and a touch of grapefruit, but less of the fruity side.

name: George Dickel Powderhorn - 1987
description: A Tennessee Sour Mash produced at Cascade Hollow distillery. Bottled in 1987 to celebrate the 110th anniversary of the George Dickel brand. The bottle is shaped like a Powderhorn, which were hollowed out cow or bull horns used to store gunpowder in. It is also a replica of the bottle used for the 1964 release which celebrated the re-opening of the Dickel distillery.

name: Balvenie 30 Year - 2020
description: Nose: Chocolate, Marzipan, apples, nutmeg and a good amount of smoke. Didn’t think it would be smoky since its not peated nor does it have the color like some of its predecessors do, but it was and had a nice hint of spices that really hit the nose hard.  Palate: Gingerbread Cookies, butter, dried fruits, toffee, oak spices and sweet apples and zesty oranges. It all comes together subtly and very smoothly. Almost has a hint of almonds and vanilla velvety smoothness on the tongue. Great mouthfeel.  Finish: Medium finish, with cranberry apples, and cinnamon spices. Refreshing and smooth.

name: Littlemill 1988 27 Year Single Hogshead Hunter Laing 1.5L
description: An Old & Rare bottling of Littlemill single malt Scotch whisky, distilled back in November 1988. It matured for 27 years before being bottled in May 2016 by Hunter Laing. Only 23 bottles were produced, giving us a glimpse of the whisky produced by this sadly closed distillery.
baxus_class_name: Littlemill 1988 27 Year Single Hogshead Hunter Laing 1.5L

name: Michter's 10 Year Single Barrel Bourbon 2023 Bottling
description: A 2023 bottling of 10 year old bourbon bottled from a single barrel by Michter's. Prior to 2015 Michter's was contract producing its spirits at an undisclosed Brown-Forman distillery, rumoured to be Early Times/Old Forester. In 2015 the company established their full scale distillery in Shively, slowly transitioning to their own spirit. This 2023 bottling will have been crafted from spirit contract distilled by Michter's at the undisclosed Brown-Forman site.
baxus_class_name: Michter's 10 Year Single Barrel Bourbon 2023 Bottling

name: O.K.I. Reserve Batch 01
description: A blended bourbon from O.K.I, a brand purchased in 2020. This medley of a blend is crafted from spirits exclusively produced in Indiana. 99% of the blend is over 8 years old, with most of the blend distilled between 2007-2009 and a small amount also distilled in 2014. Rye, light whiskey and bourbons are all included before being vatted together and bottled at 100 proof.

name: Rare Character Amburana Single Barrel Series - Selected by NYC_SPIRITS_GURU 6 year - 2023
description:
From the producer: “Rare Character Whiskey is a purveyor of fine American whiskey, focused on unique selections tailored to each of our customers and partners. Through special relationships with top distillers across the country, Rare Character has exclusive access to expressions that have never been released to the public.

With ambitious plans for future projects including new brands, special collaborations, novel barrel finishes, and more, Rare Character aspires to breathe life into the American whiskey category. Our dedication to innovation and evolution is driven by profound love and respect for incredible bourbons and ryes.

The Single Barrel Series is the flagship product line from Rare Character Whiskey—unique and rare American whiskey expressions from distilleries across the country. Each barrel is hand-selected by Pablo Moix, with only whiskeys of the utmost quality making the cut.”

Finished in Amburana casks, this American Rye Whiskey is sure to be a unique addition to any collection.
series: Single Barrel Series - Selected by NYC_SPIRITS_GURU
baxus_class_name: Rare Character Amburana Single Barrel Series - Selected by NYC_SPIRITS_GURU 6 year - 2023

name: Macallan 30 Year Sherry Oak 1990s
description:
Bottled in the late 1990s to early 2000s, this is a somewhat collectible edition of the Macallan 30 year aged in Sherry Oak. This particular iteration is the last version of the series before the advent of the esteemed Fine Oak range and the subsequent reimagining of Macallan's bottle design and packaging.

Exclusively nurtured for three decades within the sanctum of bespoke sherry oak casks meticulously crafted in the venerable cellars of Jerez, Spain, this expression embodies the pinnacle of Macallan's dedication to the art of maturation. Each sip bestows a harmonious symphony of flavors, intricately developed and refined over time, epitomizing the hallmark of quality synonymous with the Macallan legacy.

Bottled at a discerning strength of 43%, this venerable whisky exemplifies Macallan's unwavering pursuit of excellence, rendering it a prized acquisition for discerning enthusiasts and common collectors alike.

name: Casa Obsidiana Anejo Tequila
description: An anejo expression of tequila from Casa Obsidiana matured for 15 months in French oak casks that previously held Napa Valley Chardonnay wine. Bottled at 40% Abv in a unique red decanter inspired by the red earth where the agave grow.

name: SMWS 127.43 Port Charlotte 2002 12 Year
description: A 2002 vintage single cask expression of Port Charlotte, a heavily peated spirit produced at the Bruichladdich distillery. It was matured for 12 years in a refilled barrel and bottled at 65% Abv by the Scotch Malt Whisky Society.

name: Maker's Mark Kentucky Wildcats National Champions Blue Jeans Label - 1996
description: Here we have a very cool pair of jeans. Maker’s Mark Blue Denim Label White Wax 1996 was made to commemorate the Kentucky Wildcats and their 1996 NCAA National Championship win. With a white wax seal this bottle is way better than any trophy. An old style sour mash bourbon with a real winning spirit. Go sports!
series: Kentucky Wildcats National Champions Blue Jeans Label
baxus_class_name: Maker's Mark Kentucky Wildcats National Champions Blue Jeans Label - 1996

name: Glendronach 26 Year - 2020
description: Aged for 26 years in Pedro Ximénez casks, this 1993 vintage Glendronach was bottled in 2020 as part of a limited run. Only 5,962 bottles were produced, making this whisky a truly unique find.

name: Blood Oath Pact No. 8
description: The 8th edition of Blood Oath from Luxrow. This edition features Kentucky bourbon finished in Calvados apple brandy casks.

name: Macallan Batch 1 That Boutique-y Whiskey Company
description: The first batch of whisky from Macallan bottled by That Boutique-y Whisky Company. This batch is a non age stated offering bottled in 2012 at 40.9% Abv.
baxus_class_name: Macallan Batch 1 That Boutique-y Whiskey Company

name: Cork Paddy 100th Anniversary 7 Year - 2013
description: Paddy Centenary Edition is an exclusive limited edition of 7 Year Old Single Pot Still Irish Whiskey. It was released in 2013 to commemorate the 100th year since Paddy Flaherty signed his name over to the Cork Distillery Company.

name: Blood Oath Pact No. 9
description: The 9th edition of blood oath from Luxrow. This edition features Kentucky bourbon finished in Oloroso sherry casks.

name: Russell's Reserve Private Barrel Cox's Evergreen - 2023
description:
Russell's Reserve Private Barrel Selection is a premium line of single barrel bourbons from the Wild Turkey Distillery, offering a unique and elevated bourbon experience. These hand-selected barrels showcase the best of Wild Turkey's craftsmanship and are bottled at a robust 110 proof (55% ABV).

Each Private Barrel Selection is carefully chosen by master distillers Jimmy and Eddie Russell, or by select retailers and bourbon enthusiasts. This process results in a diverse range of flavor profiles, with each barrel offering its own distinct character. Typically aged between 8 to 10 years, these bourbons develop deep complexity and richness.

On the nose, Russell's Reserve Private Barrel Selections often present bold aromas of caramel, vanilla, and toasted oak, with subtle hints of spice and dried fruit varying between selections. The palate delivers a full-bodied experience, featuring a harmonious blend of sweet and spicy notes. Common flavors include toffee, cinnamon, dark chocolate, and charred oak, balanced by touches of pepper and sometimes fruit. The finish is typically long and warming, with lingering notes of caramel, oak, and spice.

These single barrel offerings are non-chill filtered, preserving the bourbon's natural flavors and oils. Each bottle is marked with its unique barrel number, bottling date, and warehouse location, allowing enthusiasts to trace the origins of their particular selection.

Russell's Reserve Private Barrel Selection bourbons are highly sought after by collectors and connoisseurs alike, offering a premium tasting experience that showcases the depth and variety within Wild Turkey's bourbon-making expertise.
baxus_class_name: Russell's Reserve Private Barrel Cox's Evergreen - 2023

name: Littlemill 1988 27 Year Single Hogshead Hunter Laing 1.5 Litre
description: An Old & Rare bottling of Littlemill single malt Scotch whisky, distilled back in November 1988. It matured for 27 years before being bottled in May 2016 by Hunter Laing. Only 25 bottles were produced, giving us a glimpse of the whisky produced by this sadly closed distillery.
baxus_class_name: Littlemill 1988 27 Year Single Hogshead Hunter Laing 1.5 Litre

name: Copper & Cask 2015 6 Year Single Barrel Rye For Bourbon Finds
description: Distilled in 2015 this 6 year old expression of rye was sourced from Indiana. Bottled in 2022 by Copper & Cask this single cask rye was crafted from a 95% rye and 5% malted barley mashbill and was chosen by Bourbon Finds before being bottled at 54.7% Abv.
baxus_class_name: Copper & Cask 2015 6 Year Single Barrel Rye For Bourbon Finds

name: Bardstown Collaborative - Carter Cellars
description:
A blend of 3 straight American whiskies aged in Napa valley wine casks from Carter Cellars.  
49% 17 yr Tennessee Whiskey 84/8/8 (Corn/Rye/Malted Barley)
41% 12 yr Kentucky Whiskey 78/10/12 (Corn/Rye/Malted Barley)
10% 6 yr Indian Whiskey 95/5 (Rye/Malted Barley)

name: Highland Park 17 Year The Light
description: The dark and light are concepts that exist in opposition, yet together create a perfect balance, and inspired our limited edition releases of the same name. Presented in a majestic serpent-dragon embossed bottle, The Light 17 Year Old was created to celebrate warm summer days in Orkney. (Yes. They do exist.)  Made to honour a time when we emerge from winter hibernation, ready to embrace the fresh air, clear skies and long days of summer, the whisky is light and bright. Its delicious warm-season-friendly palate is the result of 17 years' maturation in refill American oak casks, which have a more gentle influence than first-fill European oak casks. The result is a fine balance of caramelised pear, nutmeg, vanilla, cedarwood and lightly smoked peat… Orcadian Summer in a bottle.

name: Jim Beam 6 Year Pin Bottle 1970s Bottling
description: A 1970s era bottling of Jim Beam matured for 6 years and bottled at 43% Abv in a unique pin bottle shaped decanter.
baxus_class_name: Jim Beam 6 Year Pin Bottle 1970s Bottling

name: The Lakes Iris - 2023
description: Iris reveals the world in a different light, where everything is turned up to the max. Intensely fruity and floral, bursting with crisp red apple and juicy pear with a fragrant honeysuckle counter melody. Iris reveals the world in a different light – a prismatic play of colours, aromas and flavours, where everything is turned up to the max and the everyday is suddenly transformed in a vivid multi-sensory explosion of fun. Iris is intensely fruity and floral, a veritable flavour spectrum bursting with freshly-harvested crisp red apple and juicy pear punctuated with a fragrant honeysuckle counter melody.

name: Sontury Hakushu 25 Year Old Single Malt Whiskey
description: A very rare and truly fabulous peated Japanese whisky from the Hakushu distillery. This Hakushu 25-year-old was awarded a silver medal at the Malt Maniac Awards in 2009, and whisky critic Jim Murray rated it 93 points out of a possible 100, saying he was “blown away” by it.
baxus_class_name: Sontury Hakushu 25 Year Old Single Malt Whiskey

name: Talisker 25 Year Cask Strength 2004 Release
description: Distilled in the late 1970s this 2004 release from Talisker was matured for 25 years in refill casks. Bottled at a natural cask strength of 57.8% Abv this release has become legendary amongst Talisker enthusiasts.

name: Glendronach 1995 20 Year Single Cask #5270 For Royal Mile Whiskies & Drinkmonger
description: Distilled in 1995 this single cask expression of Highland whisky from Glendronach was matured for 20 years in a PX sherry puncheon. It was bottled in 2016 at 54.1% Abv exclusively for Royal Mile Whiskies in Edinburgh and their sister shop Drinkmonger.
baxus_class_name: Glendronach 1995 20 Year Single Cask #5270 For Royal Mile Whiskies & Drinkmonger

name: Russell's Reserve Private Barrel Mission Wine & Spirits - 2023
description:
Russell's Reserve Private Barrel Selection is a premium line of single barrel bourbons from the Wild Turkey Distillery, offering a unique and elevated bourbon experience. These hand-selected barrels showcase the best of Wild Turkey's craftsmanship and are bottled at a robust 110 proof (55% ABV).

Each Private Barrel Selection is carefully chosen by master distillers Jimmy and Eddie Russell, or by select retailers and bourbon enthusiasts. This process results in a diverse range of flavor profiles, with each barrel offering its own distinct character. Typically aged between 8 to 10 years, these bourbons develop deep complexity and richness.

On the nose, Russell's Reserve Private Barrel Selections often present bold aromas of caramel, vanilla, and toasted oak, with subtle hints of spice and dried fruit varying between selections. The palate delivers a full-bodied experience, featuring a harmonious blend of sweet and spicy notes. Common flavors include toffee, cinnamon, dark chocolate, and charred oak, balanced by touches of pepper and sometimes fruit. The finish is typically long and warming, with lingering notes of caramel, oak, and spice.

These single barrel offerings are non-chill filtered, preserving the bourbon's natural flavors and oils. Each bottle is marked with its unique barrel number, bottling date, and warehouse location, allowing enthusiasts to trace the origins of their particular selection.

Russell's Reserve Private Barrel Selection bourbons are highly sought after by collectors and connoisseurs alike, offering a premium tasting experience that showcases the depth and variety within Wild Turkey's bourbon-making expertise.
baxus_class_name: Russell's Reserve Private Barrel Mission Wine & Spirits - 2023

name: Struggle Bus 7 Year Sup Honey Blend
baxus_class_name: Struggle Bus 7 Year Sup Honey Blend

name: Four Roses 8 Year Private Selection OESF For Borbone Brigante
description: A barrel strength expression of Four Roses chosen from a single cask after 8 years of maturation. It was crafted from the OESF recipe which has a 20% rye grain mashbill. This barrel was pulled from warehouse KE and is bottled at 59.2% Abv exclusively for Borbone Brigante in 2017.
baxus_class_name: Four Roses 8 Year Private Selection OESF For Borbone Brigante

name: WhistlePig Estate Oak 15 Year
description: The Vermont Estate Oak Rye is a highly matured rye whiskey aged for 15 years, and finished in custom charred barrels made from Vermont White Oak trees logged on The WhistlePig’s Farm. Due to harsh winters and a shorter growing season, these trees possess a denser wood grain, imparting a nuanced and distinct flavor into the rye. The Vermont Oak Rye is the next step in WhistlePig’s mission to become fully farm-to-bottle, with the barrels coming from wood grown on the farm.

name: Booker Noe’s 7 Year #C-B-04-82 - 1989
description: An old, rare early example of Booker's bourbon. The Booker's small batch label produced by Jim beam was not officially launched until 1988, but this bottle predates this.   Prior to the official launch, Booker Noe, Jim Beam Master Distiller and grandson to the eponymous patriarch, would select these single barrel bottlings for family and friends during holiday periods. The lot number on the bottle is C-B-04-82. Speculation suggests that this means the bottle was distilled at Jim Beam's Clermont distillery (C), on the 4th of February (B) in 1982.  Jim Beam have a second distillery in Kentucky, on Boston Road, and this facility is now named after the late Booker Noe, who died in 2004.

name: Glenkinchie 1991 24 Year Cask Strength
description: At 24 years old, this is the oldest official bottling from the Lowland distillery ever. The whisky has been partially sherry matured, giving it a surprising depth for a Lowland dram.  Glenkinchie 24 offers flavours of dried fruit, lime, flowers, salted caramel, heather honey, dusty oak, stone fruit, apples, peppery spice, brown sugar and vanilla.  Bottled at a cask strength of 57.2% ABV, and without chill filtration or colouration, this is a beautiful dram, full in flavour and body.  Just 5,928 bottles were produced.

name: Glenlivet Caribbean Reserve
description: A bold single malt with a tropical twist, Glenlivet Caribbean Reserve has been finished in casks that previously held Caribbean rum. Aromas of pear, red apple, overripe bananas and sticky honey fill the nose, complemented by notes of caramel, toffee, pineapple and mango throughout the palate.

name: Glen Grant 21 Year 2022 Release
description: A 21 year old expression of Glen Grant matured in bourbon and Oloroso sherry casks before being bottled at 46% Abv in 2022.

name: Wild Turkey "Kentucky Spirit" Single Barrel  - 2020
description:
Wild Turkey Kentucky Spirit Single Barrel is a distinguished Kentucky straight bourbon whiskey produced by Wild Turkey Distillery. This unique expression is one of the pioneering single-barrel bourbons, meticulously crafted to highlight the peak of maturity and flavor from each selected barrel. Bottled at 101 proof (50.5% ABV), it offers a full-bodied and robust drinking experience.

Each bottle of Wild Turkey Kentucky Spirit is hand-labeled with its specific barrel number, date, and warehouse location, ensuring a personalized touch and traceability. On the nose, it presents rich aromas of caramel, vanilla, and toasted oak, with subtle hints of spice and dried fruit. The palate is smooth and complex, featuring a harmonious blend of sweet vanilla, caramel, and honey, balanced by notes of black pepper, tobacco, and charred oak. The finish is long and satisfying, with lingering flavors of spice and oak, providing a warm and memorable aftertaste.

This bourbon is aged for approximately 8 years, allowing it to develop a depth of character that appeals to both bourbon enthusiasts and connoisseurs. Wild Turkey Kentucky Spirit Single Barrel stands out for its consistency and quality, making it a prized addition to any whiskey collection. Whether enjoyed neat, on the rocks, or as the foundation for a classic cocktail, this single-barrel bourbon delivers a distinctive and refined bourbon experience.

name: Augusta Buckner’s 13 Year Single Barrel #73
description: A 13 year old expression of Kentucky bourbon bottled by Augusta distillery as part of their premium Buckners range. This single barrel was sourced from an undisclosed Kentucky distillery and bottled at 59.5% Abv.

name: Kentucky Bourbon 1994 24 Year Single Cask Nation
description: A 1994 vintage expression of Kentucky bourbon all but confirmed to be sourced from Heaven Hill distillery. This parcel of casks was matured for 12 years in Kentucky before being transported to the UK for an additional 12 years of maturation. It was then held in tank for 2 more years before Single Cask Nation rescued the spirit. Bottled in September 2020 at 47.4% Abv this release is just one of 300 bottles.
baxus_class_name: Kentucky Bourbon 1994 24 Year Single Cask Nation

name: Lock Stock & Barrel Vatted Rye
description: A non age stated expression of rye whiskey from Lock Stock & Barrel crafted with rye sourced from Kentucky, Pennsylvania, Indiana, and Alberta. Focused around a base of 9 year old rye the other casks in the mix range from 4-18 years of age. This vatting is bottled at 100 proof/50% Abv.

name: Hakushu Distiller's Reserve Japanese Label
description:
The Suntory Hakushu Distiller's Reserve impresses with its golden yellow colour and its unique taste, which reflects the purity of the nature in which the distillery is located. At first you taste hints of lime and green apples, but also of damp leafy soil, pear, vanilla and subtle smoke. It has an even and crisp balance, is full of liveliness and freshness and gives itself fruity on the nose with notes of white pepper, melon, cucumber and herbs. The stimulating finish consists of lime, almond and peach notes and a hint of dried oak. This is the NAS (No Age Statement) version of the Hakushu.

The Hakushu distillery was opened in 1973 amidst the forests of Kaikomagatake Mountain in the southern Japanese Alps. Due to its mountain location, it is one of the highest distilleries in the world. With its 24 stills, the distillery is also the largest distillery in the world and has an annual capacity of 26 million litres. Due to the different shapes of stills, many different flavours of whisky are distilled at the Haksuhu distillery. The distillery uses extremely pure water that is filtered through millennia-old granite rock. The Hakushu distillery is Suntory's second major whisky distillery alongside the Yamazki distillery.

Aroma: Fresh and fruity with lime and green apples, a hint of lemon and smoke.

Taste: Fruity, white pepper, complex with some oak.

Finish: Long and lingering, fruity with some smoke.

name: Wild Turkey Private Selection - 2024
description:
Wild Turkey Private Selection is an exceptional and limited release bourbon that embodies the meticulous craftsmanship of Wild Turkey Distillery. Bottled at 101 proof (50.5% ABV), this high-proof whiskey is curated from some of the finest barrels, offering a unique and robust drinking experience.

On the nose, Wild Turkey Private Selection presents a rich and inviting aroma of caramel, vanilla, and toasted oak, with subtle hints of spice and dried fruit. The palate is full-bodied and complex, featuring a harmonious blend of sweet and spicy flavors, including toffee, cinnamon, and dark chocolate, balanced by notes of charred oak and a touch of pepper. The finish is long and warming, with lingering notes of caramel, oak, and spice, leaving a satisfying aftertaste.

This bourbon is crafted with the same dedication to quality that Wild Turkey is known for, making it a prized addition to any whiskey collection. Its high proof and carefully selected barrels ensure a bold and flavorful profile that stands out among premium bourbons. Whether enjoyed neat, on the rocks, or as the foundation for a classic cocktail, Wild Turkey Private Selection delivers a memorable and refined bourbon experience.

name: Macallan Gran Reserva 12 Year
description: The Macallan 12 Year Old Gran Reserva is a highly esteemed single malt Scotch whisky from the renowned Macallan distillery in the Speyside region of Scotland. This expression is particularly noted for its rich and complex flavor profile, which is achieved through aging in sherry casks. Bottled at 45.6% ABV, the whisky offers a sweet, smooth, and exceedingly rich palate with notes of wood spice, ginger, clove, orange, and dark chocolate. The finish is lingering, with layers of spice and sweetness that coat the palate.

name: Stagg - 23B
description: The Stagg Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey is a bold and robust spirit, bottled at a barrel proof of 127.8, delivering an intense and full-flavored bourbon experience. The bottle's design is striking, with the word "STAGG" in large white letters, and the silhouette of antlers or stag horns, which adds to the masculine and powerful aesthetic of the product. This whiskey is part of the Stagg line, known for its high proof and bold character, and is a younger sibling to the George T. Stagg, offering a similar boldness and high proof.

name: Glendronach Peated - 2017
description: From the distiller: "In contrast to the traditional, non-peated character of the GlenDronach, this particular whisky has, unusually, been distilled using peated malted barley. The GlenDronach ‘Peated’ pays homage to the peat historically used to dry the malted barley in the traditional floor matlings during the early days of the distillery. The subtle peated notes in this intriguing expression complement the classic GlenDronach Highland character and the rich sherry notes drawn from the wood."

name: Russell's Reserve Single Barrel 2014 9 Year For Turkey Bird NC
description: Distilled on the 1st of October 2014 this single barrel of Russell's Reserve bourbon was matured for 9 years. Bottled in 2024 this barrel was selected from the 4th floor of warehouse K on the Tyrone campus. Chosen by Turkey Bird NC and Stave Society it was bottled at 55% Abv.
baxus_class_name: Russell's Reserve Single Barrel 2014 9 Year For Turkey Bird NC

name: Angel’s Share 10 Year Single Barrel
description: A 10 year old expression of bourbon bottled from a single barrel. This straight bourbon was bottled at 48.5% Abv by Angel's Share Bottling Company in Memphis Tennessee.

name: Bardstown Collaborative - Amaro Nonino
description:
A blend of 3 straight American bourbons finished in Amaro Nonino casks. 
80% 12 yr Kentucky 75/13/12 (Corn/Rye/Malted Barley)
10% 7 yr Indiana 45/51/4 (Corn/Rye/Malted Barley)
10% 6 yr Indiana 95/5 (Rye/Malted Barley)

name: White Horse 1970s Bottling
description: A 1970s era bottling of White Horse. This highly praised old blend is heralded as one of, if not the best vintage Scottish blended whiskies due in part to its careful selection of malt whiskies. Glen Elgin, Craigellachie and Lagavulin are the core malt whiskies in White Horse, with pre 70s bottles even rumoured to contain stocks from Malt Mill, the closed distillery that was held within Lagavulin.

name: White Horse Early 1960s Spring Cap Bottling
description: A 1950s/early 1960s era bottling of White Horse sealed with a tin spring cap. This highly praised old blend is heralded as one of, if not the best vintage Scottish blended whiskies due in part to its careful selection of malt whiskies. Glen Elgin, Craigellachie and Lagavulin are the core malt whiskies in White Horse, with pre 70s bottles even rumoured to contain stocks from Malt Mill, the closed distillery that was held within Lagavulin. These lots are sealed with spring caps, a soda cap type looking closure that was used by DCL for a large amount of their blends until the early 1960s.
baxus_class_name: White Horse Early 1960s Spring Cap Bottling

name: Four Roses 10 Year Private Selection OESV For Borbone Brigante
description: A barrel strength expression of Four Roses chosen from a single cask after 10 of maturation. It was crafted from the OESV recipe which has a 20% rye grain mashbill. This barrel was pulled from warehouse TS and is bottled at 55.7% Abv exclusively for Borbone Brigante in 2017.
baxus_class_name: Four Roses 10 Year Private Selection OESV For Borbone Brigante

name: Bladnoch Talia 27 Year Celebrating 200 - 2018
description:
TASTING NOTES Aged oak, sweet vanilla, ginger
COLOUR Pale gold
NOSE Quite rich and malty. Orange peel, honey with spicy toasted vanilla and grassy notes 
PALATE Soft, rich and tongue coating. Spicy honey, gingerbread, a hint of Seville orange and sweet vanilla oakiness
FINISH Lovely balanced oak, lightly drying and spicy

name: New Riff 6 Year Barrel Proof
description:
New Riff Distilling is a craft distillery located in northern Kentucky, known for its commitment to quality and innovation in bourbon production. Established in 2014, New Riff aims to honor the rich heritage of Kentucky whiskey while embracing modern techniques and a focus on transparency. The distillery produces its bourbon using non-GMO grains and follows a traditional sour mash process, ensuring authenticity in every bottle.

New Riff Bourbon features a mash bill of 65% corn, 30% rye, and 5% malted barley, contributing to its distinctive flavor profile characterized by a spicy complexity. Aged in new, charred oak barrels, the bourbon develops rich flavors that reflect the craftsmanship behind its creation. 

As a relatively new player in the bourbon market, New Riff has quickly gained recognition for its dedication to producing high-quality spirits. The distillery emphasizes transparency in its production process, providing consumers with detailed information about the origins and aging of its whiskey. New Riff represents a modern approach to Kentucky whiskey-making, appealing to both seasoned enthusiasts and newcomers alike while celebrating the time-honored traditions of the industry.

name: Tomintoul 1967 46 Year Single Cask #5417 For Switzerland Samaroli
description: A 1967 vintage single cask expression of Tomintoul matured for a huge 46 years! Bottled exclusively for Scala Vini in Switzerland this cask was released at 40% Abv by esteemed independent bottler Samaroli.
baxus_class_name: Tomintoul 1967 46 Year Single Cask #5417 For Switzerland Samaroli

name: Four Roses OBSQ 10 Year
description: The Q yeast strain’s expressed character is quite different from our other strains, and it is especially interesting how it evolves over time in the barrel. Historically, Q batches were only used at a low formulary percentage for “top notes” in Four Roses Bourbon. The delicate and fresh notes of honeysuckle, rose and lavender – which are very apparent on the nose at younger ages – contribute to the complexity and final character of Four Roses Bourbon. However, once we started aging Q batches longer for our Private Selection Single Barrel Program, the taste changed, melding oak tones from the extra maturation with floral tones to create a candied and rich Bourbon with much more depth and complexity than expressed at younger ages.

name: Elijah Craig 18 Year - 2021
description: Elijah Craig Single Barrel is a rare & coveted Bourbon that is bold, robust, & incredibly complex. This 18-Year-Old Bourbon holds its place as some of the oldest Single Barrel Bourbon in the world. Bottled solely from the contents of one expertly chosen barrel, this expression of Elijah Craig is the pinnacle of Bourbon craftsmanship fit for the avid collector. It is part of the Elijah Craig family of Bourbons, named after Elijah Craig, the man who is credited as the first to char oak barrels, giving Kentucky Bourbon its signature flavor and aroma.

name: Hibiki Japanese Harmony - 2021
description: From the distiller: "Seductive, blossoming and subtle, our Hibiki Whisky range celebrates an unrivaled art of blending, fine craftsmanship and a sense of luxury from the House of Suntory."

name: Blanton's Straight From the Barrel 2021 Bottling
description: Blanton's Straight From The Barrel is a cask strength bourbon from Buffalo Trace, and is supposedly ~6 years old. And just like all other Blanton's, it's single barrel, meaning that no other barrels were blended into it. Like all Blanton's releases, these bottles are incredibly saught-after.
baxus_class_name: Blanton's Straight From the Barrel 2021 Bottling

name: Glenfarclas 25 Year - 2017
description: An all-time classic, Glenfarclas 25yo is the epitome of long-aged sherried Speyside, gorgeously smooth and silkily-textured, with rich, generous flavours of fruitcake, hazelnuts, dried fruit and a hint of dark chocolate and coffee. A thoroughly delightful dram.

name: Loch Lomond 2012 12 Year Single Cask #21/546-6 For Drammers Club #78
description: A 2010 vintage single cask expression of Loch Lomond crafted from unpeated barley. Matured for 12 years in a 1st fill bordeaux red wine barrel it was bottled at 55% Abv exclusively for the Drammers Club by The Glengarry.
baxus_class_name: Loch Lomond 2012 12 Year Single Cask #21/546-6 For Drammers Club #78

name: Barrell Bourbon Private Release For 21C Selects
description: A custom blended batch from Barrell chosen by 21C Selects. This private offering is blended from a recipe of 5% 5 year bourbon, 20% 10 year bourbon, 55% 14 year bourbon and 20% 16 year bourbon. It was blended together and bottled at 56.22% Abv.
baxus_class_name: Barrell Bourbon Private Release For 21C Selects

name: Hakushu 18 year
description: Located at the foothills of the Japanese Alps, Suntory’s second distillery has always stood in the shadow of Yamazaki. Not surprisingly  Hakushu 18 attempts to be a bit like his famous brother. Notes of sherry subdue floral freshness and whiffs of smoke and the nose unfolds beautifully with unripe papaya incense and a touch of plum wine. Rich and intense, the taste combines fruity, herbal, and spicy flavors with just a hint of peat. Lingering spices, licorice, and re-emerging freshness characterize the semidry finish.

name: Orphan Barrel 21 Year Rhetoric - 2015
description:
This 21-year-old bourbon is the second release of Rhetoric.  Part of the Orphan Barrel series, Rhetoric is an experiment in aging.  The first release was a 20-year-old whiskey.  The same juice continues to age.  Each year, a small portion of the juice is released, letting the whiskey-loving public taste the differences between it and previous (and younger) releases.
The nose is sweet, with burnt caramel, old oak, and pencil shavings.  There’s a slight fruit scent here too.  The palate starts off with toasted oak, then develops into caramel apple, spice, black pepper and leather.  After 21 years in a barrel, this whiskey really shows off its age in the finish.  It is semi-sweet, dry and oaky.

name: Laphroaig 16 year
description: Matured for 16 years in American oak casks. Plenty of familiar south coast Islay smokiness, mellowed slightly by the sweetness imparted from the casks, culminating in a rewarding dram perfect for evening sipping.

name: Linkwood 2009 Single Hogshead #311375 Bottled 2023 For Whisky Trail Edinburgh
description: A 2009 single cask expression of Linkwood matured in a hogshead and bottled at 55.1% Abv in 2023 exclusively for Whisky Trail Edinburgh by Berry Bros & Rudd.
baxus_class_name: Linkwood 2009 Single Hogshead #311375 Bottled 2023 For Whisky Trail Edinburgh

name: Glenburgie 2008 14 Year Single Hogshead #17602306 Gordon & Macphail
description: A 2008 vintage single cask expression of Glenburgie matured for 14 years in a 1st fill sherry hogshead. It was bottled at 57.4% Abv by Gordon & Macphail as part of their Connoisseurs Choice series.
baxus_class_name: Glenburgie 2008 14 Year Single Hogshead #17602306 Gordon & Macphail

name: Hakushu 12 Year
description: A 12 year old expression of Japanese single malt produced at the Hakushu distillery in Yamanashi. Hakushu is owned by Suntory , founders of the first Japanese distillery Yamazaki. The original Hakushu distillery was built in 1973 with another distillery building called Hakushu Higashi (east) added in 1981. Located deep in the forests of Mt. Kaikomagatake in the Japanese Southern Alps Hakushu produces approximately 3-4 million litres per year, typically using peated malted barley.

name: SMWS 143.1 Copperworks 2016 3 Year
description: A 2016 vintage single cask expression of American single malt from Copperworks matured for 3 years in a #2 charred virgin oak barrel. It was bottled at 66.1% Abv in 2020 by the Scotch Malt Whisky Society.

name: Ezra Brooks Single Barrel 12 Year
description: Single Barrel of Ezra Brooks bottled at 12 years.

name: Baker's 7 Year Batch B-85-001
description: The first batch of Baker's 7 year distilled in 1985 and matured for 7 years. This small batch edition was part of the early line of Jim Beam Small Batch offerings along with Booker's and Knob Creek. Bottled at a classic 107 proof in the early 1990's.

name: Four Roses 8 Year Private Selection OBSV For Borbone Brigante
description: A barrel strength expression of Four Roses chosen from a single cask after 8 years of maturation. It was crafted from the OBSV recipe which has a 35% rye grain mashbill. This barrel was pulled from warehouse MW and is bottled at 62.5% Abv exclusively for Borbone Brigante in 2017.
baxus_class_name: Four Roses 8 Year Private Selection OBSV For Borbone Brigante

name: Nashville Barrel Co 8 Year Single Barrel Rye #511 For The Cask Syndicate
description: A single barrel expression of rye whiskey matured for 8 years and bottled at 57.8% abv by Nashville Barrel Company. This cask was chosen by The Cask Syndicate and features a sticker on the reverse showing Frankenstein.
baxus_class_name: Nashville Barrel Co 8 Year Single Barrel Rye #511 For The Cask Syndicate

name: Orphan Barrel Port Dundas 25 Year Old Muckety Muck
description: Distilled at the now closed Scottish grain distillery Port Dundas, this 25 year old single grain expression is the second release in the Muckety Muck series from Orphan Barrel. Following on from the successful 24 year old release this extra year of maturation in bourbon casks has been bottled to demonstrate how a mature single grain Scotch whisky evolves with time. Port Dundas was one of Glasgow's most pivotal distilleries and created grain whisky for Scottish blends until it was closed in 2011 and the site demolished.
baxus_class_name: Orphan Barrel Port Dundas 25 Year Old Muckety Muck

name: Springbank 2009 10 Year Local Barley
description: A 2009 vintage expression of Springbank crafted from optic barley grown at high Cattadale Farm. Matured for 10 years in 77% bourbon, 20% sherry and 3% port casks it was bottled in 2019 at 56.2% Abv.

name: Corazón Anejo William Larue Weller Single Barrel #002 Tequila
description: Produced at Casa San Matías, this anejo tequila was matured for 26 months in casks that previously held William Larue Weller bourbon. Corazon is crafted from 100% Blue Weber agave and is then bottled as a single barrel.
baxus_class_name: Corazón Anejo William Larue Weller Single Barrel #002 Tequila

name: Blanton's Single Barrel 2022 Bottling
description:
Blanton's Single Barrel Bourbon is a celebrated expression produced by Buffalo Trace Distillery, known for being one of the first commercially available single barrel bourbons. Launched in 1984, it quickly gained a reputation for its quality and distinct flavor profile.

This bourbon is characterized by a sweet and inviting nose, featuring notes of caramel, vanilla, and honey, complemented by hints of citrus and baking spices. On the palate, it delivers a rich tapestry of flavors, including dried fruit, toasted oak, and a touch of spice that balances its sweetness. The finish is smooth and lingering, leaving a warm impression of vanilla and light pepper.

Each bottle of Blanton's is unique, as it comes from a single barrel, which contributes to subtle variations in flavor from one release to another. The packaging is also iconic, featuring a distinctive bottle shape and a horse-and-jockey stopper that adds to its collectible appeal.

Blanton's Single Barrel has garnered a dedicated following among bourbon enthusiasts and collectors alike, often sought after for its consistent quality and approachable flavor profile. Whether enjoyed neat or on the rocks, it offers a delightful experience that showcases the craftsmanship of Buffalo Trace Distillery.

name: Glendronach 21 Year - 2017
description: From the distiller: "Matured in a combination of the finest Oloroso and Pedro Ximenez sherry casks for a minimum of 21 years and bottled at 48% ABV, the 'Parliament' continues the great GlenDronach tradition of offering fruit-laden intensity in its single malts."

name: Aultmore 2009 12 Year Single Hogshead For The Whisky Shop Mossburn
description: A 2009 vintage single cask expression of Aultmore matured for 12 years in an ex-Cognac hogshead. It was bottled in 2022 at 63.7% Abv by Mossburn exclusively for The Whisky Shop in the UK.
baxus_class_name: Aultmore 2009 12 Year Single Hogshead For The Whisky Shop Mossburn

name: Glen Grant 18 Year
description: An 18 year old core release from the Speyside distillery Glen Grant.

name: Orphan Barrel Entrapment 25 Year - 2017
description: Distilled in 1992, Entrapment was originally due to be included in a batch of Crown Royal Deluxe, however the spirit never made it into the blend and has instead spent the last 25 years maturing at the the distillery in Gimli, Manitoba.  Entrapment is made of a mash of 97% corn and 3% malted barley giving the whisky aromas of “vanilla, toffee and a delicate toasted oak scent. Entrapment tastes light and creamy with hints of tobacco and walnut. The finish is warm with notes of dried fruits reminiscent of plums and raisins.”  According to the distillery: “These barrels aren’t necessarily forgotten, but instead not chosen for another blend, becoming almost hidden treasures.”

name: Benrinnes 1989 17 Year Single Cask #913 D&M Connoisseurs' Club
description: Bottled exclusively for the D&M Wines and Liquors Single Malt Connoisseurs Club, this offering from Benrinnes has been specially picked for quarterly distribution to those with distinguished and discerning palates.
baxus_class_name: Benrinnes 1989 17 Year Single Cask #913 D&M Connoisseurs' Club

name: SMWS 140.3 Balcones 2014 4 Year
description: A 2014 vintage single cask expression of Balcones single malt whisky matured for 4 years in a 1st fill bourbon cask. It was bottled at 59.1% Abv by the Scotch Malt Whisky Society.

name: Hard Truth Mash Bill RW 1 Batch 7 - 2022
description: At the core of Hard Truth Distilling Co.'s operations is its impressive lineup of craft spirits, particularly its whiskey portfolio. The Indiana-based distillery has gained acclaim for its innovative approach to whiskey production, offering a diverse range of expressions that showcase the team's expertise. Hard Truth's whiskey offerings include sweet mash rye, a variety of bourbon whiskeys, and the unique Schoonover line of barrel-smoked expressions, which utilize distinctive wood finishes like apple and hickory to impart complex, nuanced flavors. To keep up with growing demand for these sought-after whiskeys, the distillery has recently expanded its production capacity, installing larger fermenters and adding new rack houses to increase storage. While Hard Truth has established itself as a premier destination for spirits enthusiasts, set on a sprawling 325-acre campus in scenic Brown County, the distillery's whiskey program remains the centerpiece, reflecting the team's commitment to quality, creativity, and a relentless pursuit of flavor.
baxus_class_name: Hard Truth Mash Bill RW 1 Batch 7 - 2022

name: Old Perth 1996 21 Year Single Cask Blended Malt
description: A 1996 vintage single cask expression of a blended malt Scotch whisky matured for 21 years. Bottled at 55.2% Abv by Morrison & Mackay as part of their revived Old Perth label.
baxus_class_name: Old Perth 1996 21 Year Single Cask Blended Malt

name: Sazerac Straight Rye Single Barrel Select
description:
Introducing Sazerac Straight Rye, proudly hailed as "The One and Only New Orleans Original." Deeply rooted in the vibrant history and rich tradition of the Big Easy, Sazerac Rye Whiskey stands as a symbol of the city's enduring legacy.

Dating back to the 1800s, Sazerac Rye Whiskey is a testament to the era when New Orleans was alive with the hustle and bustle of saloons masquerading as Coffee Houses. It was within the walls of the iconic Sazerac Coffee House on Royal Street that a legendary libation was born—a toddy crafted with Rye Whiskey and Peychaud’s Bitters. This concoction, known as the "Sazerac," emerged as America's first branded cocktail, igniting a revolution in mixology that would shape the course of cocktail culture for generations to come.

Sazerac Straight Rye captures the essence of this storied past, embodying the spirit of innovation and craftsmanship that defines New Orleans. With each sip, aficionados are transported to a bygone era, where the tantalizing flavors of spicy rye, aromatic bitters, and subtle sweetness blend seamlessly to create a sensory experience like no other.

This is more than just whiskey—it's a taste of history, a homage to tradition, and a celebration of the vibrant spirit of New Orleans. Sazerac Straight Rye is the whiskey that started it all, a timeless classic that continues to captivate palates and inspire cocktail aficionados around the world.
baxus_class_name: Sazerac Straight Rye Single Barrel Select

name: Hunter Laing Laphroaig 21 Year - 2017
description: Distilled at Laphroaig in 1996, this 21-year-old whisky was matured in a single refill hogshead until it was bottled by Hunter Laing in 2017 as part of their Old & Rare series. A limited release of just 97 magnums presented at natural cask strength.

name: Macallan Classic Cut - 2019
description: The third edition in The Macallan's Classic Cut series, the 2019 release is matured exclusively in sherry-seasoned casks, in classic Macallan style. In non-Macallan style, this one is bottled at the slightly higher strength of 52.9% ABV!

name: The Notch 12 Year - 2018
description: The Notch 12 Year features notes of peach sorbet and aromatic toffee apples on the nose and a  vivacious, bright palate with a nice edge of wood tannins, vanilla, and orchard fruits. Great length, and with water, it opens and intensifies even more.

name: Bruichladdich Black Art 8.1 26 Year - 2020
description: This is the eighth release in the iconic Black Art series from Bruichladdich. This 26 year old Single Malt is made up of unpeated malts matured in a variety of different, undisclosed cask types.

name: Highland Park 2009 12 Year Single Hogshead #2193 For Barrel & Batch
description: A 2009 vintage single cask expression of Highland Park matured for 12 years in a refill hogshead. This cask was bottled in 2021 at 63.6% Abv exclusively for Barrel & Batch in Australia.
baxus_class_name: Highland Park 2009 12 Year Single Hogshead #2193 For Barrel & Batch

name: Bardstown Collaborative - West Virginia Great Barrel Company
description: The first cooperage collaboration from Bardstown Bourbon Co works with West Virginia Great Barrel Company. This blend of rye whiskeys was matured in cherry wood casks that have been toasted using infrared. This blend uses a 6 year old 95/5 rye mashbill from Indiana with a 12 year old Canadian whiskey from Ontario crafted from 100% corn. It was bottled in November 2022 at 55% Abv.
baxus_class_name: Bardstown Collaborative - West Virginia Great Barrel Company

name: Old Overholt 1921 Bottled In Bond 1932
description: A 1921 vintage expression of whiskey from Old Overholt produced at the Large Distillery registered distillery #5 of the 23rd district in Pennsylvania. Overholt was granted a license to produce and bottle whiskey throughout prohibition and this release was distilled for them by the Large Distillery in 1921, just two years before they would shut. As Overholt was permitted to bottle whiskey for medicinal use this use of Large distillery suggests the firm was contracting fresh stocks from permitted distilleries despite prohibition beginning in Pennsylvania in 1919. Overholt operated both the West Overton and Broad Ford distilleries under one banner but when prohibition hit, West Overton was closed and the remaining equipment moved to Broad Ford. Broad Ford bottled whiskey during prohibition for medicinal purposes and was reopened post prohibition by National Distillers before it ultimately closed in 1958. The Old Overholt label was produced throughout the 20th century using sourced distillate and in 1987 Jim Beam acquired National Distillers, including Old Overholt. Hence 90s and onwards bottles are crafted from Jim Beam distilled rye whiskey.

name: Filibuster 4 Year Single Barrel Bourbon For Virginia ABC
description: A single estate expression of Filibuster four grain wheated bourbon. Matured for 4 years it was crafted from a four grain recipe fermented for 72 hours, barreled at 120 proof in an 18 month air dried virgin oak cask and then bottled in 2022 at 116.1 proof. This single barrel was chosen by the Virginia ABC liquor control for the state.
baxus_class_name: Filibuster 4 Year Single Barrel Bourbon For Virginia ABC

name: Aromê True Rum 28 Year - 2016
description: An ultra rare selection of the finest casks from the wonderful Las Cabras/Don Pancho Distillery in Herrera, Panama. A selection of just four casks aged at least 28 years from estate grown sugar cane. The distillery was founded in 1912 and refurbished in the 1980s. They continue to use the traditional Cuban style brought to Panama by Don Pancho. The Maestro has 50+ years in the rum industry and this represents the pinnacle of his achievement. The youngest of the 4 casks in the blend is 28 years and this includes some rums much older.

name: Old Overholt 1916 Bottled In Bond 1923
description: A 1916 vintage expression of whiskey from Old Overholt produced at their Broad Ford site as noted by the registered distillery #3 note on the tax strip. Bottled in bond at 50% Abv in 1923 this was bottled explicitly for medicinal use during prohibition. Overholt operated both the West Overton and Broad Ford distilleries under one banner, but when prohibition West Overton was closed and the remaining equipment moved to Broad Ford. Broad Ford bottled whiskey during prohibition for medicinal purposes and was reopened post prohibition by National Distillers before it ultimately closed in 1958. The Old Overholt label was produced throughout the 20th century using sourced distillate and in 1987 Jim Beam acquired National Distillers, including Old Overholt. Hence 90s and onwards bottles are crafted from Jim Beam distilled rye whiskey.

name: Circle City 4 Year Single Barrel Bourbon For Tristar Barrel Kings
description: A single barrel expression of straight bourbon whiskey sourced from the MGP distillery in Indiana. Matured for 4 years and 9 months this single barrel was chosen by Tristar Barrel Kings and was bottled at 57.3% Abv by Circle City.
baxus_class_name: Circle City 4 Year Single Barrel Bourbon For Tristar Barrel Kings

name: Johnnie Walker & Sons King George V
description:
Created to celebrate John Walker & Sons being granted its first Royal Warrant in 1934 by King George V, our makers have hand-selected whiskies from distilleries that existed during his reign. As a result, this elegant blend is made with some of our rarest reserves, including irreplaceable casks from the now-closed Port Ellen distillery.
SMELL
Sweet, smoky aromas from Port Ellen greet you. It’s followed by notes of orange, raisins, figs and cinnamon.
TASTE
Abundant spice and dried fruits from Speyside and Highland whiskies are perfectly balanced with vanilla. They release layers of sweet fruits, dark chocolate, toffee and roast nuts.
FINISH
Port Ellen gives a coastal smokiness that gathers momentum through the long finish.
baxus_class_name: Johnnie Walker & Sons King George V

name: Wild Turkey Handle 1981 Bottling
description: An old expression of Wild Turkey's brown label bourbon bottled at 86.8 proof.
