description: Distilled in 2001 from their wheated bourbon mashbill, this expression from Buffalo Trace entered the barrel at an exceptionally low proof of just 90. Matured for 11 years it was bottled in 2013 at 90 proof as part of the experimental collection.
baxus_class_name: Buffalo Trace 2001 11 Year Experimental Collection Wheat 90

name: Buffalo Trace 2013 Single Barrel For Angel's Share Bottled 2021
description: A special single barrel pick of Buffalo Trace distilled in 2013 and bottled in 2021 exclusively for Angel's Share. Bottled at 45% Abv this cask was matured for over 8 years.
baxus_class_name: Buffalo Trace 2013 Single Barrel For Angel's Share Bottled 2021

name: Buffalo Trace 2001 8 Year Experimental Collection Wheat On Rye
description: Distilled in 2001 this experimental expression from Buffalo Trace was crafted from their signature wheat grain mashbill. After 7 years of maturing this wheated bourbon was recasked into an ex-rye cask and matured for another year before being bottled at 63.5% Abv.
baxus_class_name: Buffalo Trace 2001 8 Year Experimental Collection Wheat On Rye

name: Macallan Enigma - 2017
description: The Macallan Enigma is the pinnacle of the Quest Collection. Each single malt within the range is an exploration of flavour and texture. From vibrant and fresh through to rich and intense this is a whisky that signifies the essence of The Macallan.

name: Michter’s 10 Year Bourbon - 2018
description: From the distiller: "Michter’s 10 Year Kentucky Straight Bourbon reflects the exceptional results of uncompromising craftsmanship and Kentucky’s unrivaled climate for aging outstanding whiskey. Often much older than the age statement on the label, only a select few barrels age with the elegance required for inclusion in this highly limited release. Mature in age and truly exceptional in quality, Michter’s 10 Year Single Barrel Kentucky Straight Bourbon has earned its place as an enduring favorite of the most discerning whiskey connoisseurs. The “Best American Whiskey” according to Food & Wine magazine, our 10 Year Single Barrel Bourbon represents the culmination of over a decade of patient aging in specially chosen, new charred American white oak barrels. "

name: Ardbeg 17 Year
description: This Ardbeg 17 year old is a peated single malt Scotch whisky that is aged in a combination of bourbon barrels and sherry casks. It has a complex flavor profile with notes of peat smoke, citrus fruits, honey, and vanilla.

name: Tomintoul 1967 Bottled 2017 Samaroli
description: For over 40 years, Silvano Samaroli has been bottling and releasing high quality whiskies under the Samaroli and Coilltean International labels. Over the years he has developed a reputation for selecting only of the finest examples of single malt whisky and rum. Tomintoul Distillery is located inside the picturesque Glenlivet estate, within the whisky-producing region of Speyside. The distillery is named after the nearby village of Tomintoul, the highest village in the Highlands of Scotland.

name: Macallan Terra - 2017
description: Each single malt within the range is an exploration of flavour and texture from vibrant and fresh through to rich and intense concluding with a whisky that signifies the essence of The Macallan. The Macallan Terra represents the story of discovery in the Quest Collection journey in this balanced and complex whisky.

name: Glenfarclas 2009 10 Year Single Cask #1446 The Stillmen's Dram
description: A 2009 vintage single cask expression of Glenfarclas matured for 10 years. It was bottled at 60.1% Abv and chosen by the Stillmen of Glenfarclas exclusively for the distillery visitor centre.
baxus_class_name: Glenfarclas 2009 10 Year Single Cask #1446 The Stillmen's Dram

name: Kavalan Sherry Oak - 2017
description:
The Kavalan Sherry Oak Single Malt Whisky is a luxurious offering from Taiwan's acclaimed Kavalan distillery. This expression is a testament to the distillery's commitment to producing whiskies of exceptional quality and character. Matured in high-quality Sherry casks, this whisky captures the essence of the rich, fruity character of Sherry, combined with Kavalan's signature spirit profile. The result is a whisky that is both rich and harmoniously balanced, offering a delightful tasting experience.

Originating from the King Car Distillery in Yilan County, Taiwan, this whisky is bottled at an ABV of 46%. The Kavalan Sherry Oak is known for its fabulous first-fill sherry cask characteristics, making it a favorite among whisky enthusiasts. It's a reflection of Kavalan's expertise in crafting whiskies that resonate with both traditional and modern palates.

name: Macallan 10 Year Giovinetti - 1980s
description: A bottle of The Macallan 10 Year Old Single Highland Malt Scotch Whisky matured in sherry wood. This was bottled for the Italian market and imported by Giovinetti.

name: Kavalan Vinho Barrique Cask Strength - 2019
description:
The Kavalan Solist Vinho Barrique Cask Strength Single Malt Whisky is an exquisite offering from Taiwan's renowned Kavalan distillery. This expression is part of the distillery's "Solist" series, which showcases the pinnacle of Kavalan's craftsmanship. Matured in hand-selected American Oak Casks that previously held both red and white wine, this whisky has undergone the unique "STR" (Shave, Toast, and Re-char) process, resulting in a rich and multi-layered flavor profile. The distillery's location in Yilan County, with its sub-tropical climate and snow-capped mountains, plays an integral role in the maturation of their whisky.

The Kavalan Solist Vinho Barrique has garnered numerous accolades, including being awarded the "Best of the Best Single Malt" at the 2020 Tokyo Whisky & Spirits Competition. The whisky's captivating mahogany hue, akin to a fine French Cognac, is a testament to its rich maturation process. With no added color and being non-chill filtered, this whisky offers a genuine and unadulterated tasting experience. Each release is unique, with this bottling having an ABV of 54% and a cask number of W130116033. This expression is a must-try for all whisky enthusiasts, promising a sensory journey that is both captivating and memorable.

name: Laphroaig Cask Strength 21 year
description: This limited edition release (only 1427 bottles allocated to the US and 750 in the UK) of Laphroaig's single malt whisky was aged and bottled from 9 select oak casks for at least 21 years. This malt from Islay was bottled at casks' strength of 53.4% ABV.

name: Navan Liquer
description:
This cognac-based liqueur is flavoured with natural black vanilla beans from Madagascar. SADLY NAVAN WAS DISCONTINUED IN 2011 so is no longer available.
The pot still-shaped bottle depicts a vanilla flower with tendrils curling round the bottle. Navan was produced by the makers of Grand Marnier using the same cognac base as their famous Gordon Rouge liqueur.

name: Barbados 22 Year Single Cask Rolling Fork
description: The Founders of Rolling Fork have been long-time admirers of the fine rums being distilled by the powerhouse Foursquare Distillery of Barbados. Thankfully,, the proprietors of that fine establishment are kind enough to let some casks make their way to independent bottlers. When a few casks of rum distilled in 1998 by Foursquare came available, Rolling Fork jumped at the opportunity to bring some of that well-aged rum stateside. The nose smells like someone baked an apple pie in a wood-fired oven using cedar and seasoned oak. In this long-aged rum,, the classic notes of a Foursquare distilled rum,, including floral and citrus make a brief appearance. However,, as may be expected from a rum aged 22 years,, the barrel influence delivers vanilla,, caramel,, and strong baking spice notes. Seasoned oak and baking spice notes take over and lead to a warming cedar and oak finish that lingers. This cask is bottled as nature intended at cask strength,, non-chill filtered,, and without any additives. The yield for this cask was 222 bottles.
baxus_class_name: Barbados 22 Year Single Cask Rolling Fork

name: Kavalan Solist Sherry Cask Strength - 2016
description: From Taiwan's renowned Kavalan distillery comes the Solist Oloroso Sherry Cask Strength Single Cask. This expression is a testament to the meticulous craftsmanship of Kavalan, matured exclusively in sherry casks. The whisky offers a rich profile, characterized by dark fruits and subtle chocolate undertones.

name: Michter's 10 Year Single Barrel Rye 2017 Bottling
description: A 2017 bottling of 10 year old rye bottled from a single barrel by Michter's. Prior to 2015 Michter's was contract producing its spirits at an undisclosed Brown-Forman distillery, rumoured to be Early Times/Old Forester. In 2015 the company established their full scale distillery in Shively, slowly transitioning to their own spirit. This 2017 bottling will have been crafted from spirit contract distilled by Michter's at the undisclosed Brown-Forman site.
baxus_class_name: Michter's 10 Year Single Barrel Rye 2017 Bottling

name: Pappy Van Winkle 23 Year Family Reserve 2015 Bottling
description: A 2015 bottling of Papy Van Winkle 23 year old bourbon crafted from a historic wheated recipe now distilled by Buffalo Trace. Each release of Pappy is hand selected by Julian Van Winkle, the grandson of the original Pappy. Although originally produced using barrels from the closed Stitzel-Weller distillery, since 2002 Julian has had an agreement with Buffalo Trace to use their stocks once his stored barrels ran dry.
baxus_class_name: Pappy Van Winkle 23 Year Family Reserve 2015 Bottling

name: Jameson Special Reserve 12 Year
description: Triple distilled, twice charred, for a rich smooth taste. Charring is an age-old method for invigorating barrels to intensify the taste. Jameson Special Reserve is our tribute to our coopers, who painstakingly give their bourbon barrels an additional charring to reveal their untold richness and complexity. Because every barrel contains secrets; the trick is coaxing them out.

name: Buffalo Trace 1990 16 Year Experimental Cabernet Franc Aged
description: Distilled in 1998 from their #1 rye mashbill this American whiskey was matured in charred American oak casks for 8 years then recasked into French oak ex-Cabernet Franc wine casks. Matured for another 8 years this was bottled in 2007 at 45% Abv at 16 years of age as part of the experimental collection.
baxus_class_name: Buffalo Trace 1990 16 Year Experimental Cabernet Franc Aged

name: Buffalo Trace 2001 14 Year Experimental Collection Floor 1
description: Distilled in 2001 from their #1 rye mashbill, this expression from Buffalo Trace was matured for 12 years. The four barrels chosen for this release were matured on the 1st floor of warehouse K and were bottled in 2014 at 45% Abv as part of the experimental collection.
baxus_class_name: Buffalo Trace 2001 14 Year Experimental Collection Floor 1

name: Highland Park 30 Year Old Pre-2006 Bottling
description: A 30 year old expression from Highland Park in Orkney bottled between 2005 and 2006. The 30 year old age statement was first introduced in 2005 and this screen print version was in production for a very short period, being replaced in 2006. Bottled at 48.1% Abv this mid 2000’s bottling will have been crafted with spirit from the early to mid 1970’s.
baxus_class_name: Highland Park 30 Year Old Pre-2006 Bottling

name: That Boutique-y Whisky Company Port Ellen Batch 6 33 year - 2017
description: Perhaps the most legendary of all the closed distilleries, Port Ellen continues to have a massive following despite its doors being shut over well over 30 years ago. It was founded on the Isle of Islay back in 1825 near the centre of the town that shares its name. Though it was closed for a good portion of the early 1900s, it reopened in 1966, only to be closed in 1983, around the time that many other Scottish whisky distilleries were closed too. Their stock has become rare and sought-after by whisky enthusiasts. This TWBC label features Jon Beach of Fiddler’s Whisky Bar, a notable Port Ellen collector, holding a few items that you might be familiar with if you’ve tasted Port Ellen’s whisky before.
baxus_class_name: That Boutique-y Whisky Company Port Ellen Batch 6 33 year - 2017

name: A Midwinter Night's Dram Act 6 Scene 3 - 2018
description: The 2018 edition of High West A Midwinter Night's Dram is the first in the series to feature a parcel of the distillery's self-distilled whiskey. The release builds upon High West Rendezvous Rye which is a blend of straight rye whiskeys aged between four and seven years old including 95% rye from MGP and an 80% rye 20% malted barley made by High West. For Midwinter the blend is further finished in port casks made from French oak.
baxus_class_name: A Midwinter Night's Dram Act 6 Scene 3 - 2018

name: 1955 Chateau de Laubade Bas Armagnac 1988 Bottling
description: The Château de Laubade Bas Armagnac 1955 is a rare and exceptional Armagnac that is sure to impress even the most discerning whisky lovers. It has been aged for over 33 years, developing complex flavors of dried fruits, honey, and spices. The finish is long and lingering, with a touch of warmth.
baxus_class_name: 1955 Chateau de Laubade Bas Armagnac 1988 Bottling

name: Hakushu 18 year Limited Edition
description:
The Hakushu 18 Years Limited Edition is a distinguished single malt Japanese whisky, originating from one of the most esteemed distilleries in Japan. This particular edition is presented in a bamboo wooden box, adorned with a captivating painting, making it not only a treat for the palate but also a visual delight. Made exclusively from malted barley, this whisky is a testament to the meticulous craftsmanship and tradition of Japanese whisky-making.

Suntory, one of the largest makers of alcoholic beverages globally, is the powerhouse behind favorites like Yamazaki, Hibiki, and of course, the Hakushu. The Hakushu 18 Years Limited Edition remains as popular as ever, showcasing the rich heritage and expertise of the distillery. With its deep flavors and refined presentation, it's a perfect addition to any whisky collection. Whether you're a seasoned connoisseur or new to the world of Japanese whiskies, the Hakushu 18 Years Limited Edition promises an unparalleled experience.

name: Lochlea Harvest Edition First Crop - 2022
description:
Matured in Port, Oloroso Sherry & Bourbon casks, and inspired by the end of summer, when our golden barley is ready to be harvested and used for the next year’s production. We chose a coral red label to reflect the beautiful Ayrshire sunsets we experience on the farm.
Nose:	Stewed apples, pear drops, oat biscuits
Palate:	Strawberries, violet, toasted marshmallows
Finish:	Signature Lochlea cereal, freshly cut grass

name: Knob Creek 18 Year Batch KC002
description: The second batch of Jim Beam's very well matured 18 year old released in the Knob Creek label. Batch KC002 is crafted from Jim Beam's low rye mashbill of 75% corn, 13% rye and 12% malted barley. Matured for almost two decades this old aged bourbon is a testament to the deep stocks of whiskey available at Jim Beam.

name: Maker’s Mark Personally Selected For - 1970s
description: Taylor William "Bill" Samuels Snr started out in the whiskey industry at his family's T.W. Samuels distillery in the 1930s. When his father, Lesley Samuels, died in 1936, Bill inherited the running of the place, which he did so until 1942 when he sold it and its brands to Country Distillers Products. Bill has initially intended to retire to his farm, but the allure of creating a new bourbon proved too much, and he set about canvassing help in producing the recipe for the smoothers tasting whiskey that he has campaigned for and failed to get the family to distil over a decade prior. Among those who he reached out to were Hap Motlow of Jack Daniel's, Ed Shapira of Heaven Hill, and the legendary Julian 'Pappy' Van Winkle I. Pappy's wheated Old Weller and Old Fitzgerald bourbon were exactly the profile that Samuels was after, and with Van Winkle's help, he debuted finessed his own wheat mashbill, and bought land in Loretto, Kentucky in 1953. He filled his first barrels the following year, and in the years that preceded his first bottlings, Bill's wife Margie created the Maker's Mark brand based on her collections of fine English pewter stamps. The first bottle of Maker's Mark was bottled on 8th May 1958, and was hand-dipped with red wax, as all bottles still are to this day.   The VIP series are bottled in replicas of an 1870s glass in the distillery museum. They are individually labelled with personalised messages.
series: Personally Selected For Hazel And Joe

name: Buffalo Trace 1998 15 Year Experimental Collection Standard Stave Dry Time
description: Distilled in 1998 from Buffalo Trace's #1 rye mashbill it was matured for 15 years in barrels that had been air dried for 6 months. Bottled in 2013 at 45% Abv as part of their experimental collection.
baxus_class_name: Buffalo Trace 1998 15 Year Experimental Collection Standard Stave Dry Time

name: Russell’s Reserve 2003 16 Year Old
description: Russell’s Reserve 2003 is the third release in the “Vintage” series from Master Distiller Eddie Russell as a homage to his father, Jimmy Russell. This bourbon was aged for 16 years in the Tyrone warehouses and marks the very last of the 107 barrel-entry proof whiskey. There were approximately 3,600 bottles released across the United States in 2020.

name: Paul John Classic Select Cask
description: The Paul John Classic Select Cask is an unpeated single malt whisky produced by John Distilleries in Goa. It has been matured in ex-bourbon barrels and bottled without chill-filtration at cask strength. A big meaty nose. Stewed apples and pears freshly-baked sponge cake golden barley and a pinch of salt. Lots of honey on the palate joined by deft spicy notes of cinnamon and cracked black pepper. Glimmers of fruit and dark chocolate. Juicy fruits and a hint of oak. Packed with character this expression is very exciting indeed.

name: Old Forester Birthday Bourbon 10 Year - 2020
description:
With each release, this limited-edition bourbon offers enthusiasts a glimpse into the artistry and tradition that define the Old Forester legacy.

Aged to perfection, Old Forester Birthday Bourbon showcases a depth of character and complexity that reflects the meticulous aging process. Its rich amber hue hints at the depth of flavor within, while aromas of oak, caramel, and spice tantalize the senses.

On the palate, layers of flavor unfold, revealing notes of vanilla, dried fruit, and a subtle hint of leather, all balanced by a velvety smoothness that lingers long after the last sip. Each bottle is a testament to the distillery's commitment to quality and craftsmanship, making it a prized addition to any bourbon enthusiast's collection.

Old Forester Birthday Bourbon is more than just a whiskey; it's a celebration of tradition, innovation, and the enduring spirit of America's native spirit. With each release, it continues to captivate bourbon aficionados and connoisseurs, earning its place as a true icon of the bourbon world.

name: Glenglassaugh Rare Cask Release 42 year - 2016
description: 42 year old single malt from Glenglassaugh, presented as part of their Rare Cask Release Batch 3 - which featured only whiskies aged over 30 years.

name: Yamazaki 18 Year Limited Edition
description:
The Yamazaki 18 Limited Edition is a prestigious single malt Japanese whisky from the renowned Yamazaki distillery. This edition is characterized by its meticulous aging process of 18 years, resulting in a whisky that embodies the essence of Japanese craftsmanship. Presented in a bamboo wooden box, this whisky is not only a sensory delight but also a visual masterpiece, making it a sought-after addition to any collection.

The Yamazaki 18 Limited Edition is a testament to the distillery's commitment to producing top-tier whiskies. With its deep flavors and refined presentation, it stands as a hallmark of Japanese whisky excellence. This special edition is recognized for its rich flavors, including dried fruits and a hint of smokiness, reminiscent of the large casks used during maturation.

name: Buffalo Trace 2001 11 Year Experimental Collection Wheat 115
description: Distilled in 2001 this bourbon was crafted from their wheated mashbill and entered the barrel at 115 proof. Left to matured for 11 years it was bottled in 2013 at 45% Abv as part of their experimental collection.
baxus_class_name: Buffalo Trace 2001 11 Year Experimental Collection Wheat 115

name: Nashville Barrel Co 8 Year Single Barrel Rye #22 For Angel's Share
description: A single barrel expression of rye whiskey matured for 8 years and bottled at 56.8% abv by Nashville Barrel Company. This barrel was distilled in Indiana and was chosen by Angel's Share Bourbon Society.
baxus_class_name: Nashville Barrel Co 8 Year Single Barrel Rye #22 For Angel's Share

name: Johnnie Walker Gold Label
description: From the distiller: "Johnnie Walker Gold Label Reserve is the Celebration Blend, a personal creation of Master Blender Jim Beveridge for very special nights out with very special friends. Included in the blend is the Clynelish Single Malt, whose distillery was fed with water from hills where gold was once discovered. Johnnie Walker Gold Label Reserve is every bit as luxurious and indulgent as its name suggests."

name: Hine Triomphe 4/5 Quart Fine Grande Champagne
description: Hine Triomphe Cognac is a blend of eaux-de-vie from the Grande Champagne cru, the premier cru of Cognac. The eaux-de-vie have been aged for many years in oak casks. This is a rare and exceptional Cognac that is sure to impress even the most discerning Cognac lovers. It is a perfect gift for those who appreciate fine spirits. It is also a great addition to any Cognac collection.
baxus_class_name: Hine Triomphe 4/5 Quart Fine Grande Champagne

name: Buffalo Trace 2001 11 Year Experimental Collection Wheat 125
description: Distilled in 2001 this bourbon was crafted from their wheated mashbill and entered the barrel at 125 proof. Left to matured for 11 years it was bottled in 2013 at 45% Abv as part of their experimental collection.
baxus_class_name: Buffalo Trace 2001 11 Year Experimental Collection Wheat 125

name: Lux Row 2010 12 Year Double Barrel Signed Bottle
description: A blend of two barrels, this 2010 vintage release from Luz Row was matured for 12 years and bottled at 59.2% Abv. This specific bottle was signed.
baxus_class_name: Lux Row 2010 12 Year Double Barrel Signed Bottle

name: Ardbeg 1998 Single Hogshead #2763 Bottled 2009
description: An old single-cask bottling of Ardbeg from the 1998 vintage. This was matured in refill sherry cask 2763 for 11 years, before 270 bottles were yielded in November 2009.

name: Glenmorangie Legends The Cadboll
description: Glenmorangie Distillery is located in the north of Scotland and was named in 1843 after the Scottish Gaelic term Glen of Tranquility. Glenmorangie The Cadboll is part of the Legends Collection. This single malt gets its finish in French barrique barrels in which wine from Musca and Sémillion grapes was previously stored. The whisky lives up to its name. Sweet dry chalky spicy freshly toasted brioche aromas of lemon. Velvety round mineral floral freshly baked biscuits confectionery icing sugar. Long lasting and complex hints of strawberry lemon candy.

name: Old Forester Birthday Bourbon 12 Year - 2021
description:
With each release, this limited-edition bourbon offers enthusiasts a glimpse into the artistry and tradition that define the Old Forester legacy.

Aged to perfection, Old Forester Birthday Bourbon showcases a depth of character and complexity that reflects the meticulous aging process. Its rich amber hue hints at the depth of flavor within, while aromas of oak, caramel, and spice tantalize the senses.

On the palate, layers of flavor unfold, revealing notes of vanilla, dried fruit, and a subtle hint of leather, all balanced by a velvety smoothness that lingers long after the last sip. Each bottle is a testament to the distillery's commitment to quality and craftsmanship, making it a prized addition to any bourbon enthusiast's collection.

Old Forester Birthday Bourbon is more than just a whiskey; it's a celebration of tradition, innovation, and the enduring spirit of America's native spirit. With each release, it continues to captivate bourbon aficionados and connoisseurs, earning its place as a true icon of the bourbon world.

name: Orphan Barrel Rhetoric 24 Year - 2018
description: This is the fifth release of Rhetoric bourbon, part of Diageo's Orphan Barrel series. Since 2014, a new Rhetoric has been released annually, each with an additional year of age and a small bump in proofand price. Last years release was 23 years old, 45.3% ABV. 45.4% ABV Whatever the case, the current 24 year old exists from what one assumes are slowing dwindling bourbon stocks found in the old Stitzel-Weller warehouses in Louisville, Kentucky. It was distilled between 1990 and 1993 at the Bernheim distillery, historically located at 17th and Breckenridge in the same city and at the time owned by United Distillers. Rhetoric 24 Year Old Bourbon, bottled at 90.8 proof, has a mash bill thats 86% corn, 8% barley and 6% rye. Tasting notes suggest an aroma of rich vanilla oak, brown sugar and chocolate. Taste begins with orchard fruit accented with a hint of allspice, and gives way to a warming finish with of nutmeg and caramel notes.

name: Lagavulin 11 Year Offerman Edition 2 Guinness Cask
description: An 11 year old expression from Lagavulin finished in ex-stout casks from Guinness bottled in collaboration with long term Lagavulin lover Nick Offerman. From the popular show “Parks & Recreation ” Nick Offerman portrayed the character of Ron Swanson, who has a slight obsession with Lagavulin the venerable Islay single malt that celebrated its 200th anniversary in 2016. The character’s passion was inspired by that of the actor who plays him Lagavulin and Offerman have been working together since 2014 and in 2019 the distillery honored him with his own special bottling. A number of Offerman editions have since seen release featuring different maturation styles.
baxus_class_name: Lagavulin 11 Year Offerman Edition 2 Guinness Cask

name: Augusta Buckner’s 13 Year
description: At the core of Hard Truth Distilling Co.'s operations is its impressive lineup of craft spirits, particularly its whiskey portfolio. The Indiana-based distillery has gained acclaim for its innovative approach to whiskey production, offering a diverse range of expressions that showcase the team's expertise. Hard Truth's whiskey offerings include sweet mash rye, a variety of bourbon whiskeys, and the unique Schoonover line of barrel-smoked expressions, which utilize distinctive wood finishes like apple and hickory to impart complex, nuanced flavors. To keep up with growing demand for these sought-after whiskeys, the distillery has recently expanded its production capacity, installing larger fermenters and adding new rack houses to increase storage. While Hard Truth has established itself as a premier destination for spirits enthusiasts, set on a sprawling 325-acre campus in scenic Brown County, the distillery's whiskey program remains the centerpiece, reflecting the team's commitment to quality, creativity, and a relentless pursuit of flavor.

name: Russell's Reserve Single Barrel #18-0079 For Whisky Bear 2019
description: A single barrel expression of Wild Turkey bourbon bottled in the Russell's Reserve series. This barrel was chosen in 2019 by Whisky Bear & LBS. It was then proofed to 55% Abv and bottled.
baxus_class_name: Russell's Reserve Single Barrel #18-0079 For Whisky Bear 2019

name: Glenfarclas 20 Year 105 Cask Strength - 2012
description: Glenfarclas 105 is a superb cask strength whisky, with a history that can be traced to 1968. When the original incarnation was released that year, Glenfarclas became the first distillery to release a barrel proof single malt whisky. The bottling was eventually re-named to 105, referring to its alcohol content in British Proof, which equates now to 60% ABV.

name: Jameson Caskmates Angel City
description: This delectable 40% ABV Irish Whiskey starts with a nose of ripe fig, toffee and tobacco notes; tastes of light vanilla, molasses, dried stone fruits and black cherries; and has a peppery finish with a subtle sweetness and that smooth, warming linger that we've all come to know and love from Jameson.

name: Buffalo Trace 1998 19 Year Experimental Collection Zinfandel Aged
description: Distilled in 1988 this American whiskey was crafted from Buffalo Trace's #1 rye mashbill and matured for 10 years in charred oak casks. It was then rebarreled in 1998 into American oak ez-Zinfandel wine casks and left to mature till 2007. Bottled at 45% Abv at a total of 18 years old as part of the experimental collection.
baxus_class_name: Buffalo Trace 1998 19 Year Experimental Collection Zinfandel Aged

name: Islay 1997 17 Year Blended Malt Whiskies Of Scotland
description: A 1997 vintage expression of blended malt whisky sourced from Islay. Matured for 17 years it was bottled at 46% Abv by Whiskies Of Scotland.
baxus_class_name: Islay 1997 17 Year Blended Malt Whiskies Of Scotland

name: Glenfarclas The Family Casks (Release Sp15) 1956-2014
description: A sherry-aged 1956 single malt from the family-owned Glenfarclas distillery, and part of their much-loved Family Casks series.

name: Karuizawa 36 Year Single Cask #5077 Sapphire Geisha
description: A 36-year-old Karuizawa single malt  matured in a single sherry cask for more than three decades before being bottled by Elixir Distillers exclusively for The Whisky Exchange's Karuizawa Geishas series. The bottle features a label designed by creative director Raj Chavda  paying homage to the exquisite  inaccessible beauty of the meiko on her way to become geisha.
baxus_class_name: Karuizawa 36 Year Single Cask #5077 Sapphire Geisha

name: Weller Full Proof Single Barrel Select
description:
Weller Full Proof Single Barrel Select is a premium expression from Buffalo Trace Distillery's renowned Weller line of wheated bourbons. This offering showcases the full potential of individual barrels, bottled at a robust 114 proof (57% ABV) without chill filtration. As a single barrel selection, each bottle represents the unique characteristics of its source barrel, providing a one-of-a-kind tasting experience that can vary subtly between selections.

Typically chosen by retailers, bars, or whiskey clubs, Weller Full Proof Single Barrel Select allows connoisseurs to explore the nuances of Buffalo Trace's wheated bourbon mashbill at its full, uncut strength. While not age-stated, these selections are generally aged for 5 to 8 years, developing a complex flavor profile that balances the sweetness of wheat with the depth of well-aged bourbon.

The Full Proof expression is particularly prized for its intensity and rich mouthfeel, offering a more robust experience compared to other Weller offerings. Its high proof and lack of chill filtration preserve the bourbon's natural oils and flavor compounds, resulting in a full-bodied whiskey that showcases the distillery's craftsmanship. Due to its limited availability and the reputation of the Weller brand, Weller Full Proof Single Barrel Select has become highly sought after by bourbon enthusiasts, often commanding premium prices and generating significant excitement when released.
baxus_class_name: Weller Full Proof Single Barrel Select

name: Jameson Caskmates Bale Breaker
description: Jameson Irish Whiskey heightens their collaboration with local Washington tastemaker, Bale Breaker Brewing Co, with the release of Jameson Caskmates Topcutter IPA Limited Edition. This latest Caskmates Edition was conceived when Bale Breaker travelled to Ireland to brew their signature beer, Topcutter IPA, to season Jameson casks. The Jameson Blenders then used these beer-seasoned casks to create Jameson Caskmates Topcutter IPA Limited Edition, pairing together each liquid’s unique flavor – the smooth taste of Jameson with the hoppy characteristics and distinct flavors of Bale Breaker’s signature Topcutter IPA.

name: Talisker 18 Year
description: Aged for 18 years in bourbon and sherry casks, this whisky is from the Isle of Skye's oldest working distillery. Talisker is a staple in any Scotch collection.

name: Buffalo Trace 1992 14 Year Old Experimental Collection Zinfandel
description:
Buffalo Trace Distillery began experimenting with recipes and barrel treatments more than two decades ago. Currently there are more than 30,000 experimental barrels of whiskey aging in its warehouses. Each of the barrels has unique characteristics and experimental changes in the mash bill, types of wood, barrel toasts and more. Periodically, an experimental whiskey is bottled and sold on a limited basis.

This whiskey aged for six years and three months in a new American white oak barrel before it was rebarreled into a used American oak Zinfandel barrel. There it was aged for another eight years, making it a total of 14 years old. The expected wine fruitiness is absent in the initial palate, but is replaced with an exciting spiciness. It is not the rye-grain spice normally associated with bourbon, but a grape-vine herbal quality that slides across the tongue and lingers for what seems like forever. This is an epic whiskey with grandeur and grace. Old world quaffing of a vine and field mélange.
baxus_class_name: Buffalo Trace 1992 14 Year Old Experimental Collection Zinfandel

name: Kavalan Vinho Barrique 5 Year - 2019
description: This is the 2019 edition of the Kavalan Solist Vinho Barrique Cask Strength Single Malt Whisky. Matured in American oak wine barrels that have been re-charred to create extra-fruity notes in the spirit, this is a single-cask whisky with notes of melon, mango, citrus, vanilla, oak spice and dates.

name: Ardbeg Lord Robertson for Erskine 10 year - 2010
description: This very rare Islay single cask whisky was distilled at Ardbeg on the 27th April 2000 especially for Lord Robertson's (NATO Secretary General who was born on Islay) charity, Erskine, which provides medical and nursing care for armed forces members.
baxus_class_name: Ardbeg Lord Robertson for Erskine 10 year - 2010

name: Woodford Reserve Batch Proof 2023
description: The 2023 release of Woodford Reserve's batch proof series. This 124.7 proof bourbon was bottled as part of the distillery's Master's Collection, a series which highlights their spirits in uniquely different ways. The batch proof series has grown to be an annual part of the Master's collection and is a blend of all types of bourbon distillate the Kentucky site produces.

name: Kavalan Classic - 2017
description: Kavalan Classic Single Malt Whisky exemplifies the sheer quality of whisky coming out of Taiwan. The craftsmanship of the distillery works with the humid Taiwanese climate to create whisky that is diverse and complex. Fresh and clean the spirit is rich with silky smoothness and hints of tropical fruits mango in particular. ABV : 40%

name: Pappy Van Winkle 15 Year Family Reserve 2016 Bottling
description: A 15 year old expression of wheated bourbon carefully chosen by Julian Van Winkle, the grandson of the original Pappy Van Winkle. Early Van Winkle offerings were crafted from barrels sourced from the legendary closed Stitzel-Weller distillery, but in 2002 Julian struck a deal with Buffalo Trace to use their wheated bourbon once his stored barrels ran empty. This 2016 bottling will have been crafted from Buffalo Trace's wheated bourbon mashbill and carefully blended by Julian Van Winkle.
baxus_class_name: Pappy Van Winkle 15 Year Family Reserve 2016 Bottling

name: Buffalo Trace 2001 12 Year Experimental Collection Floor 9
description: Distilled in 2001 from their #1 rye mashbill, this expression from Buffalo Trace was matured for 12 years and crafted from 4 barrels matured on the 9th floor of warehouse K. Bottled in 2014 at 45% Abv as part of the experimental collection.
baxus_class_name: Buffalo Trace 2001 12 Year Experimental Collection Floor 9

name: Glenmorangie 12 Year Barrel Select Release
description: The Glenmorangie 12 Year Barrel Select Release is a distinguished single malt Scotch whisky that showcases the expertise and craftsmanship of the renowned Glenmorangie distillery. This particular expression is aged for 12 years, with a portion of its maturation taking place in specially selected casks, which impart unique and complex flavors to the whisky. The bottle features a striking turquoise label and cap, with the Glenmorangie logo prominently displayed, reflecting the premium nature of the spirit within.

name: Jameson Caskmates Capt. Lawrence
description: What you can find right now is the Jameson Caskmates Captain Lawrence Brewing Co. Edition, aged 2 to 6 months. This sippable dram adopted some of the traits of the barrel’s previous tenant, the Trans-Atlantic Red, so you can expect some chocolate and coffee notes, and a sweet, malty nose.

name: Mackillop's Choice Ellen Cask Strength 31 year - 2014
description: A 1982 vintage Port Ellen from independent bottler Mackillop's. Distilled on May 5 in the year before the distillery closed, this was aged for 31 years before being bottled in March 2014.
baxus_class_name: Mackillop's Choice Ellen Cask Strength 31 year - 2014

name: Buffalo Trace 1993 17 Year Experimental Collection Rediscovered
description: Distilled in 1993 these 8 barrels of American whiskey were matured for 17 years and then rediscovered. Bottled in 2010 at 45% Abv as part of their experimental collection.
baxus_class_name: Buffalo Trace 1993 17 Year Experimental Collection Rediscovered

name: Macallan 25 Year Sherry Oak 2019 Release
description: A 2019 release of Macallan's 25 year old sherry oak expression which sees their signature spirit exclusively matured in European oak sherry casks.

name: Buffalo Trace 1994 14 Year Experimental Collection Fine Grain Oak
description: A 1994 vintage expression crafted from Buffalo Trace's #2 rye mashbill. Matured in a finer style of grain oak cask it was bottled at 14 years of age in 2009 at 45% Abv as part of their experimental collection.
baxus_class_name: Buffalo Trace 1994 14 Year Experimental Collection Fine Grain Oak

name: Macallan Home Collection
description: The Macallan Home Collection, particularly its first release known as "The Distillery", is a testament to the brand's deep-rooted heritage and innovative spirit. The collection, an annual release series, draws its inspiration from the 485-acre Macallan Estate, a stunning testament to natural beauty and history. The estate, located on the banks of the River Spey, was transformed into a flourishing community with the establishment of Easter Elchies House by Captain John Grant and later the foundation of the whisky-making facility by schoolteacher Alexander Reid in 1824​​.  "The Distillery", the first release in this collection, is a celebration of The Macallan's modern distillery building, a design marvel by the globally acclaimed Rogers Stirk Harbour + Partners. The building's roof, blanketed with grass and wildflowers, blends harmoniously with the surrounding landscape, reflecting the brand's commitment to nature and sustainability​​.  In a tribute to The Macallan's traditions and community spirit, the whisky is crafted from a unique combination of European and American oak barrels and refill casks. It features a deep gold color, with a complex nose of sweet spice and a mellowing palate, ending in a rich, medium finish. This sensory experience aims to embody the warm welcome of The Macallan Estate​​.  A key highlight of the collection is the artwork adorning its packaging. Local artist and long-standing Macallan employee Colin Rizza, whose family has been associated with The Macallan for over three decades, crafted a watercolor painting of the distillery for the bottle. This artwork symbolizes not just the scenic beauty of the distillery but also the deep connection and sense of belonging Rizza and his family feel towards The Macallan Estate. His talent in art has been recognized and utilized by The Macallan community in various capacities over the years​.

name: Hakushu 12 Year - 2018
description: A perennial favourite and a must-try for anyone interested in discovering Japanese whisky. Hakushu is owned by Suntory founders of the first Japanese distillery Yamazaki. The original Hakushu distillery was built in 1973 with another distillery building called Hakushu Higashi (east) added in 1981.

name: Wild Turkey 8 Year 1987 Bottling
description:
Wild Turkey 101 8-Year Bourbon, exclusively released in Japan, represents a mature and sophisticated variant of the widely recognized Wild Turkey 101 available in the United States. This 8-year age-stated bourbon introduces a nuanced and refined profile, offering a distinguished tasting experience for aficionados and casual drinkers alike.

Tasting Profile:

Nose: The aromatic profile presents a harmonious blend of sweet and spicy notes, characterized by prominent oak, caramel, nuts, and baking spices. A distinctive citronella candle-like note introduces a subtle blend of citrus and floral elements.

Palate: The palate delivers a balanced sip, introducing spice at the forefront, followed by oak and fruit nuances. Fruit notes, reminiscent of plum and black cherries, are evident, complemented by a subtle vanilla undertone. The complexity and refinement are enhanced by the 8-year aging process, presenting a profile that is roasty, oaky, and spice-forward, with a subtle oaky nuance.

Finish: The finish is characterized by sweet, spicy, and slightly nutty notes, with a lingering presence of fruit leathers and a pronounced oak note. It concludes with toasted caramel, brown sugar, savory citrus, butterscotch, and subtle hints of cola and white pepper, providing a classic and satisfying end.

When compared to other Wild Turkey offerings, the 8-year variant of Wild Turkey 101 demonstrates a notable increase in complexity and refinement. While maintaining the signature boldness synonymous with Wild Turkey, this expression introduces it with a well-articulated Kentucky grace. Although it may not encapsulate the rich oak, medicinal cherry, and sweet leather of the 12-year export, the toffee, caramel, and savory citrus notes of the 8-year version are sufficiently compelling to captivate the palate.

name: Macallan 12 Year
description: Deliciously smooth with rich dried fruits and sherry balanced with woodsmoke and spice. Described by F Paul Pacult the renowned international whisky writer in his book Kindred Spirits as 'simply the best 12 Year Old single malt around'.

name: Macallan 1978 18 Year Old Sherry Oak
description: Distilled in 1978 this fully sherry matured expression from Macallan was aged for 18 years. Beginning with a 1965 vintage, the 18 year old sherry oak is an annual release from the esteemed Speyside distillery that has rocketed to fame and become the most collectible series in Scotch whisky. Vintage expressions of the distillery are sought after due to the use of golden promise barley, a strain noted for creating a robust spirit able to withstand sherry cask maturation.

name: Wild Turkey 8 Year 1992 Bottling
description: An older bottling of Wild Turkey's signature 8 year old age statement bottled at 101 proof in 1992. Older editions of Wild Turkey are particularly sought after amongst enthusiasts, notably for their remarkably different taste profile to modern Wild Turkey bottles. The distillery originally produced bourbon using cypress wood tanks but these were slowly phased out from 1984 until 1990. The other notable production change came in 2004 when the barrel entry proof was changed to 110, up from 107. The combination of these changes have resulted in serious demand for older vintage bottlings from the much loved distillery, with some believing 1990s era bottlings to be the distillery’s best ever.

name: Michter's Small Batch Unblended American Whiskey
description:
Michter's Unblended American Whiskey is a unique offering from the renowned Michter's brand, which has a rich history dating back to 1753. This expression showcases the distillery's commitment to quality and innovation in American whiskey production.

Unlike traditional bourbon or rye, Michter's Unblended American Whiskey is aged in bourbon-soaked barrels rather than new charred oak. This unconventional approach results in a distinctive flavor profile that sets it apart from other American whiskeys. Bottled at 41.7% ABV, it offers a smooth and approachable drinking experience.

The production process for this whiskey adheres to Michter's philosophy of "cost be damned," emphasizing quality over profit margins. Michter's uses non-GMO grains of the highest grade and employs meticulous production methods, including the use of cage mills for grain processing and a unique approach to filtration that adapts to each individual whiskey's needs.

Michter's Unblended American Whiskey has contributed to the brand's growing reputation in the whiskey world. In 2023, Michter's was ranked number one in the World's Most Admired Whiskies poll by Drinks International, reflecting the high regard in which the brand is held by industry professionals and enthusiasts alike.
baxus_class_name: Michter's Small Batch Unblended American Whiskey

name: Whistlepig Double Malt 18 Year - 2020
description: From the distiller: "WhistlePig Double Malt Rye is our oldest Rye, patiently mellowed for 18 years. Before industrial distillation, America’s original farmers would malt a small portion of their grain to start fermentation, the essential step that turns water and rye into glorious whiskey. As a nod to the farmers, Double Malt Rye is crafted from a mash bill of Rye, Malted Rye and Malted Barley. History aside, these grains unite in a show-stopping Rye Whiskey that stretches far and wide across the flavor spectrum. Its base of 79% Rye delivers bold, peppery spice, while 15% Malted Rye adds soft, floral and earthy character. A final 6% of malted barley brings rich, sweet, toasted notes."

name: Four Roses 8 Year Private Selection OBSK
description: A barrel strength expression of Four Roses chosen from a single cask after 8 years of maturation. It was crafted from the OBSK recipe which uses 35% rye in the mashbill. This barrel was specially chosen by master distiller Brent Elliott and was bottled at 59.8% Abv in 2023.
baxus_class_name: Four Roses 8 Year Private Selection OBSK

name: Four Roses 10 Year Private Selection OBSK
description: A barrel strength expression of Four Roses chosen from a single cask after 10 years of maturation. It was crafted from the OBSK recipe and bottled at 51% Abv.
baxus_class_name: Four Roses 10 Year Private Selection OBSK

name: Augusta Old Route 8
description: Augusta Old Route 8 Year is a distinguished bourbon whiskey crafted by Augusta Distillery, located on the limestone banks of the Ohio River in Kentucky. This single barrel, cask strength bourbon is aged for 8 years, embodying the rich heritage of Kentucky bourbon-making. Named after the historic thoroughfare, Old Route 8, this bourbon connects the past and present of bourbon tradition. It is produced using a mash bill of 78% corn, 13% rye, and 9% malted barley, and is known for its robust character and complexity, reflecting the meticulous aging process. The distillery prides itself on creating unfiltered, full cask strength bourbons that honor the legacy of the region's whiskey production.

name: Jameson Gold Reserve
description: Gold Reserve is comprised of three different pot still whiskeys and one grain whiskey. Of the pot still whiskeys, one is aged in virgin American oak for 8-10 years, one in ex-bourbon for 10-20 years, and one in ex-sherry for 10-12 years

name: Buffalo Trace 1997 11 Year Experimental Collection Double Barreled
description: Distilled in 1997 from their high rye mashbill #2 this bourbon was recasked in 2001 and left to matured for 11 years in total, being bottled at 45% Abv in 2009 as part of their experimental collection.
baxus_class_name: Buffalo Trace 1997 11 Year Experimental Collection Double Barreled

name: Talisker Neist Point
description: Initially launched for travel retail Talisker Neist Point is named after Skye's most westerly point with the lighthouse depicted on the fold out box. It's a no age statement release that's said to use some of their finest rare casks that have been left to rest longer alongside younger whiskies to create the desired flavour experience.

name: Kavalan Vinho Barrique - 2017
description: This is the 2017 edition of the Kavalan Solist Vinho Barrique Cask Strength Single Malt Whisky. Matured in American oak wine barrels that have been re-charred to create extra-fruity notes in the spirit, this is a single-cask whisky with notes of melon, mango, citrus, vanilla, oak spice and dates.

name: Bardstown 6 Year Single Barrel Private Selection
description: A 6 year old expression from Bardstown Bourbon Company. This single barrel bourbon was crafted at their Bardstown distillery from a high rye mashbill of 60% corn, 36% rye and 4% malted barley. Pulled from warehouse B this single barrel was sourced from floor 5 and bottled at 60.65% Abv.
baxus_class_name: Bardstown 6 Year Single Barrel Private Selection

name: Thomas H. Handy 6 Year 2022 Release
description: A 2022 release of 6 year barrel strength rye whiskey from Buffalo Trace. This year's batch is bottled at 130.9 proof/ 65.45% Abv.

name: Whistlepig Double Malt 18 Year - 2019
description: From the distiller: "WhistlePig Double Malt Rye is our oldest Rye, patiently mellowed for 18 years. Before industrial distillation, America’s original farmers would malt a small portion of their grain to start fermentation, the essential step that turns water and rye into glorious whiskey. As a nod to the farmers, Double Malt Rye is crafted from a mash bill of Rye, Malted Rye and Malted Barley. History aside, these grains unite in a show-stopping Rye Whiskey that stretches far and wide across the flavor spectrum. Its base of 79% Rye delivers bold, peppery spice, while 15% Malted Rye adds soft, floral and earthy character. A final 6% of malted barley brings rich, sweet, toasted notes."

name: Wild Turkey 8 Year 1988 Bottling
description: An older bottling of Wild Turkey's signature 8 year old age statement bottled at 101 proof in 1988. Older editions of Wild Turkey are particularly sought after amongst enthusiasts, notably for their remarkably different taste profile to modern Wild Turkey bottles. The distillery originally produced bourbon using cypress wood tanks but these were slowly phased out from 1984 until 1990. The other notable production change came in 2004 when the barrel entry proof was changed to 110, up from 107. The combination of these changes have resulted in serious demand for older vintage bottlings from the much loved distillery, with some believing 1990s era bottlings to be the distillery’s best ever.

name: Douglas Laing Port Ellen XOP 35 Year - 2018
description: Douglas Laing's XOP (Xtra Old Particular) is the best of the best from the Douglas Laing family vaults. This range of rare aged Single Malt and Single Grain Scotch Whiskies is bottled exactly the way the distiller intended: without colouring or chill-filtration, and at cask strength.
baxus_class_name: Douglas Laing Port Ellen XOP 35 Year - 2018

name: Lagavulin 11 Year Offerman Edition 3 Charred Oak Cask
description: An 11 year old expression from Lagavulin matured in charred oak casks and bottled in collaboration with long term Lagavulin lover Nick Offerman. From the popular show “Parks & Recreation ” Nick Offerman portrayed the character of Ron Swanson, who has a slight obsession with Lagavulin the venerable Islay single malt that celebrated its 200th anniversary in 2016. The character’s passion was inspired by that of the actor who plays him Lagavulin and Offerman have been working together since 2014 and in 2019 the distillery honored him with his own special bottling. A number of Offerman editions have since seen release featuring different maturation styles.
baxus_class_name: Lagavulin 11 Year Offerman Edition 3 Charred Oak Cask

name: Nulu Toasted 6 Year Single Barrel For R/Bourbon
description: A single barrel expression of Nulu crafted from Indiana bourbon sourced from the MGP distillery. Matured for 6 years this barrel was finished in a toasted cask and bottled at 52.3% Abv exclusively for the Reddit community at R/Bourbon.
baxus_class_name: Nulu Toasted 6 Year Single Barrel For R/Bourbon

name: Buffalo Trace 1991 17 Year Experimental Collection Rum Marriage
description: Distilled in 1991, this mature molasses based rum was produced at Buffalo Trace on their column still. Distilled to a crazy high 188 proof it was then heavily diluted to 104.8 proof on barrel entry. Two charred white oak barrels were used for its production, one was a fresh virgin oak barrel and the other a used barrel. Left to mature for 17 years the rum was bottled in 2008 at 45% Abv as part of the experimental collection.
baxus_class_name: Buffalo Trace 1991 17 Year Experimental Collection Rum Marriage

name: Whistlepig The Boss Hog VII 17 Year
description: From the distiller: "Inspired by the first recorded circumnavigation of the globe, The Boss Hog VII: Magellan’s Atlantic is a Straight Rye Whiskey with an uncharted cask journey that stretches across continents. After seventeen years of slumber in American Oak, it first encounters new Spanish staves from the mountainous forests of northern Spain; a cask nearly impossible to tame yet well worth the effort. Crossing the Atlantic the whiskey finds its finish in fragrant South American teakwood."
baxus_class_name: Whistlepig The Boss Hog VII 17 Year

name: Glenlivet Nadurra 16 Year - 2014
description: Glenlivet Nàdurra 16 year old is a small batch cask strength single malt whisky “nadurra” meaning natural in Gaelic. Based on the alcohol per volume level. This sample is from the batch bottled in January 2014. Starts off with sweet and heavy apricot marmalade and fruity liqueur which turns into chalk licorice. Wee smoke is there too. Crispy and full. Thick and sweet like jam. Occasionally bitter. Green apples tropical fruits and hints of lemon. Bit of oak and vanilla as well. Dry and crispy like bitter orange marmalade with spices and little bit of ginger. Rich thick and freshly fruity dram. Good single malt from the great Speyside distillery.

name: Rosebank 1990 32 Year Vintage Series Release 2
description: Rosebank Distillery, located in Falkirk, Scotland, has a rich history dating back to the early 19th century. Known as one of the Lowland region's iconic distilleries, Rosebank is celebrated for its elegant and floral style of single malt Scotch whisky. The distillery is situated on the banks of the Forth and Clyde Canal, which historically provided transportation for goods and barley to the distillery. Rosebank is renowned for using traditional copper pot stills and worm tub condensers, which contribute to the light and delicate character of its whiskies. Despite ceasing production in 1993, Rosebank remains a beloved and sought-after name among whisky enthusiasts, with plans underway for its revival. The Vintage Release series from Rosebank represents a revival of this cherished distillery's legacy, offering rare and limited expressions of its historic single malt Scotch whisky.

name: Cork Paddy Distillato Di Cereali
description:
Paddy Irish Whiskey, produced by Cork Distilleries Company, has a rich and storied history that dates back to the late 19th century. The company was founded in 1867 through the amalgamation of four distilleries in Cork city: North Mall, The Green, Watercourse Road, and Daly's, with Midleton Distillery joining soon after in 1868. This consolidation aimed to stabilize and enhance the quality of Irish whiskey production during a challenging period for the industry.

In 1882, a young salesman named Paddy Flaherty joined the company and began marketing the company's whiskey, then known as "Cork Distilleries Company Old Irish Whiskey." Flaherty's innovative sales techniques, which included giving out free rounds of drinks, made him a beloved figure in the pubs of Cork. His efforts were so successful that publicans began referring to the whiskey as "Paddy Flaherty's whiskey," leading to the official renaming of the brand to "Paddy Irish Whiskey" in 1912 to honor his legacy.

During the 1920s and 1930s, Cork Distilleries Company became one of the first to bottle their own whiskey, a move aimed at preventing quality fluctuations caused by middlemen diluting casks. This decision helped solidify Paddy's reputation for consistency and quality. The whiskey is triple distilled and matured in oak casks for up to seven years, known for its smooth, light, and balanced profile with a high malt content compared to other Irish whiskeys.

In 1988, Irish Distillers, which had formed through a merger involving Cork Distilleries Company, was acquired by Pernod Ricard. Paddy Whiskey continued to thrive under this ownership until 2016, when it was sold to the Sazerac Company. Today, Paddy remains one of the top-selling Irish whiskey brands globally, celebrated for its accessibility and the legendary spirit of its namesake, Paddy Flaherty.

name: Old Pulteney 1982 Single Hogshead #861 Bottled 2020 Gordon & Macphail
description: A 38 year old single malt from the Pulteney Distillery, this whisky was distilled in 1982 and bottled by Gordon & Macphail for their Private Collection series. One of only 103 bottles filled from a refill American hogshead.
baxus_class_name: Old Pulteney 1982 Single Hogshead #861 Bottled 2020 Gordon & Macphail

name: Southern Comfort 1980s
description: Southern Comfort is a unique American liqueur with a rich heritage, originally created in the late 19th century. It blends whiskey, fruit, and spices to create a distinctive flavor profile. Southern Comfort offers a warm and inviting aroma with notes of peach, orange, and a hint of cinnamon. The palate is smooth and flavorful, featuring a blend of sweet fruitiness, subtle spices, and a touch of whiskey character. The finish is soft and slightly sweet, making it a versatile spirit that's perfect for sipping neat, over ice, or in a wide range of cocktails. With its signature taste and easy-drinking nature, Southern Comfort has become a beloved choice for those seeking a classic yet approachable spirit.

name: Wild Turkey 12 Year Split Label 1995 Bottling
description: A 12 year old expression of Wild Turkey bottled at their signature 101 proof strength in 1995. Older editions of Wild Turkey are particularly sought after amongst enthusiasts, notably for their remarkably different taste profile to modern Wild Turkey bottles. The distillery originally produced bourbon using cypress wood tanks but these were slowly phased out from 1984 until 1990. The other notable production change came in 2004 when the barrel entry proof was changed to 110, up from 107. The combination of these changes have resulted in serious demand for older vintage bottlings from the much loved distillery, with some believing 1990s era bottlings to be the distillery’s best ever.
baxus_class_name: Wild Turkey 12 Year Split Label 1995 Bottling

name: Habondia Peach Brandy
description: A premium peach brandy produced from Missouri peaches. The label features the Celtic Goddess Habondia, associated with abundance and prosperity.

name: Douglas Laing Macallan XOP - The Black Series 26 year - 2020
description: Douglas Laing & Co has added a 26-year-old Macallan 1993 Vintage to its XOP The Black Series, which matured for 26 years in an ex-refill butt.
baxus_class_name: Douglas Laing Macallan XOP - The Black Series 26 year - 2020

name: Macallan 1980 18 Year Old Sherry Oak
description: Distilled in 1980 this fully sherry matured expression from Macallan was aged for 18 years. Beginning with a 1965 vintage, the 18 year old sherry oak is an annual release from the esteemed Speyside distillery that has rocketed to fame and become the most collectible series in Scotch whisky. Vintage expressions of the distillery are sought after due to the use of golden promise barley, a strain noted for creating a robust spirit able to withstand sherry cask maturation.

name: Bond & Lillard Batch #2
description: Campari Whiskey Barons Collection Batch #2 – non-age-stated KSBW (reportedly aged “a minimum of seven years”) – charcoal filtered and bottled at 100 proof – distilled and bottled by The American Medicinal Spirits Co. (reportedly produced at the Wild Turkey Distillery) Lawrenceburg KY. Rich amber hints of WT 101 Rye butter toffee vanilla spice caramel drizzle fragrant oak honey lemon zest clove herbal & floral spice. Tastes of caramel vanilla icing white pepper charred oak herbal tea clove nutmeg hints of leather medium-long – toasted vanilla spicy oak clove cinnamon sassafras pepper orange peel faint tobacco & leather. It’s no W. B. Saffell. Batch 1 is lighter with a touch more of a youthful vibe while batch 2 is bolder with an undeniable Wild Turkey backbone. It seems even hints of Eddie Russell’s signature profile presentations are hard to miss.

name: Buffalo Trace 1991 19 Year Experimental Collection Rediscovered
description: Filled on October 29, 1991, these eight barrels had an unknown still proof and entry proof. Aging for 19 years the barrels were rediscovered and bottled in 2010 at 45% Abv as part of the experimental collection.
baxus_class_name: Buffalo Trace 1991 19 Year Experimental Collection Rediscovered

name: High West Rendezvous Rye Barrel Select
description:
Rendezvous Rye Barrel Select is a premium, small-batch rye whiskey crafted by High West Distillery. This exceptional spirit is a limited edition, hand-selected expression of the distillery's renowned Rendezvous Rye. It features a unique blend of straight rye whiskeys, meticulously aged and bottled at a higher proof to highlight its rich flavors.

The nose of Rendezvous Rye Barrel Select offers enticing aromas of dark fruit, baking spices, and a hint of caramel. On the palate, it reveals a complex profile with bold notes of cinnamon, nutmeg, and clove, balanced by sweet undertones of vanilla and honey. The finish is long and satisfying, with a warm spice that lingers beautifully.

This rye whiskey showcases the craftsmanship and expertise of High West Distillery, making it a sought-after choice for rye enthusiasts and connoisseurs. Whether enjoyed neat, with a splash of water, or in a classic cocktail, Rendezvous Rye Barrel Select delivers a memorable and refined experience.
baxus_class_name: High West Rendezvous Rye Barrel Select

name: Del Maguey San Luis
description: Del Maguey San Luis del Rio Azul is made with maguey Azul, which is traditionally used in Tequila. During the agave scarcity in 2000-2004, Jalisco truckers came down to Oaxaca to purchase Espadin from producers like Paciano Cruz Nolasco in order to sustain their tequila production. They brought with them baby maguey Azul to plant in case there was ever another shortage. Seven years later this maguey Azul was mature and ready to be harvested. Azul has a distinctively creamy mouth feel with bright citrus notes of dried tropical fruit.  A sweet green herbaceous, wet stone quality appears with a touch of white peppercorn and a medium long finish.

name: Smooth Ambler 7 Year Old Scout Batch One
description: The first batch of Old Scout's 7 year old Smooth Ambler brand. This straight bourbon was sourced from Indiana and bottled at 49.5% Abv by Old Scout from West Virginia.
baxus_class_name: Smooth Ambler 7 Year Old Scout Batch One

name: Buffalo Trace 1994 14 Year Experimental Collection Coarse Grain Oak
description: Distilled in 1994 from their #2 rye mashbill, this expression from Buffalo Trace was matured in a coarse grain oak cask. Air dried for a shorter 3 month period it was bottled at 14 years and 9 months in 2009. Released at 45% Abv as part of the experimental Collection.
baxus_class_name: Buffalo Trace 1994 14 Year Experimental Collection Coarse Grain Oak

name: Redbreast Iberian Series PX - 2021
description: The new whiskey is called Redbreast PX Edition – it is matured in ex-bourbon and Oloroso sherry casks before being finished for 12-22 months in Pedro Ximénez hogsheads seasoned at the Páez Lobato cooperage in Jerez. While the wine itself was produced outside of the sherry triangle, it spent two years in Jerez and can therefore legally be called PX sherry – an exception that only exists for Pedro Ximénez.

name: Douglas Laing Ardbeg Old & Rare - A Platinum Selection 20 year - 2011
description: Ardbeg 20 Year Old Islay single malt Scotch whisky. Douglas Laing Old & Rare Platinum Selection. Single cask refill hosghead distilled March 1991 and bottled November 2011 at full strength. 128 numbered bottles.
baxus_class_name: Douglas Laing Ardbeg Old & Rare - A Platinum Selection 20 year - 2011

name: Heaven Hill 10 Year One Liter 1980s
description:
Heaven Hill 10 Year Old from the 1980s is a highly sought-after bourbon that represents a significant era in American whiskey history. This expression was distilled and bottled during a time when Heaven Hill was experiencing remarkable growth, despite the overall bourbon industry facing challenges.

During the 1980s, Heaven Hill was gaining recognition for offering high-quality bourbon at competitive prices. This 10-year-old expression would have been part of their premium lineup, demonstrating the distillery's commitment to aged whiskeys at a time when many producers were focusing on younger spirits.

Bottles of Heaven Hill 10 Year Old from the 1980s are particularly valuable to collectors and bourbon enthusiasts. They represent whiskey produced before the devastating 1996 fire that destroyed Heaven Hill's original distillery and seven of its warehouses. This tragic event makes pre-fire Heaven Hill bourbons, like this 10-year-old expression, even more rare and historically significant.

Today, these bottles are highly prized at auctions, with prices reflecting their scarcity and the growing interest in vintage American whiskeys. For bourbon aficionados, tasting this 1980s Heaven Hill 10 Year Old offers a unique opportunity to experience a piece of Kentucky bourbon history.

name: Four Roses Private Selection OESF Maryland 8th Edition 11.5 year
description:
Bottled at 56% ABV, the Four Roses OESF 11 Years 6 Months unveils a unique blend crafted from the 'E' mash bill and 'F' yeast strain, known for its herbal essences.

Tasting Experience: A refreshingly herbal journey beckoning the connoisseurs of complexity.

Nose: Intriguing herbal notes mingled with a touch of delicate floral aroma.

Palate: A balanced dance between mild spice and a subtle sweet undertone, enriched by the gentle hints of mint.

Finish: A soft, smooth finish with a lingering herbal nuance, marking the distinctive character of Four Roses OESF blend.
baxus_class_name: Four Roses Private Selection OESF Maryland 8th Edition 11.5 year

name: Macallan Rare Cask Black
description: This whisky tells a different story of The Macallan spirit and casks, but more than that it tells a story of rarity. Less than 100 casks maturing at The Macallan distillery have contributed to the creation of this out-of-character whisky. These mysterious casks remained untouched in the dark warehouses of The Macallan under the watchful eye of our Master Whisky Maker, until he felt they were ready to be released. Smoky Macallan is rare - there is very little in existence - and once used these casks will be no more. Unexpected and distinctive in flavour with full bodied richness from the Macallan spirit, Rare Cask Black is an unusual smoky spirit that tells a story of creativity and innovation.

name: Buffalo Trace 2001 11 Year Experimental Collection Wheat 105
description: Distilled in 2001 this experimental release used their wheated mashbill entered into the barrel at 105 proof. Bottled in 2013 at 45% Abb as part of the experimental collection.
baxus_class_name: Buffalo Trace 2001 11 Year Experimental Collection Wheat 105

name: Rare Character 2016 7 Year Single Maple Cask Finished Rye
description: Distilled in 2016, cask MAP.R.357 was matured for 7 years and finished in an ex-maple cask. This straight rye whiskey was distilled in Indiana and bottled by Rare Character in February 2024 at 53.6% Abv.
baxus_class_name: Rare Character 2016 7 Year Single Maple Cask Finished Rye

name: Redbreast Small Batch - 2020
description: In November 2019, Irish Distillers released four small batch cask strength batches for its Redbreast Single Pot Still brand. These four batches each matured for 14 years (although there is no-age statement on the bottle) in a mix of ex-bourbon and ex-oloroso sherry casks with different proportions of barrel formulas for each.

name: Miltonduff 1981 31 Year Old Single Cask #4094 Duncan Taylor
description: A 1981 single cask expression of Miltonduff matured for 31 years. It was bottled in 2013 at 50% Abv by Duncan Taylor.
baxus_class_name: Miltonduff 1981 31 Year Old Single Cask #4094 Duncan Taylor

name: Redbreast All Sherry 19 Year - 2018
description: Redbreast is a single pot still whiskey, for which a combination of malted and un-malted barley are triple distilled in copper pot stills. The brand was created by W.A. Gilbey & Co, and bottled using whiskey sourced from Jameson's Bow Street distillery in Dublin. When Jameson amalgamated with Powers and Cork Distillers to form the Irish Distillers group, the Dublin distilleries were closed down, with all production moved to New Midleton distillery in Cork in 1975. Gilbey's discontinued the brand ten years later, but agreed to sell it to Irish Distillers who relaunched it in 1991.

name: Buffalo Trace 1989 21 Year Experimental Collection Rediscovered
description: Seven barrels were filled on November 17, 1989. The still proof and entry proof are unknown. After more than 21 years of aging the barrels were rediscovered and bottled in 2010 at 45% Abv as part of the experimental collection.
baxus_class_name: Buffalo Trace 1989 21 Year Experimental Collection Rediscovered

name: Caperdonich 1992 23 Year Single Cask #411035 Duncan Taylor
description: Duncan Taylor is among the most well-known independent bottlers of Scotch. This is an excellent selection of Caperdonich, distilled in 1992 and bottled in 2015 after 23 years in a single sherry oak cask. Only 64 bottles were produced.
baxus_class_name: Caperdonich 1992 23 Year Single Cask #411035 Duncan Taylor

name: Cats Eye Obtainium 28 Year Bottled for Baxus - 2024
description:
Cat’s Eye Distillery is a small family-owned micro-distillery with a mission to craft truly epic tasting products and uniquely sourced items. John Baker, an owner, honed his distilling skills at Honey Creek Distillery in Van Buren County. Subsequently, extensive research and consultations with 22 micro-distillery owners in Colorado informed their approach. After thorough experimentation, the distillery introduced its inaugural whiskey, “Essence of Iowa,” followed by “Krupnik.”

A special release of the distillery's flagship Obtainium line, this expression was bottled for Baxus in honor of the 150th Kentucky Derby. To reflect that, the 28-year-old Canadian Whisky is bottled at a hearty 150 Proof.
baxus_class_name: Cats Eye Obtainium 28 Year Bottled for Baxus - 2024

name: Buffalo Trace 1993 16 Year Experimental Collection Double Barreled
description: Distilled in 1993 from their #2 rye mashbill, this expression from Buffalo Trace was matured for 8 years and then rebarreled and left to mature until 16 years of age. Bottled in 2009 at 45% Abv as part of the experimental collection.
baxus_class_name: Buffalo Trace 1993 16 Year Experimental Collection Double Barreled

name: Redbreast Small Batch 14 Year - 2019
description: Ireland- Redbreast Small Batch Cask Strength a limited edition release consisting of four different expressions bottled at cask strength. Four batches were married together, each batch offering different flavors while still staying true to the character that defines Redbreast.

name: Bourbon Supreme E-Z Grip Bottle
description:
While the Bourbon Supreme brand exists now as a production aimed at select markets by Luxco, the original bottles sporting this label were produced by the American Distilling Company from Pekin, Illinois. 

The bottle is a half-gallon jug, boasting an "E-Z Grip" with "Built-in Pourer" reminiscent of today's bottom-shelf liquor.

name: Four Roses Private Selection OBSF New York 10.66 year
description:
Bottled at 55.6% ABV, the Four Roses OBSF 10 Years 8 Months epitomizes the fusion of the 'B' mash bill with the 'F' yeast strain, renowned for its herbal nuances.

Tasting Experience: An enigmatic delve into the herbal essence of Four Roses' crafting tradition.

Nose: Herbal notes intertwined with a subtle touch of spice, inviting a layered exploration.

Palate: A harmonious blend of sweet and spicy elements, enriched by a gentle herbal undertone.

Finish: A satisfying, lingering herbal warmth, echoing the meticulous craftsmanship inherent in the Four Roses OBSF blend.
baxus_class_name: Four Roses Private Selection OBSF New York 10.66 year

name: Jameson Gold Special Reserve
description:
Jameson Gold Special Reserve is a distinguished Irish whiskey that has garnered a reputation for its exceptional quality and complexity. Although it has been discontinued, this premium expression from the iconic Jameson distillery remains a sought-after treasure among whiskey enthusiasts and collectors.

Crafted from a blend of three aged whiskeys, Jameson Gold Special Reserve features a unique maturation process that includes aging in a combination of bourbon barrels and sherry casks. This dual aging imparts a rich and nuanced flavor profile, characterized by a harmonious balance of sweetness and spice. 

On the nose, the whiskey reveals enticing aromas of sweet spices, toasty oak, and dried fruit, complemented by herbal and grassy undertones. The palate offers an inviting sweetness, with notes of honeyed fruit and spicy oak, along with subtle hints of fruitcake spices that add depth and character. The finish is well-rounded and satisfying, where oak, spice, and fruit come together beautifully, enhanced by a touch of sherry sweetness and a creamy mouthfeel.

Bottled at 40% ABV, Jameson Gold Special Reserve is celebrated for its rich, chewy texture and overall smoothness. It received critical acclaim, earning an impressive 94 points from Jim Murray's Whisky Bible, a testament to its high quality and craftsmanship.

As a discontinued product, Jameson Gold Special Reserve has become increasingly rare and valuable, making it a coveted addition to any whiskey collection. For those fortunate enough to experience it, this whiskey offers a delightful journey through the rich heritage of Irish whiskey-making.

name: Buffalo Trace 1995 25 Year Old Fashioned Copper
description: Distilled in 19935at the distillery now known as Buffalo Trace, this 25 year old bourbon was bottled at 45% Abv. The O.F.C series features exceptional vintage barrels from Buffalo Trace and is so named to honour the Old Fire Copper distillery which was an original name for the site where Buffalo Trace sits.
baxus_class_name: Buffalo Trace 1995 25 Year Old Fashioned Copper

name: Ardbeg 1991 20 Year Single Hogshead Douglas Laing
description: Ardbeg 20 Year Old Islay single malt Scotch whisky. Douglas Laing Old & Rare Platinum Selection. Single cask refill hosghead distilled May 1991 and bottled April 2011 at full strength. 115 numbered bottles.
baxus_class_name: Ardbeg 1991 20 Year Single Hogshead Douglas Laing

name: Cats Eye Obtainium 28 Year Bottled For Baxus Set - 2024
description:
Cat’s Eye Distillery is a small family-owned micro-distillery with a mission to craft truly epic tasting products and uniquely sourced items. John Baker, an owner, honed his distilling skills at Honey Creek Distillery in Van Buren County. Subsequently, extensive research and consultations with 22 micro-distillery owners in Colorado informed their approach. After thorough experimentation, the distillery introduced its inaugural whiskey, “Essence of Iowa,” followed by “Krupnik.”

A special release of the distillery's flagship Obtainium line, this expression was bottled for Baxus in honor of the 150th Kentucky Derby. To reflect that, the 28-year-old Canadian Whisky is bottled at a hearty 150 Proof. 

This is dual set.
baxus_class_name: Cats Eye Obtainium 28 Year Bottled For Baxus Set - 2024

name: Teeling The Revival Vol. V 12 Year - 2018
description: The Revival Vol. V joins Teeling Whiskey’s range of award winning Irish whiskeys, which have collected over 175 international awards over the last five years. The fifth bottling of The Revival consists of 12-Year-Old Single Malt that was aged initially in ex-Bourbon barrels before being finished in a combination of Cognac and Brandy barrels, imparting distinct hints of toasted almonds and freshly pressed grapes. Limited to just 15,000 bottles, the resulting Single Malt is then bottled at 46% with no chill filtration, a signature of all Teeling Whiskeys.
baxus_class_name: Teeling The Revival Vol. V 12 Year - 2018

name: Brora 1981 26 Year Single Butt #1521 Chieftain's
description: A 1981 vintage single cask expression of the closed and now revived Highland distillery Brora. Matured for 26 years in an Oloroso sherry butt it was bottled at 48% Abv in 2008 by Chieftain's.

name: Imperial 1995 20 Year Single Cask #515463 Duncan Taylor
description: Duncan Taylor is among the most well-known independent bottlers of Scotch. This selection, distilled at Imperial Distillery in 1995 and bottled in 2015 after 20 years in a single sherry oak cask, is a very unique selection. Only 135 bottles were ever produced.
baxus_class_name: Imperial 1995 20 Year Single Cask #515463 Duncan Taylor

name: Wilson and Morgan Port Ellen Barrel Selection 27 year - 2010
description: A 1982 vintage Port Ellen from independent bottlers Wilson & Morgan. Bottled at 27 years old, this was awarded an impressive 91 points by Serge Valentin of whiskyfun.com. He noted it displayed sweetness and grass with a long salty finish.
baxus_class_name: Wilson and Morgan Port Ellen Barrel Selection 27 year - 2010

name: Macallan 1993 30 Year Old Single Cask #3566 Halcyon Spirits
description: Distilled in 1993 this single cask expression of Macallan was matured for 30 years in a 1st fill sherry hogshead. It was chosen by Halcyon Spirits, the independent bottling arm of UK auction house whiskyhammer. Bottled at 49.8% Abv in 2023.
baxus_class_name: Macallan 1993 30 Year Old Single Cask #3566 Halcyon Spirits

name: Lenell's Black Unicorn Stout
description: From Lenell: "Willett bourbon barrel-aged stout! This imperial spent 2 years in my Dark Side of the Moon 15 year old bourbon barrel then conditioned for another 2.5 years in a 22 oz glass bottle. 11% abv. IBU 86.  This is the beer that kissed the 6 year Darker Side of the Moon rye packaged in those gorgeous wooden boxes.  John Lytle Wilson's artwork titled "Enter the Unicorn" is geared for grown folks who can appreciate rare, limited boutique beverages. Horned horses and rainbows 🌈 are symbols of beauty and pride for lotsa grown ass adults."

name: Heaven Hill Select Stock - 2014
description: The additional cognac barrel aging is evident right from the start. Rich is the best way to describe this nose. Toasted sugar vanilla creme brulee dark berries spiced raisins and aged oak lightly dance out of the glass.

name: Cork Paddy Old Irish Whiskey
description:
