The deep and resonate finish on this bourbon is nothing short of legendary. Straight from the barrel is best served neat or with a splash of water. Un-filtered, un-cut, unbelievable.
baxus_class_name: Blanton's Straight From the Barrel 2002 Bottling

name: Booker’s 7 Year Batch C91-L-20
description: Bottled at natural proof of between 121 and 127, this bourbon was aged a minimum of 7 years and offers some of Jim Beam's most skilled craftsmanship.

name: Cambus 1991 25 Year Old Single Cask #HL13051 Hunter Laing
description: Hunter Laing's The Sovereign Cambus 25 Year Old Single Grain Scotch Whisky is a distinguished expression from the now-closed Cambus Distillery, located in the Lowlands of Scotland. The distillery, which ceased operations in 1993, was known for producing high-quality grain whisky. This particular bottling, distilled in 1991 and bottled in 2016, represents a rare piece of whisky history. Aged for 25 years in a single cask, it showcases the craftsmanship and long maturation process typical of the Sovereign range. The whisky is non-chill filtered and presented at natural cask strength, ensuring an authentic and unaltered experience for enthusiasts.
baxus_class_name: Cambus 1991 25 Year Old Single Cask #HL13051 Hunter Laing

name: Jim Beam Gold Label 8 Year
description: An exceptional Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey from the esteemed Kentucky distiller, Gold Label 8 Year Old Bourbon is a high-quality Bourbon Whiskey bottled at 50% ABV. Renowed for its distinctive Whiskey character and one of the finest, most discernible styles produced in Kentucky, this 750ml iteration of Gold Label 8 Year Old Bourbon represents the height of Bourbon Whiskey excellence.

name: Blanton's Straight From the Barrel 2006 Bottling
description: Not only one of the world’s best bourbons, Blanton’s Straight from the Barrel is one of the world’s best whiskeys. Created for connoisseurs familiar with cask strength whiskeys, this enormous taste profile reaches depths of flavor found only in the rarest of spirits. On the nose we get notes of dark chocolate, caramel and butter with earthy undertones of walnut and hazelnut. The palate delivers intrepid notes of warm vanilla, oak, toasted nuts and a rich spiciness with hints of butterscotch or honey. The high alcohol by volume is intense and powerful yet inviting. The deep and resonate finish on this bourbon is nothing short of legendary. Straight from the barrel is best served neat or with a splash of water. Un-filtered, un-cut, unbelievable.
baxus_class_name: Blanton's Straight From the Barrel 2006 Bottling

name: Powers Signature Release
description: From the Irish Distillers' Powers Irish whiskey range comes the Signature Release, a single pot still expression matured mostly in bourbon barrels, with a helping of Oloroso Sherry cask-matured whiskey bringing notes of chewy raisin, red berry and dark coffee.

name: 2006 Cuvée Lalou
description: Of the 12 specific plots in the Maison Mumm vineyard, equally distributed between Pinot Noir from the Montagne de Reims and Chardonnay from the Côte des Blancs, seven were selected for the unique blend of RSRV Lalou 2006 (Les Bionnes, Les Crupots, Les Briquettes, Les Perthes, Hannepés, Les Rochers, Les Houles).

name: Blanton's Gold 1999 Bottling
description: A superb single barrel bourbon. Blanton's Gold is distilled from a mashbill of corn, rye and malted barley. Each bottle is hand filled, sealed, labelled and individually numbered.

name: Macallan Concept 1
description: The first in the series, The Macallan Concept Number 1 celebrates the world’s visionaries by daring to disrupt the whisky making process. Exclusive to global travel retail, The Macallan Concept Number 1 is inspired by surreal art and incorporates innovative production techniques to create an exciting new single malt. Created from whiskies matured first in sherry-seasoned oak casks and then for an equal time in ex-bourbon casks, this single malt is crafted to explore maturation more imaginatively. The knowledge and skills involved in creating this bold and exceptional single malt demonstrates The Macallan’s dedication to pursuing excellence and offering new experiences. It also reflects the unrivalled commitment to the mastery of wood and spirit for which The Macallan has been known since it was established in 1824.

name: Blanton's Straight From the Barrel 2010 Bottling
description: Not only one of the world’s best bourbons, Blanton’s Straight from the Barrel is one of the world’s best whiskeys. Created for connoisseurs familiar with cask strength whiskeys, this enormous taste profile reaches depths of flavor found only in the rarest of spirits. On the nose we get notes of dark chocolate, caramel and butter with earthy undertones of walnut and hazelnut. The palate delivers intrepid notes of warm vanilla, oak, toasted nuts and a rich spiciness with hints of butterscotch or honey. The high alcohol by volume is intense and powerful yet inviting. The deep and resonate finish on this bourbon is nothing short of legendary. Straight from the barrel is best served neat or with a splash of water. Un-filtered, un-cut, unbelievable.
baxus_class_name: Blanton's Straight From the Barrel 2010 Bottling

name: Old Heaven Hill Ultra Premium 21 Year
description: A special release of barrel proof Heaven Hill bourbon. This was distilled at the original Heaven Hill distillery in Bardstown, before it was tragically burned down in 1996. Heaven Hill is now distilled at Bernheim distillery, which was acquired by the company in 1999. This is a very well-aged product from the company, rarely seen officially bottled. This 1990s bottling was exclusively for the Japanese market.
baxus_class_name: Old Heaven Hill Ultra Premium 21 Year

name: Coal Ila 2009 13 Year Sassicaia Finish Connoisseurs Choice Gordon & Macphail
description: A 2009 vintage expression of Caol Ila matured for 11 years in refill bourbon barrels before being finished for 2 years in Sassicaia wine casks. Bottled in 2022 at 45% Abv as part of Gordon & Macphail's legendary Connoisseurs Choice label.
baxus_class_name: Coal Ila 2009 13 Year Sassicaia Finish Connoisseurs Choice Gordon & Macphail

name: Blanton's Single Barrel 2020 Bottling
description: Blanton’s Original was the first bourbon to be bottled from a single barrel back in 1984, revolutionising American whiskey and bringing it back to its former glory. Every batch is unique and the bottling strength of 46.5% helps maintain the authentic character of each barrel.

name: Very Olde St. Nick 101 Winter Rye
baxus_class_name: Very Olde St. Nick 101 Winter Rye

name: Pappy Van Winkle 23 Year Family Reserve 2009 Bottling
description: A 2009 bottling of Pappy Van Winkle 23 year old bourbon. This era of Pappy was crafted from barrels produced at the Stitzel-Weller distillery, the legendary closed distillery that produced Old Fitzgerald. This 2007 era release was bottled at Buffalo Trace after Julian Van Winkle moved his operations to there.
baxus_class_name: Pappy Van Winkle 23 Year Family Reserve 2009 Bottling

name: Blanton's Gold 2020 Bottling
description:
Blanton's Gold is a premium bourbon whiskey that represents a higher-proof variant of the iconic Blanton's Original Single Barrel. Known for its exceptional quality and craftsmanship, Blanton's Gold is primarily available in international markets and duty-free outlets.

This expression is bottled at a robust proof, typically around 103, which enhances its rich flavor profile. On the nose, it offers inviting aromas of caramel, vanilla, and dried fruits, alongside subtle hints of oak and spice. The palate is complex, featuring flavors of rich toffee, brown sugar, and a touch of dark chocolate, balanced by warm spices and a smooth mouthfeel.

The finish is long and satisfying, with lingering notes of sweet oak and spice that invite another sip. The distinctive bottle design and gold label further emphasize its premium status. Blanton's Gold is highly sought after by bourbon enthusiasts for its depth of flavor and smoothness, making it a standout choice for those looking to experience the best of what Blanton's has to offer.

name: Red Spot 15 year - 2022
description: This Single Pot Still Irish Whiskey has matured for over 15 years in a combination of American Bourbon casks, Spanish sherry butts and Sicilian Marsala wine casks, all contributing rich and complex flavours.

name: Blackwood Toasted Rye - 2022
description: Let’s lift a glass to the long shots. Their pursuit made Kentucky the world’s single most important place for the two things essential to civilized life – Thoroughbred horses and whiskey. While the land has been tamed, and glowing cities now crown the Bluegrass, the dedication to pursuit is as strong as ever.

name: Arran 2005 Single Barrique Bottled 2015 Arran Malt & Music Festival
description: The Arran Malt & Music Festival 11 Year - 2015 is a special release from the Arran Distillery, located on the Isle of Arran in Scotland. This limited edition single malt Scotch whisky was crafted to celebrate the annual Arran Malt & Music Festival, a vibrant event that brings together whisky enthusiasts and music lovers. Distilled in 2003 and bottled in 2015, this expression was aged for 11 years in French oak barriques, showcasing the distillery's commitment to quality and innovation. The Arran Distillery, founded in 1995, revived whisky production on the island after a 160-year hiatus, and it has since become known for its artisanal approach and use of pure, local water sources. This festival bottling is a testament to Arran's dedication to producing distinctive and high-quality single malts.
baxus_class_name: Arran 2005 Single Barrique Bottled 2015 Arran Malt & Music Festival

name: Starward Vitalis - 2022
description: Vitalis is a limited edition whisky that commemorates Starward's 15th anniversary.

name: Fiji 2014 Bottled 2018 Transcontinental Rum Line
description: A 2014 vintage expression of molasses based rum sourced from Fiji Produced on a pot still from molasses it matured in Fiji for 2 years before it was then transported to Europe where it matured for a further year. Bottled at over 3 years old at 48% Abv by La Maison & Velier for their Transcontinental Rum Line label.

name: 2006 Perrier-Jouët Blanc de Blancs
description: Perrier-Jouët Blanc de Blancs is a free spirit – vibrant, dynamic, independent. Bright and fresh as the morning dew, it is the perfect champagne to serve as an aperitif, to celebrate the first day of spring.

name: Bunnahabhain 28 Year Untold Riches Wemyss Malts
description: A large vatting of casks of Bunnahabhain crafted from 28 hogsheads and 3 sherry butts all distilled between 1987 and 1991. It was bottled at 49.1% Abv by independent bottler Wemyss Malts.
baxus_class_name: Bunnahabhain 28 Year Untold Riches Wemyss Malts

name: Very Olde St. Nick 12 Year Handmade
baxus_class_name: Very Olde St. Nick 12 Year Handmade

name: Bardstown Origin Bourbon 6 Year - 2023
description: Bardstown Bourbon Company’s new Origin Series features the first officially bottled whiskies made with 100% in-house BBC distillate. The series features a six year old high-rye bourbon, a six year old Bottled-in-Bond wheated bourbon, and a six year 95/5 rye. As always, the labels provide complete transparency about the source, mashbill and age of each whiskey.

name: Very Olde St. Nick Notorious 17 Year - 2024
description: A Very Special barrel of Kentucky Bourbon Distilled in 2007 and aged in Preservation's own warehouse in Bardstown, which is quickly becoming known as one of the best as some of this older juice is finally ready to bottled. This delicious whiskey was dumped and bottled in March of 2024, shortly after turning 17 and very recent cold spell that winter really dried the wood out and made for some seriously extracted whiskey. Most of the barrel's 120 bottle yield were reserved for our Friends and Family.
baxus_class_name: Very Olde St. Nick Notorious 17 Year - 2024

name: Old Weller Original 107 Barrel Proof 7 Year - 1988
description: While the William Larue Weller brand is now produced at Buffalo Trace, this bottle was distilled in 1981 at Stitzel-Weller, one of the most prestigious names in bourbon. Bottled at 107 proof, this is truly a piece of American whiskey history.
baxus_class_name: Old Weller Original 107 Barrel Proof 7 Year - 1988

name: Blanton's Single Barrel 1987 Bottling
description: Born in the winter of 1881, Albert Bacon Blanton entered the esteemed lineage of bourbon heritage. At a mere sixteen years old, he commenced his journey in the Distillery as an office boy, swiftly ascending to become a pioneering force in bourbon's evolution. Assuming the mantle of company president in 1921, he orchestrated a monumental expansion, propelling the Distillery from 44 to 144 buildings, solidifying its status as the era's premier bourbon producer.  Throughout his tenure until his retirement in 1952, Colonel Blanton curated his exclusive and scarce reserve of bourbon—his personal selection—meticulously stored within the hallowed halls of Warehouse H, now an iconic landmark. Though Colonel Blanton passed in the spring of 1959, his legacy endures.  In 1984, Blanton's eponymous bourbon made its debut, marking the inception of the first-ever commercially available Single Barrel Bourbon. A testament to Blanton's unwavering commitment to excellence, the Single Barrel Bourbon stands as a pioneering achievement, forever altering the landscape of bourbon craftsmanship.

name: Kilchoman 2007 10 Year Old Kilchoman Club Sixth Edition
description: The Kilchoman Club 6th Edition 10 Year - 2017 release is a special bottling from the Kilchoman Distillery, located on the Isle of Islay. Distilled on November 1, 2007, this single malt Scotch whisky was matured for ten years in first-fill ex-bourbon barrels numbered 383, 384, 385, 387, and 388/2007. Bottled in 2017, this edition is known for its cask strength, non-chill filtered nature, and natural color, reflecting Kilchoman's commitment to traditional whisky-making methods. This release is part of the Kilchoman Club series, which offers exclusive bottlings to its members, showcasing the distillery's craftsmanship and dedication to quality.
baxus_class_name: Kilchoman 2007 10 Year Old Kilchoman Club Sixth Edition

name: William Larue Weller Texas Sesquicentennial
description: A collectible bourbon whiskey ceramic decanter sold by W. L. Weller in 1986 to commemorate the sesquicentennial fight at the Alamo in 1836. The beautiful decanter has pictures of the Alamo, William Travis, Jim Bowie, Davie Crockett and James Bonham.

name: Crown Royal Fine De Luxe - 1965
description: Crown Royal Deluxe is the standard of excellence for Canadian whisky. It is an extraordinary blend of our finest whiskies, matured to perfection. Nose : Rich and robust, with slight hints of vanilla and fruit. Palate : Delicately smooth and creamy with hints of oak and the sweet flavor of vanilla. Finish : Long and lingering.

name: Kanggye Wild Grape Wine
description: Kanggye Wine produced at the winery is recognized as one of specialties of Kanggye for the favourable medicinal properties as well as unique flavour and aroma. In order to preserve the features of the Kanggye Wine, the winery is directing great efforts to the production of superior grape species by improving their seeds and ensuring good cultivation, and has established scientific winemaking methods.

name: Haig Pinch 1960s Bottling
description: A 1960s era bottling of Haig's signature Pinch blend. Pinch was the American market version of the more commonly known Dimple blend and was crafted from DCL's huge stocks of malt and grain whiskies.

name: Worthy Park 2012 Navy Strength Bottled 2018 Transcontinental Rum Line
description: A 2012 vintage small batch release of Worthy Park from Jamaica matured for 4 years in the tropics before moving to Europe for an extra 1.5 years of maturation. It was bottled in 2018 by La Maison Du Whisky as part of their Transcontinental Rum Line series.
baxus_class_name: Worthy Park 2012 Navy Strength Bottled 2018 Transcontinental Rum Line

name: Glen Elgin 2007 15 Year Cask Strength Carn Mor
description: A 2007 Glen Elgin single malt from bottler Morrison Scotch Whisky Distilleries that was matured in an oloroso sherry butt for 15 years, before being bottled in 2022 as part of its Strictly Limited series.
baxus_class_name: Glen Elgin 2007 15 Year Cask Strength Carn Mor

name: Old Rip Van Winkle 10 Year 2022 Bottling
description: Sweet, spicy, and caramel-nut-fudge aromas. The palate is fruity, medium-to full-bodied with intense dried fruit and toasted nutty notes. The finish is long, bold and peppery, followed by floral honey and charred barrel flavors.
baxus_class_name: Old Rip Van Winkle 10 Year 2022 Bottling

name: Panama 2011 6 Year Transcontinental Rum Line
description: A 2011 vintage expression of molasses based rum sourced from Panama. Produced on a column still from molasses it matured in Panama for 6 years before it was then transported to Europe where it matured for a further 8 months Bottled at over 6 years old at 43% Abv by La Maison & Velier for their Transcontinental Rum Line label.

name: Littlemill 1991 Refill Bourbon Barrels Connoisseurs Choice Bottled 2012 Gordon & Macphail
description: A 1991 vintage expression of the closed distillery Littlemill matured in refill bourbon barrels. Bottled in 2012 at 43% by Gordon & Macphail as part of their legendary Connoisseurs Choice label.
baxus_class_name: Littlemill 1991 Refill Bourbon Barrels Connoisseurs Choice Bottled 2012 Gordon & Macphail

name: Society of Bourbon Connoisseurs 20 Year - 2001
description: An exclusive bottling of Stitzel-Weller bourbon bottled for the Society of Bourbon Connoisseurs. Aged for 20 years and bottled at cask strength, this is a hard-to-find bourbon.

name: Macallan 2007 9 Year Speymalt Gordon & Macphail
description: Distilled in 2007 this offering of Speymalt whisky from the Macallan distillery utilises spirit matured in specially selected casks chosen by Gordon & Macphail. Matured for 9 years it was bottled at 43% Abv.

name: Pyrat Cask 1623
description: It's name originating from the Old English spelling of Pirate, Pyrat 1623 Rum Cask lives up to its heritage, the experience an adventurous voyage across the sun-drenched Caribbean seas. Pyrat 1623 Rum Cask rests in a hand-blown and cork-stoppered glass bottle. It is created from a secretive blend of nine Caribbean pot-still rums and contains rums that even before this blending have been aging for more than four decades. Once blended it is aged further, resting inside hand-selected imported French Limousine and Toasted American sweet oak barrels. These precious casks bestow upon their content a complexity and intense flavor profile.

name: Black Maple Hill 23 Year Cask #1
description: A rye whiskey with a cult following, this very rare Kentucky Straight Rye was matured in a single charred white oak cask for over 23 years, and bottled at 95 proof at the famous Willett Distillery.

name: Blanton's Straight From the Barrel 2009 Bottling
description: Not only one of the world’s best bourbons, Blanton’s Straight from the Barrel is one of the world’s best whiskeys. Created for connoisseurs familiar with cask strength whiskeys, this enormous taste profile reaches depths of flavor found only in the rarest of spirits. On the nose we get notes of dark chocolate, caramel and butter with earthy undertones of walnut and hazelnut. The palate delivers intrepid notes of warm vanilla, oak, toasted nuts and a rich spiciness with hints of butterscotch or honey. The high alcohol by volume is intense and powerful yet inviting. The deep and resonate finish on this bourbon is nothing short of legendary. Straight from the barrel is best served neat or with a splash of water. Un-filtered, un-cut, unbelievable.
baxus_class_name: Blanton's Straight From the Barrel 2009 Bottling

name: Blanton's Gold 2002 Bottling
description: A superb single barrel bourbon. Blanton's Gold is distilled from a mashbill of corn, rye and malted barley. Each bottle is hand filled, sealed, labelled and individually numbered.

name: Michter's 10 Year Single Barrel Rye 2020 Bottling
description: A 2020 bottling of 10 year old rye bottled from a single barrel by Michter's. Prior to 2015 Michter's was contract producing its spirits at an undisclosed Brown-Forman distillery, rumoured to be Early Times/Old Forester. In 2015 the company established their full scale distillery in Shively, slowly transitioning to their own spirit. This 2020 bottling will have been crafted from spirit contract distilled by Michter's at the undisclosed Brown-Forman site.
baxus_class_name: Michter's 10 Year Single Barrel Rye 2020 Bottling

name: Rosebank 1990 31 Year Release 2
description: This limited edition 31 year old Lowland single malt was laid down at the Rosebank distillery in 1990, just a few years before the distillery was mothballed in 1993, and bottled in 2022 as part of the 'Renaissance' by Ian Macleod Distillers, the company responsible for bringing the 'King of the Lowlands' back to life. Triple distilled and un-chillfiltered with an ABV of 48.1%.

name: Garnheath 1974 42 Year Single Cask #DL11116 For K&L Douglas Laing
description: A single cask expression of the closed Garnheath grain distillery bottled exclusively for K&L in the US market. This 1974 vintage single grain whisky was matured for a huge 42 years and bottled in 2016 at 46.3% Abv by Douglas Laing as part of their Old Particular series. Garnheath was the name given to the grain production from the Moffat distillery, a short lived distillery that opened in the 1960s and was closed in 1985.
baxus_class_name: Garnheath 1974 42 Year Single Cask #DL11116 For K&L Douglas Laing

name: Very Very Olde St. Nick 17 Year
baxus_class_name: Very Very Olde St. Nick 17 Year

name: 2013 Perrier-Jouët Belle Epoque Rose
description: True to the free spirit of Maison Perrier-Jouët, Perrier-Jouët Belle Époque Rosé is a resolutely original champagne which combines rarity with the ability to surprise. First created in 1978, it is crafted only in exceptional years and produced in extremely limited quantities.

name: Willett 1984 22 Year Single Barrel Rye #8 For Neal & Doug
description: Distilled in 1984 and sourced from an undisclosed Kentucky distillery, this rye whiskey was left to mature for 22 years! Stored in new charred oak casks barrel #8 was matured in warehouse G on rick N4 and was selected for Neal & Doug. Bottled at a huge 136.7 proof this almost hazmat rye whiskey hails from a legendary period of Willett's history, a period when their warehouses were stuffed full of heavily matured stocks from many closed Kentucky distilleries.
baxus_class_name: Willett 1984 22 Year Single Barrel Rye #8 For Neal & Doug

name: 2013 Perrier-Jouët Limited Edition
description: This great champagne of the purest classicism is presented in its elegant gift case designed by Mischer Traxler, a poetic and mindful perspective to the terroir of Maison Perrier-Jouët and its most essential quality : biodiversity.

name: High West Campfire Batch 14B27
description: A 2014 batch of High West's Campfire blend. This custom crafted whiskey is composed of sourced bourbon and rye whiskies blended together with malt whisky from Scotland. Although never officially confirmed, the peated Scotch whisky is rumoured to be sourced from the Ardmore distillery in the Highlands. This older 2014 batch likely utilises MGP sourced bourbon and ryes as High West typically sourced from the Indiana distillery before creating their own spirits.

name: Blanton's Straight From the Barrel 2009 Bottling
description: Not only one of the world’s best bourbons, Blanton’s Straight from the Barrel is one of the world’s best whiskeys. Created for connoisseurs familiar with cask strength whiskeys, this enormous taste profile reaches depths of flavor found only in the rarest of spirits. On the nose we get notes of dark chocolate, caramel and butter with earthy undertones of walnut and hazelnut. The palate delivers intrepid notes of warm vanilla, oak, toasted nuts and a rich spiciness with hints of butterscotch or honey. The high alcohol by volume is intense and powerful yet inviting. The deep and resonate finish on this bourbon is nothing short of legendary. Straight from the barrel is best served neat or with a splash of water. Un-filtered, un-cut, unbelievable.
baxus_class_name: Blanton's Straight From the Barrel 2009 Bottling

name: Wild Turkey 2011 9 Year Single Cask #20–0676 Single Cask Nation
description: Bottled by the Jewish Whisky Company in 2021, this bourbon originated at the Wild Turkey distillery in 2011. After 9 years in New Charred American Oak barrels, it was bottled for the Single Cask Nation range.
baxus_class_name: Wild Turkey 2011 9 Year Single Cask #20–0676 Single Cask Nation

name: Blanton's Straight From the Barrel 2020 Bottling
description: Not only one of the world’s best bourbons, Blanton’s Straight from the Barrel is one of the world’s best whiskeys. Created for connoisseurs familiar with cask strength whiskeys, this enormous taste profile reaches depths of flavor found only in the rarest of spirits. On the nose we get notes of dark chocolate, caramel and butter with earthy undertones of walnut and hazelnut. The palate delivers intrepid notes of warm vanilla, oak, toasted nuts and a rich spiciness with hints of butterscotch or honey. The high alcohol by volume is intense and powerful yet inviting. The deep and resonate finish on this bourbon is nothing short of legendary. Straight from the barrel is best served neat or with a splash of water. Un-filtered, un-cut, unbelievable.
baxus_class_name: Blanton's Straight From the Barrel 2020 Bottling

name: Cragganmore 1990 21 Year Single Hogshead #8776 For Loch & Key Douglas Laing
description: A 1990 vintage single cask expression of Cragganmore matured for 21 years in a refill hogshead. It was bottled at 50% Abv in 2012 exclusively for Loch & Key Society by Douglas Laing as part of their Old Malt Cask label.
baxus_class_name: Cragganmore 1990 21 Year Single Hogshead #8776 For Loch & Key Douglas Laing

name: Crown Royal 1978 Vintage 1 Litre
description: A signature release of Canadian Whiskey from Crown Royal vatted from casks distilled in or before 1978.

name: Very Olde St. Nick 23 Year
description: Originally created to appeal to the Japanese export market, Very Olde St. Nick is a whiskey label that has since gained acclaim throughout the larger market.

name: Whistlepig 12 Year Batch #TJK2 Single Cask Nation
description: Sourced from an Indiana distillery, this 12 year old batch of rye whiskey was matured in Vermont by Whistlepig. This batch of rye was finished in Tokaji Hungarian sweet wine casks before being chosen by Single Cask Nation for bottling at 57.7% Abv.
baxus_class_name: Whistlepig 12 Year Batch #TJK2 Single Cask Nation

name: Blanton's Straight From the Barrel 2002 Bottling
description: Not only one of the world’s best bourbons, Blanton’s Straight from the Barrel is one of the world’s best whiskeys. Created for connoisseurs familiar with cask strength whiskeys, this enormous taste profile reaches depths of flavor found only in the rarest of spirits. On the nose we get notes of dark chocolate, caramel and butter with earthy undertones of walnut and hazelnut. The palate delivers intrepid notes of warm vanilla, oak, toasted nuts and a rich spiciness with hints of butterscotch or honey. The high alcohol by volume is intense and powerful yet inviting. The deep and resonate finish on this bourbon is nothing short of legendary. Straight from the barrel is best served neat or with a splash of water. Un-filtered, un-cut, unbelievable.
baxus_class_name: Blanton's Straight From the Barrel 2002 Bottling

name: Van Winkle Family Reserve 12 Year - 1980
description: A rare example of 12 year old Van Winkle that is still part of the Family Reserve series, this bottle combines the premier name in bourbon with an excellent vintage and age statement.

name: 2007 Perrier-Jouët Limited Edition
description: Maison Perrier-Jouët unveiled a very limited edition of cuvée Belle Epoque 2007, signed by the Viennese design duo Mischer'Traxler. The creation of the two designers is harmoniously integrated to the existing Perrier-Jouët serigraphy.

name: Macallan Edition No. 6
description: From the distiller: "The sixth and final release in the The Macallan Edition series, Edition No. 6 takes its inspiration from the natural wonders of the legendary River Spey and The Macallan Estate, where each and every cask of The Macallan is matured before being hand-selected for use by our expert whisky makers. All of the five distinct casks types used to create Edition No. 6 have been hand-picked by The Macallan Whisky Maker Steven Bremner. He drew inspiration from unique stories related to the river and surrounding landscape. The American and European oak casks have been selected to create a flavour profile that will deliver a multifaceted experience; from the appealing rich brass natural colour, to the layers of aroma, followed by the deep and rewarding flavour. The legendary River Spey flows through the Estate and is globally renowned as a home to the mighty Atlantic salmon. The Macallan Ghillie is a custodian of the River Spey and advocate for sustaining the wildlife in and around it. On our one-and-three-quarter mile stretch of river, a fortunate few can test their skills in the hope of catching – and releasing – wild Atlantic salmon using Hardy’s incomparable tackle. Wild Atlantic salmon are at risk of becoming an endangered species. Therefore The Macallan are working with the Atlantic Salmon Trust to help raise awareness of this, and to support vital conservation work on the River Spey and beyond."

name: Whistlepig 12 Year Batch #R1V1 Single Cask Nation
description: Sourced from an Indiana distillery, this 12 year old batch of rye whiskey was matured in Vermont by Whistlepig. This batch of rye was finished in rum & vermouth casks before being chosen by Single Cask Nation for bottling at 50% Abv.
baxus_class_name: Whistlepig 12 Year Batch #R1V1 Single Cask Nation

name: Pappy Van Winkle 20 Year Family Reserve
description: From the distiller: "The #1 rated Bourbon Whiskey in the world with a 99 out of 100 rating by the World Spirits Championship. This bourbon is aged 20 years and bottled at 90.4 proof for a wonderfully smooth and rich profile. Pappy Van Winkle was a true character and like its namesake, this bourbon whiskey is full of character – quite a remarkable whiskey."
baxus_class_name: Pappy Van Winkle 20 Year Family Reserve

name: North British 1992 Single Cask #41991 Bottled 2016 Carn Mor
description: A 1992 vintage single cask expression of single grain whisky from the North British distillery. Matured in a sherry hogshead it was bottled at 58.3% Abv by Carn Mor in their Celebration Of The Cask series.
baxus_class_name: North British 1992 Single Cask #41991 Bottled 2016 Carn Mor

name: Kilchoman 2007 11 Year Feis Ile 2018
description: A small batch expression of Kilchoman crafted from 4 bourbon barrels. This edition was bottled at 55.5% Abv in 2018 to celebrate the annual Feis Ile Islay festival.

name: Crown Royal Special Edition
description: An incredibly rare bottling of Crown Royal for the Japanese market, this bottle is as elusive as it is stunning. The whisky within is a strictly limited special edition of Canada's finest whisky.

name: Pappy Van Winkle 15 Year Family Reserve
description: This bourbon was crafted according to our exclusive family wheated recipe. The smooth  oak flavor blends well with the barrel proof. Selected from barrels in the heart of our Kentucky warehouse  this bourbon has remained untouched for 15 years and unhurried by time.
baxus_class_name: Pappy Van Winkle 15 Year Family Reserve

name: G.H. Mumm Blanc De Noirs
description: This is a vintage produced in very limited quantities, and which rests at least 6 years in the cellars of the house before being marketed. Mumm Blanc de Noirs has an intense colour, with an almost coppery gold hue.

name: Michter's Limited Release Barrel Strength Rye - 2021
description: Since the 1990s, the Michter's team has been doing pioneering work to re-establish the high-quality American Rye whiskey category. A single-barrel product, each barrel from this collection is bottled at its particular alcohol level at the time of bottling.
baxus_class_name: Michter's Limited Release Barrel Strength Rye - 2021

name: Boone's Knoll 16 Year
description: A distinctive and high-quality bourbon from an excelent distiller. Aged for 16 years in American white oak barrels, this bourbon is a great example of simplicity trumping complexity.

name: Michter's Toasted Barrel Sour Mash - 2022
description: Upon it being names "Whisky of the Year" for 2019 by the Whiksy Exchange, this Sour Mash Whiskey became the first American-made whiskey to achieve such an honor. It is made by taking Michter's Sour Mash Whiskey and aging it for an additional period of time in a second custom-made barrel.

name: Knockando 1964 Decanter Bottled 1988
description: A very rare 1964 vintage Knockando. Bottled at 21 years old and in a special decanter. This was distilled before the floor maltings at the distillery were decommissioned.

name: Kilchoman Comraich Batch No. 1 - 2017
description:
Nestled beneath the towering cliffs of Creag Mhór, the weathered remnants of Kilchoman Church stand with quiet pride, just a half-mile west of the renowned distillery. Among its historical treasures lie Sanctuary stones dating back to the 800s, symbols of a bygone era when 'Comraich' marked havens of sanctuary, shielded from the turmoil of the world, as revered in the local Gaelic tongue.

Enter the realm of Kilchoman Comraichs—a network of sanctuaries offering respite from the chaos beyond, where the essence of Kilchoman Single Malt is celebrated. Within these hallowed walls, Kilchoman Comraich establishments stand as bastions of the brand, offering privileged access to exclusive treasures like the inaugural batch, Kilchoman Comraich Series Batch No. 1.

Crafted with precision and passion, Kilchoman Comraich Series Batch No. 1 embodies the essence of the distillery's legacy. It stands as a testament to the artistry and dedication of Kilchoman's master distillers, offering a singular experience reserved for those fortunate enough to find themselves within the embrace of a Kilchoman Comraich bar. Here, amidst a curated selection of Kilchoman releases, Batch No. 1 shines as a beacon of excellence, inviting enthusiasts to savor its unparalleled depth and character.

name: Single Cask Nation Pappi Nansens 12 Year
description: This is a marriage of 4 casks of Tennessee bourbon bottled at a natural cask strength of 51.55% ABV. The youngest whisky in this marriage is 12 years old, the oldest being 14.
baxus_class_name: Single Cask Nation Pappi Nansens 12 Year

name: Clase Azul Mezcal San Luis Potosi
description: Clase Azul Mezcal San Luis Potosí is a distinctive spirit that captures the essence of the San Luis Potosí region's desert landscapes. This mezcal is crafted using green agave, a plant native to the area, which is known for its resilience and unique flavor profile. The production process honors traditional methods, ensuring a high-quality and authentic mezcal. Each bottle is a masterpiece, meticulously handcrafted by skilled artisans. The decanter features intricate designs inspired by the desert scenery, including mountains, valleys, and vibrant red finches, making it a true work of art. This mezcal not only represents the rich cultural heritage of San Luis Potosí but also stands out for its exceptional craftsmanship and dedication to preserving traditional mezcal-making techniques.
baxus_class_name: Clase Azul Mezcal San Luis Potosi

name: 2007 Perrier-Jouet Belle Epoque - 1.5L
description: Perrier-Jouët Belle Epoque is a true icon – a rare and elegant champagne that celebrates the art of blending in the Perrier-Jouët style.

name: Miyagikyo 1996 Single Cask #37252 Bottled 2014
description: Distilled in 1996 this single cask expression from Nikka’s Miyagikyo distillery in Sendai was bottled in 2014 at 62% Abv. The second of Nikka’s distilleries, single cask expression of Miyagikyo have become nigh impossible to find amid the huge demand for Japanese whisky.

name: Yoichi 1987 Single Cask #113200 Bottled 2006
description: Distilled in 1987 this single cask expression of the highly praised Japanese distillery Yoichi was bottled at 63% Abv in 2006. Single cask expressions of any Japanese whisky are a rarity, but as Yoichi won best of the best at 2001’s world whisky awards this Hokkaido distillery is especially hard to find in single cask format.

name: Old Rip Van Winkle Old Time Rye 12 Year 1997 Bottling
description: A very rare bottle of Van Winkle's "Old Time Rye." The bottle boats that it is "12 Summers Old" and sports a gold neck, making it even more uncommon.
baxus_class_name: Old Rip Van Winkle Old Time Rye 12 Year 1997 Bottling

name: Yoichi 1991 Single Cask #129504 Bottled 2005
description: Distilled in 1991 this single cask expression of the highly praised Japanese distillery Yoichi was bottled at 64% Abv in 2005. Single cask expressions of any Japanese whisky are a rarity, but as Yoichi won best of the best at 2001’s world whisky awards this Hokkaido distillery is especially hard to find in single cask format.

name: Macallan Cask Strength Pre-2013 Bottling
description: Discontinued in 2013 the cask strength expression from Macallan is a high proof offering of their signature sherry matured spirit. This 750ml US market release is bottled at 60.1% Abv.

name: Hancock's Reserve President's - 2020
description: This Single Barrel Bourbon is deep amber in color, the nose is light and sweet, with traces of mango and papaya. The body is full, and the palate shows a nice, if simple, balance of honey, clover, a slight fruitiness, and a dash of spices. The finish is long and warm.  A well crafted whiskey.

name: Foursquare 12 Year Master Series No 1 For Total Wine
description: A 12 year old expression of single blended rum from the Foursquare distillery in Barbados. This vatting of casks was matured in both bourbon and sherry before being blended exclusively for Total Wine in the US.
baxus_class_name: Foursquare 12 Year Master Series No 1 For Total Wine

name: Chivas Ultis - 2021
description: Chivas Ultis is the first blended malt whisky from the house of Chivas Regal. Containing five precious hand-selected single malt whiskies, this prestigious whisky was created by Master Blender Sandy Hyslop in honour of his five predecessors who played iconic roles within our history. Because success is a blend, in life and in Scotch.

name: Rare Perfection 8 Year Single Barrel #151 For The Dusty Bunker
description: Distilled in 2016 this rare single barrel Kentucky bourbon was matured for just over 8 year. Matured in Preservation distillery's warehouses this barrel was chosen exclusively for The Dusty Bunker. Bottled in 2025 just 120 bottles were produced at 61.95% Abv.
baxus_class_name: Rare Perfection 8 Year Single Barrel #151 For The Dusty Bunker

name: Aberlour A'Bunadh Alba Batch 001
description: Meaning ‘the original’ in Gaelic, A’bunadh Alba is made in homage to Aberlour’s founder, James Fleming. Abunadh Alba is matured in ex American Oak resulting in an aroma of ripe red apples, along with honey, vanilla and a hit of cinnamon. Abunadh Alba is bottled at cask strength resulting in a sweet whisky with a creamy texture.

name: Van Winkle Family Reserve Rye 13 Year 2018 Bottling
description: Now produced at Buffalo Trace, the Van Winkle name has long been associated with great American whiskey. The Family Reserve Rye is one of the oldest rye whiskeys available today, and being a part of the prestigious Van Winkle family has led to its status as an extremely sought-after spirit.
baxus_class_name: Van Winkle Family Reserve Rye 13 Year 2018 Bottling

name: Old Overholt - 1933
description: The Old Overholt brand is a legend in the world of American whisky, established all the way back 1810. This bottle was distilled more than 100 years ago in 1921 at West Overton distillery in Pennsylvania. The whisky was then bonded at the distillery, where it was stored and protected from the Prohibition Act of 1920 which banned all production and consumption of the alcohol in the US for the next 13 years.

name: Mars Komagatake 2013 6 Year Single Cask #1689
description: Distilled in 2013 at the Mars Shinshu distillery this single cask expression was matured for 6 years in a madeira cask. The malt used for this cask was lightly peated to 3.5PPM and was bottled at 59% Abv.The Mars Shinshu distillery started in 1985 after acquiring the stills from the closed Yamanashi distillery. The site was closed in 1992 amid the Japanese economic crash and only began producing again in 2011.

name: Woodford Reserve Cherry Wood Smoked Barley Master's Collection
description: The 2017 Master’s Collection Cherry Wood Smoked Barley is the first Kentucky bourbon to use malted barley that has been exposed to wood smoke during its kilning process. This imparted a rich smoked almond note to the mash that carried over in the distillation process. With 30% malt content the Cherry Wood Smoked Barley mash bill has a greater amount of malt than traditional bourbon. The result is a rich, full-bodied bourbon.
series: Master's Collection - Cherry Wood Smoked Barley
baxus_class_name: Woodford Reserve Cherry Wood Smoked Barley Master's Collection

name: Mackinlay's British Antarctic Expedition #2
description: Introducing Mackinlay’s Shackleton Replica 2nd Edition, a faithful recreation of the whisky famously taken on Ernest Shackleton's historic South Pole expedition in 1907. In a remarkable discovery during a 2007 expedition, a cache of these whisky bottles was found entombed within the ice beneath Shackleton’s hut, sparking renewed interest in this legendary spirit.

name: Mars Komagatake 1988 26 Year Old Single Cask #557
description: An older vintage release from the Mars Shinshu distillery in Nagano prefecture. Distilled in 1988 this cask was matured for 26 years in an American white oak cask and bottled in 2014 at 58% Abv. The Mars Shinshu distillery started in 1985 after acquiring the stills from the closed Yamanashi distillery. The site was closed in 1992 amid the Japanese economic crash and only began producing again in 2011. Pre-closure vintages from Mars are particularly sought after with a number of releases from this era winning considerable awards in competitions.
baxus_class_name: Mars Komagatake 1988 26 Year Old Single Cask #557

name: Bowmore 25 Year Old The Gulls 1990s Bottling
description: A 1990’s era bottling of Bowmore matured for 25 years and bottled in a unique black ceramic decanter. This series is commonly known as “The Gulls”, drawn from the unique design on the bottle. The gulls tells the story of two Scottish lovers, a princess and a warrior who were shipwrecked at Loch Indaal on Islay. The clans never found the pair, instead finding two white gulls circling the wreck.
baxus_class_name: Bowmore 25 Year Old The Gulls 1990s Bottling

name: Blanton's Straight From the Barrel 2022 Release
description: This Blanton's Straight From The Barrel is a cask strength bourbon from Buffalo Trace bottled at 63.9, and is supposedly ~6 years old. And just like all other Blanton's, it's single barrel, meaning that no other barrels were blended into it. Like all Blanton's releases, these bottles are incredibly saught-after.
baxus_class_name: Blanton's Straight From the Barrel 2022 Release

name: Ichiro's Malt & Grain World Blended Whiskey
description: A lovely blended whisky from Japan created by Ichiro Akuto, the Japanese whisky extraordinaire. This particular gem is made with both malt and grain whisky from Japan as well as (possibly) some whisky from other countries too - the label describes it as a "worldwide blended whisky."
baxus_class_name: Ichiro's Malt & Grain World Blended Whiskey

name: Pappy Van Winkle 15 Year Family Reserve 2013 Bottling
description: A 15 year old expression of wheated bourbon carefully chosen by Julian Van Winkle, the grandson of the original Pappy Van Winkle. Early Van Winkle offerings were crafted from barrels sourced from the legendary closed Stitzel-Weller distillery, but in 2002 Julian struck a deal with Buffalo Trace to use their wheated bourbon once his stored barrels ran empty. This 2013 bottling will have been crafted from Buffalo Trace's wheated bourbon mashbill and carefully blended by Julian Van Winkle.
baxus_class_name: Pappy Van Winkle 15 Year Family Reserve 2013 Bottling

name: Mars 15 Year Single Cask #904
description: Matured for 15 years in American oak casks this single malt whisky from Mars was bottled at 43% Abv in a 500ml format. The Mars Shinshu distillery started in 1985 after acquiring the stills from the closed Yamanashi distillery. The site was closed in 1992 amid the Japanese economic crash and only began producing again in 2011. Pre-closure vintages from Mars are particularly sought after with a number of releases from this era winning considerable awards in competitions.

name: North British "Distiller's 1 of 1" 60 Year - 2022
description: Truly a one-of-one bottle of whisky, this was distilled in 1960 on the same Edinburgh site as the company commenced production in 1887 and still does to this day. It was drawn from a cask yet to be bottled and placed in specifically designed packaging that will not be repeated.

name: Old Charter (USA) 11 Year
description: This is an old 1950s bottle of Old Charter Kentucky Straight Bourbon. During this period, the brand was owned by Schenley and produced at the Bernheim distillery in Louisville. This is an interesting presentation, with a bottle shaped like a set of binoculars.

name: Glenmorangie 13 Year Old Fino Sherry Wood Finish
description: A 1990s era bottling of Glenmorangie crafted from 13 year old American oak matured spirit finished in rare fino sherry wood casks. This release was crafted from spirit produced whilst the distillery had just four stills and was bottled at 43% Abv.
baxus_class_name: Glenmorangie 13 Year Old Fino Sherry Wood Finish

name: Woodford Reserve Oat Grain - 2018
description: The Woodford Reserve Master's Collection Oat Grain Bourbon, released in 2018, is a distinctive expression from the renowned distillery, featuring a unique four-grain mash bill of 66% corn, 18% oats, 12% malt, and 4% rye. Aged for around 9 years and bottled at 90.4 proof (45.2% ABV), this bourbon replaces most of the rye with oats, resulting in a rich and innovative flavor profile. It presents a damp, golden sand appearance and offers a robust nose with notes of rich oak, vanilla, caramel, and faint citrus and leather. On the palate, it delivers prominent grain notes, including the oat, with more oak, vanilla, and citrus, providing a decent mouthfeel. The finish is long and musty, with lingering oak, oat, and citrus flavors, making it a standout in the Master's Collection series and a testament to the innovative spirit of Master Distiller Chris Morris and Assistant Master Distiller Elizabeth McCall.  Sources

name: Pappy Van Winkle 15 Year Family Reserve 2014 Bottling
description: A 15 year old expression of wheated bourbon carefully chosen by Julian Van Winkle, the grandson of the original Pappy Van Winkle. Early Van Winkle offerings were crafted from barrels sourced from the legendary closed Stitzel-Weller distillery, but in 2002 Julian struck a deal with Buffalo Trace to use their wheated bourbon once his stored barrels ran empty. This 2015 bottling will have been crafted from Buffalo Trace's wheated bourbon mashbill and carefully blended by Julian Van Winkle.
baxus_class_name: Pappy Van Winkle 15 Year Family Reserve 2014 Bottling

name: Glenmorangie Finealta - 2010
description: Finealta is the second release from the Glenmorangie Private Edition range of limited edition whiskies. Glenmorangie's whisky creators decided to recreate an old recipe from 1903. They set to work marrying whiskies of different ages and from different cask types, meticulously following the original recipe.

name: I.W. Harper 15 Year 1 Liter
description: In the early 1990s, United Distillers & Vintners, the company that would later become Diageo, released The Bourbon Heritage Collection. The Heritage Collection was a series of five bottles from the company's US distilleries. This bottle is the one liter version of the I.W. Harper released as part of that set.

name: Pappy Van Winkle 23 Year Family Reserve 2017 Bottling
description: A 2017 bottling of Papy Van Winkle 20 year old bourbon crafted from a historic wheated recipe now distilled by Buffalo Trace. Each release of Pappy is hand selected by Julian Van Winkle, the grandson of the original Pappy. Although originally produced using barrels from the closed Stitzel-Weller distillery, since 2002 Julian has had an agreement with Buffalo Trace to use their stocks once his stored barrels ran dry.
baxus_class_name: Pappy Van Winkle 23 Year Family Reserve 2017 Bottling

name: Mars Komagatake 1989 Single Cask #617 Bottled 2009
description: An older vintage release from the Mars Shinshu distillery in Nagano prefecture. Distilled in 1989 this cask was matured in an American white oak cask and bottled in 2009 at 46% Abv. The Mars Shinshu distillery started in 1985 after acquiring the stills from the closed Yamanashi distillery. The site was closed in 1992 amid the Japanese economic crash and only began producing again in 2011. Pre-closure vintages from Mars are particularly sought after with a number of releases from this era winning considerable awards in competitions.

name: Nikka G&G Taketsuru Blend 1970s Bottling
description: A 1970s era bottling of Nikka's Gold & Gold blend crafted from malt whisky likely imported from Scotland as well as domestically produced. Gold & Gold first saw release in 1968 and was primarily for the export market, with much of the outturn destined for the USA.

name: Michter's Barrel Strength Rye 2021 Release
description: A 2021 special edition from Michter's crafted from their rye recipe and bottled at a barrel proof of 53.7% Abv.

name: Michter's Barrel Strength Toasted Barrel Rye - 2017
baxus_class_name: Michter's Barrel Strength Toasted Barrel Rye - 2017

name: Michel Couvreur 1969 27 Year Old Single-Single
description: Distilled in 1969 this single cask expression of malt Scotch whisky was matured for 27 years in a Spanish sherry cask. An early pioneer in experimental ageing, Michel Couvreur sourced Scotch whisky and then transported the casks to his cold cellars in Burgundy. Casks were then further matured in unique cask types and bottled.

name: L'Encantada Tattoo Series #2
description: This blend from 10 24-36-year-old single casks has been traditionally aged in Gascony oak barrels. It is then finished in Weller bourbon casks, therefore, losing its official Armagnac appellation of origin. The label features the design of Canadian-born and raised Laura Leonello, known for her celebrated designs and artistry.

name: Bowmore 18 Year Aston Martin Edition 3
description: Performance is the force which unites the Aston Martin DB Mk III and Bowmore 18 Years Old. Together they celebrate exceptional attention to detail, embracing the absolute complexity at the heart of both these beautiful creations. A high performing single malt, deeply complex, rare and dignified from time well spent in the finest Oloroso and Pedro Ximénez is united with an alluring Aston Martin which encapsulates technical prowess and the optimal execution.

name: Michter's Barrel Strength Toasted Barrel Rye - 2023
baxus_class_name: Michter's Barrel Strength Toasted Barrel Rye - 2023

name: Michel Courveur 1966 Single-Single 23 Year - 1989
description: Michel Couvreur is a Belgian and an independent bottler of single malt scotch. His cellars are located in Bouze-les-Beaune in the heart of Burgundy.

name: Wild Turkey Cheesy Gold Foil 12 Year - 1990s
description:
The Wild Turkey Cheesy Gold Foil (CGF) 12 Year is known for its exceptional balance between sweet and oaky flavors, leaving a finish that's quite desirable. It's referred to as a premier bourbon that stands the test of time. It has an alcohol volume of 50.5%, which translates to 101 proof.

This bourbon was distinguished by its "Cheesy Gold Foil" labeling, a term used by bourbon communities to refer to this particular release. Among the Wild Turkey 101 12-year releases of the 1990s, the CGF variety is highly valued when compared to the "Split Label" variety from later in the decade. The CGF bottles tend to be valued more highly due to their iconic label and perhaps the quality of the bourbon itself.

It's described as a fantastic pour with a perfect combination of sweetness and oak. This blend of flavors is often what bourbon enthusiasts seek, making it a beloved choice among many.

This bourbon has become a collectible item over time due to its exceptional quality and the nostalgia associated with its release era.
baxus_class_name: Wild Turkey Cheesy Gold Foil 12 Year - 1990s

name: Very Olde St. Nick 15 Year 107 Proof
description: Cask Lot No. B131 this whiskey is most likley from '97 and would have bottled by KBD (Willett) while they were still supplied via United Distillers (Diageo) per the terms of sale Julian Van Winkle had negotiated at the sale of Stitzel Weller.
baxus_class_name: Very Olde St. Nick 15 Year 107 Proof

name: Springbank 1996 Private Cask #118
description: Nicknamed "Spiritus Sulphuris Volatilis" this 1996 single cask of Springbank was bottled exclusively for a private cask owner. In the 1990s to help fund operations after the distillery ceased cask sales to brokers, they opened up private casks to consumers. Until the early 2000s customers could contact the distillery and purchase their own personal cask of Springbank, Hazelburn or Longrow, with the price including 10 years of free storage. Private casks were typically bottled for their respective owners and as such bottles rarely make their way into public hands.

name: Craigellachie 13 Year - 2017
description: One of the three official Craigellachie bottlings released in 2014, their 13 year old single malt Scotch whisky handsomely shows off the bold, robust character of the distillery's output.

name: Old Grand-Dad 86 Proof
description: Who exactly is this Old Grand-Dad? He is much more than just a grandfather figure that made his way onto a bourbon label. The Old Grand-Dad line is in honor of the iconic Meredith Basil Hayden, Sr., commonly referred to as Basil Hayden. He was born on Wednesday January 2, 1743 in St. Mary’s, Maryland to George Hayden, Sr. (1715-July 10, 1754) and Charity Mary Morgan (1718- October 3, 1791). Basil’s family immigrated to the United States from England in the 1660’s, fleeing the religious intolerance for Catholics at that time in their country. In their effort to find refuge, his ancestors found home in St. Mary’s, Maryland which later became the birthplace of Basil himself. He married Henrietta Cole (born July 2, 1754) in 1771 and together they had fifteen children. Nearly a century after the great emigration, in 1785 Basil continued in the faith of his ancestors by leading a congregation of Catholics through the tough journey of hundreds of rugged miles from Maryland to Nelson County, Kentucky. During the time of this journey, Basil and Henrietta had already given birth to nine of their fifteen children, but unfortunately four of them passed away during the perils of the journey to Kentucky. Once the congregation reached the Kentucky lands, they settled and formed farm lands. Henrietta and Basil went on to birth six more children in the Kentucky settlement. Here Basil began small scale distilling in 1788 and was known for using higher rye content in his mash bill than what was typically being used by other distillers of the time. He continued distilling until his death on Sunday July 15, 1804 in Washington County, Kentucky.

name: Miyagikyo 1987 Single Cask #89714 Bottled 2005
description: Distilled in 1987 this single cask expression from Nikka’s Miyagikyo distillery in Sendai was bottled in 2005 at 61% Abv. The second of Nikka’s distilleries, single cask expression of Miyagikyo have become nigh impossible to find amid the huge demand for Japanese whisky.

name: Springbank 1995 25 Year Old Single Cask #11516 East Asia Whisky Company
description: From the bottler: "This Single Malt Scotch Whisky was distilled in November of 1995 at the Springbank Distillery and then aged for over 25 years in a first fill Rum hogshead. The resulting spirit was deemed extraordinary to the extent that the team behind East Asia Whisky Company decided to launch a new Collection: The “Yokai”  Series – a collection of mythical creatures from Japanese folklore celebrating extraordinary achievements of select distilleries, starting with the Springbank distillery across exotic cask types and finishes. Only whiskies with a bouquet of flavours that manage to convince our panel to score a point score of 90 or above are selected for this exclusive and highly coveted and collectable series."
baxus_class_name: Springbank 1995 25 Year Old Single Cask #11516 East Asia Whisky Company

name: Blanton's Gold 1996 Bottling
description: Buffalo Trace Distillery, situated along the banks of the Kentucky River, is one of America's oldest and most renowned distilleries. With a rich history dating back to 1775, Buffalo Trace has been producing exceptional bourbon whiskey for over two centuries. The distillery is known for its commitment to heritage, craftsmanship, and innovation, consistently producing award-winning bourbons under the guidance of Master Distiller Harlen Wheatley.  Blanton's is a distinguished brand within the Buffalo Trace Distillery portfolio, revered for its exceptional single barrel bourbons. Each bottle of Blanton's represents a pinnacle of craftsmanship and quality, showcasing rich and complex flavors derived from carefully selected mash bills and aging processes. Blanton's is known for its signature horse and jockey stoppers, which denote individual barrels and add a unique touch of luxury to this esteemed bourbon brand.   Blanton's Gold is a prestigious expression from the Blanton's Single Barrel Bourbon range, renowned for its exceptional quality and distinctive character. Bottled at a robust 51.5% ABV, this bourbon showcases rich flavors of caramel, vanilla, and oak, complemented by hints of spice and honey. Each bottle of Blanton's Gold is drawn from a single barrel, ensuring unique variations in flavor and complexity. This expression embodies the epitome of craftsmanship and attention to detail, making it a coveted choice among bourbon enthusiasts worldwide.

name: Strathisla 1948 & 1961 Royal Marriage Gordon & Macphail
description: A multivintage vatting of casks distilled at Strathisla from the years that the Prince of Wales and Lady Diana were born. These two casks were vatted together and bottled in 1981 to celebrate the royal wedding. Strathisla is heralded as one of the oldest Scotch whisky distilleries and has long been the core single malt at the heart of the Chivas blend.

name: Octomore 01.1
description: The first ever release of Octomore, the most heavily peated spirit produced at the Bruichladdich distillery on Islay. Distilled in 2002 and peated to an industry new level of 131PPM, it was matured for 5 years in ex-buffalo trace bourbon casks. Bottled in 2008 at 63.5% Abv with just 6000 bottles produced.

name: Old Charter 12 Year French Oak
description: Aged twelve years at Buffalo Trace Distillery, this bourbon is rich and sweet, drawing its character from barrels made of French Oak. An oak that has long been used for aging the world’s finest wine, the tighter grain of French Oak impart more subtle flavors and a silkier texture than its American counterpart. Harvested from the forests of France, the oak barrels that aged this unique bourbon whiskey are honored with each sip. So enjoy this tribute to the French Oak and raise a glass to its storied journey from the forest, to the barrel, to bourbon.

name: Knockando 15 Year - 2014
description: This malt aged in two different types of barrels (Sherry and Refill Bourbon casks) offers a beautiful aromatic richness marked by notes of cooked fruit and sweet spices.

name: Macduff 1989 29 Year Old Single Cask Cadenhead’s
description: Distilled in 1989 this single cask expression of the lesser seen Scottish distillery Macduff was matured for 29 years in a refill sherry butt. Bottled at 55.1% Abv by Cadenhead’s as part of their authentic collection range, this series of bottlings is usually only available to visitors of the Cadenhead’s shops.
baxus_class_name: Macduff 1989 29 Year Old Single Cask Cadenhead’s

name: Macallan 1965 28 Year Whyte & Whyte
description: An old school expression of Macallan distilled in 1965 and matured for 28 years! This release was chosen exclusively for Whyte & Whyte, a Chicago-based wine and spirits importer who bottled a wide range of long-matured whiskies under its own label using stocks secured from Signatory Vintage. This release is bottled at a rare strength of 55.7% Abv. Most Macallan from the 1960s will typically be bottled at 43-46% Abv, so a full strength edition matured for 28 years is remarkable!

name: Ben Nevis 1995 25 Year Single Hogshead Single Malt Dreams
description: A 1995 vintage single cask expression of Ben Nevis matured for 25 years in a bourbon hogshead. It was bottled at 47.9% Abv in 2021 by Single Malt Dreams.
baxus_class_name: Ben Nevis 1995 25 Year Single Hogshead Single Malt Dreams

name: Knockando 18 Year - 2016
description: Knockando is known for its bottlings of vintage whiskies. This one was matured in sherry casks and bottled in 2016 as part of the ‘slowly matured’ series.

name: Yamazaki 12 Year
description: Yamazaki is Suntory's flagship single malt whisky, from Japan's first and oldest malt distillery. This 12 year old first came onto the market in 1984 and was the first seriously marketed Japanese single malt whisky. Since then, it has acquired something of a cult following.

name: American Whiskey 2006 Single Cask Bottled 2019 For Milwaukee’s Club
description: An undisclosed bottling of Wild Turkey from Chichibu. This American style whiskey was originally destined for Ichiro's Malt & Grain blended whiskey but was instead chosen to be bottled as a single cask. Distilled in 2006 it was transported to Japan and then recasked into an ex-Chichibu single malt barrel in 2012. In 2019 it was bottled at 53.9% Abv exclusively for the 29th anniversary of Milwaukee's Club in Japan.
baxus_class_name: American Whiskey 2006 Single Cask Bottled 2019 For Milwaukee’s Club

name: Old Kentucky No. 88 13 Year
description: The Old Kentucky No. 88 13 Year Old Straight Bourbon is a distinguished spirit crafted to celebrate the bicentennial of whiskey production in Bardstown, Kentucky, known as the "Bourbon Capital of the World." Released in 1988, this bourbon is a product of Kentucky Bourbon Distillers, who operated out of the then-silent Willett distillery, and it is likely that the bourbon was sourced from neighboring distilleries such as Heaven Hill[2][3][5]. Matured for 13 years in charred oak barrels, this bourbon offers a complex flavor profile with notes of caramel, vanilla, warm spices, toasted nuts, dried fruit, and leather, providing a smooth and velvety texture that makes it a favorite among connoisseurs[1]. The Old Kentucky No. 88 is not only a testament to the rich heritage of American bourbon but also a collector's item due to its historical significance and the craftsmanship involved in its production.  Sources [1] Old Kentucky No. 88 13 Year Old Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey https://elcerritoliquor.com/products/old-kentucky-no-88-brand-13-year-old-straight-bourbon [2] Old Kentucky No.88 Brand 13 Year Old Straight Bourbon https://whiskyauctioneer.com/lot/140386/old-kentucky-no88-brand-13-year-old-straight-bourbon [3] Old Kentucky No.88 Brand 13 Year Old | Whisky Auctioneer https://whiskyauctioneer.com/lot/127942/old-kentucky-no88-brand-13-year-old [4] Old Kentucky No. 88 Brand 13 Jahre - Blue Cask https://www.blue-cask.com/en-com/products/old-kentucky-no-88-brand-13-jahre [5] Old Kentucky No.88 Brand 13 Year Old Straight Bourbon https://elcerritoliquor.com/products/old-kentucky-no-88-brand-13-year-old-straight-bourbon-1 [6] Old Kentucky No. 88 Brand 13 Year Old - Lot 162395 - Whisky.Auction https://whisky.auction/auctions/lot/162395/old-kentucky-no-88-brand-13-year-old [7] Old Kentucky 13-year-old - Ratings and reviews - Whiskybase https://www.whiskybase.com/whiskies/whisky/72791/old-kentucky-13-year-old [8] Old Kentucky 13 Year Old - No: 88 Brand Miniature https://www.thewhiskyexchange.com/p/21377/old-kentucky-13-year-old-no-88-brand-miniature

name: Lagavulin 1993 Single Cask #4893 Feis Ile 2007
description: A 1993 vintage single cask expression of Lagavulin hand selected by legendary master distiller Iain McArthur for the 2007 Islay Feis Ile Festival. Cask 4893 was bottled at a cask strength of 56.5% Abv.

name: Knockando 12 Year - 2016
description: Knockando is known for its bottlings of vintage whiskies. This one was matured in ex-bourbon casks and bottled in 2016 as part of the 'season' series.

name: Balvenie 18 Year Pedro Ximenez Cask
description: The Balvenie Pedro Ximenez Cask is a lively and summery single malt finished in casks which previously held Pedro Ximenez sherry. PX is a white Spanish wine grape variety grown in several Spanish wine regions. The heat of the sun ripening the vines leads to a wine of intense sweetness, dessert like. Sherry casks have been used by The Balvenie before, with Ian Miller always interested to find the best casks for our double maturation expressions. Sherry is a popular cask type in Scotch Whisky, this is the second sherry finished expression in The Balvenie range of finishes.

name: Springbank 2011 7 Year Refill Bourbon Cage Sample
description: A distillery exclusive cask sample from Springbank distilled in 2011 and matured for 7 years in a refill bourbon barrel. Duty paid samples are commonly referred to as cage samples as they are sold exclusively at the distillery shop from a locked cage. These expressions are cask progress samples that are hand selected by the distillery manager and less than two dozen bottles are usually produced in each cage bottling.
baxus_class_name: Springbank 2011 7 Year Refill Bourbon Cage Sample

name: Balvenie Madeira Cask 15 year
description: The Balvenie Madeira Cask is a lively and summery single malt finished in casks previously which previously held Madeira wine. In historic times, ships set sail filled with casks of Madeira wine around the New World. Throughout their journey, casks were exposed to the heat of the sun, naturally sweetening the wine it held. Malt Master David C. Stewart has enjoyed times exploring the Madeira region and wines they produce, inspiring his experimentation of the cask type for finishing. This is not the first time David has used Madeira casks - previous expressions have been of older ages. This release has a lighter, livelier character.

name: Glen Grant 1993 25 Year Old Single Cask Cadenhead’s Club
description: A 1993 vintage single cask expression of Glen Grant matured for 25 years. It was finished for 3 years in a sherry hogshead before being bottled in 2018 at 50.8% Abv exclusively for members of the Cadenhead’s club.
baxus_class_name: Glen Grant 1993 25 Year Old Single Cask Cadenhead’s Club

name: Glendronach 2007 12 Year Single Cask #1901 For New York City
description: This whisky was distilled on 22nd of May 2007 and matured in single PX cask #1901 for 12 years before being bottled in 2020. One of 604 exclusive for New York.
baxus_class_name: Glendronach 2007 12 Year Single Cask #1901 For New York City

name: Springbank 21 Year Campbeltown
description: Springbank is unique among Scotland's distilleries. Every part of the process from malting to bottling is carried out at the distillery. Unlike other whiskies Springbank Single Malt Whisky is free of artificial colouring, also it is not chill filtered.

name: California Club J.G Thompson Blended Scotch 1950s Bottling
description: A 1950s or prior bottling of blended Scotch whisky from J.G Thompson, an independent whisky blender with a storied history. J.G Thompson was the leading independent blender of Scotch whisky in the early 20th century, operating huge warehouses and even a cooperage. Operating out of The Vaults in Leith, Edinburgh since 1729 they acted as wine & spirits wholesalers. The firm suffered in the early 20th century and was bought out in 1960, becoming a shadow of their former self. The final bottlings at the Leith Vaults were done in 1964. In 1983 the Scotch Malt Whisky Society acquired The Vaults to be used as a home base for their members, eventually coming full circle with the SMWS launching their J.G Thompson spirits in 2021.
baxus_class_name: California Club J.G Thompson Blended Scotch 1950s Bottling

name: Loch Lomond Rhosdhu 1985 10 Year Single Cask Cadenhead's
description: A 1985 vintage single cask expression of Loch Lomond's 1.5x distilled make called Rhosdhu. Matured for 10 years it was bottled in 1996 at 59.5% Abv by Cadenhead's.
baxus_class_name: Loch Lomond Rhosdhu 1985 10 Year Single Cask Cadenhead's

name: Spirit Of Unity Blended Malt 2011 Earthquake Relief
description: A blended malt Scotch whisky bottled in 2011 to raise funds for earthquake & tsunami relief after the 2011 natural disasters in Japan.
baxus_class_name: Spirit Of Unity Blended Malt 2011 Earthquake Relief

name: Booker’s Little Book Chapter 3 2019 Bottling
description: Little Book Chapter 3 is the first Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey in the Little Book line from Freddie Noe. “The Road Home” references the road that I travel to and from on a regular basis, the same road my grandfather, Booker, traveled back when he used to work here at the distillery,” says Noe.

name: Springbank 1996 24 Year Old Single Cask #11523 East Asia Whisky Company
description: From the bottler: "This Single Malt Scotch Whisky was distilled in November of 1996 at the Springbank Distillery and then aged for over 20 years in a first fill oloroso sherry hogshead. It was then finished in a Madeira Single Cask and bottled at 48.8% ABV. The resulting spirit was deemed extraordinary to the extent that the team behind East Asia Whisky Company decided to launch a new Collection: The “Yokai”  Series – a collection of mythical creatures from Japanese folklore celebrating extraordinary achievements of select distilleries, starting with the Springbank distillery across exotic cask types and finishes. Only whiskies with a bouquet of flavours that manage to convince our panel to score a point score of 90 or above are selected for this exclusive and highly coveted and collectable series."
baxus_class_name: Springbank 1996 24 Year Old Single Cask #11523 East Asia Whisky Company

name: Macallan Royal Wedding - 1981
description: This superb bottling was released in 1981 to commemorate the marriage of Prince Charles and Lady Diana Spencer. A unique vatting of Macallan single malts distilled in 1948 and 1961, the Royals birth year's. This has become, and remains, a serious expression for collector's.

name: Booker’s Little Book Chapter 4 2020 Bottling
description: Each Little Book release is a different blend of cask strength whiskeys, not necessarily bourbon, to experiment with different types of whiskeys in a blend, different mashbills, and honor the past.

name: Macphail's 1938 45 Year Book Of Kells
description: A stunning pre world war 2 vintage expression of Highland single malt chosen by Gordon & Macphail. Distilled in 1938 this 45 year old single malt could have been sourced from a number of distilleries in Scotland as Gordon & Macphail purchased spirit from right across the country. The firm operated as the bottler for many distilleries who either did not have the facilities or desire to bottle their product as a single malt. Hence a few suggestions such as Linkwood, Mortlach, Glen Grant, Macallan, Glenlivet or Glenfarclas can be made as G&M routinely held deep vintage stocks of these Speyside distilleries. This 45 year old comes from the Book Of Kells series, a label inspired by the medieval manuscript.

name: Hibiki Harmony Master's Select Limited Edition
description: A special edition screen printed offering of Suntory's blended Hibiki master's select release exclusive to the duty free market. The Hibiki Japanese Harmony Master's Select, released in 2016, is a meticulously crafted blend from Suntory's renowned distilleries: Yamazaki, Hakushu, and Chita. This expression is a blend of ten different malt and grain whiskies aged in five types of casks, including American white oak, sherry, and Mizunara oak casks. Bottled at 43% ABV, it carries no age statement but is celebrated for its harmonious and complex flavor profile. The bottle design, with its 24 facets representing the 24 hours in a day and the 24 seasonal divides in a year, reflects the Japanese philosophy of harmony and meticulous craftsmanship.
baxus_class_name: Hibiki Harmony Master's Select Limited Edition

name: Macallan 1940 Handwritten Red Ribbon Bottled 1981
description: A 1940 vintage expression of Macallan bottled as part of the legendary handwritten red ribbon series. This release was bottled in 1981 just after Macallan began bottling its own whisky, as they had previously contracted all bottling to Gordon & Macphail.  5 different vintages were released in this line including a 1938, 1940, 1950, 1957 and a 1973 that were all bottled between 1980 and 1983. The series is known by the handwritten red ribbon name as the labels for each release look to be handwritten, despite being printed, and each bottle has a red ribbon with a red wax print on it.

name: Caol Ila 2011 8 Year Single Butt #300153 Single Cask Nation
description: A 2011 vintage single cask expression of Caol Ila matured for 8 years in a refill Oloroso sherry cask. Bottled in 2019 at 61.4% Abv by Single Cask Nation.
baxus_class_name: Caol Ila 2011 8 Year Single Butt #300153 Single Cask Nation

name: Ledaig 2007 11 Year Single Butt #700611 Chieftain's
description: A 2007 vintage single cask expression of Ledaig, the heavily peated expression produced at Tobermory. This cask was matured for 11 years in a sherry butt and bottled at 58.1% Abv by Chieftain's.

name: Glendronach 1992 27 Year Single Cask #5852 For The Whisky Shop
description: Distilled in 1992 this single cask expression of Highland whisky from Glendronach was matured for 27 years in an Oloroso sherry butt. It was bottled in 2020 at 58.4% Abv exclusively for The Whisky Shop in the UK.
baxus_class_name: Glendronach 1992 27 Year Single Cask #5852 For The Whisky Shop

name: Glendronach 1992 27 Year Single Port Pipe #5897
description: A 1992 single cask expression of Glendronach matured for 27 years in a port pipe. Bottled in 2020 cask #5897 was released at 48% Abv with 853 bottles available.

name: Old Forester 1953 Bottled in Bond 1958 Bottling
description: A rare, "lamp-shaped" decanter of a classic Old Forester bourbon. Distilled in 1953 and bottled in 1958, this is a unique find in an intricate, stunning bottle that is sure to command attention.
baxus_class_name: Old Forester 1953 Bottled in Bond 1958 Bottling

name: Glendronach 1994 26 Year Single Cask #4363
description: Distilled in 1994 this single cask expression of Glendronach was matured for 26 years in an Oloroso sherry puncheon. Bottled in 2020 at 52.8% Abv with 692 bottles produced.

name: Macallan 17 Year Fine Oak
description: First launched in 2004, the fine oak series features Macallam’s signature spirit matured in European and American oak sherry casks as well as bourbon casks. This is the 17 year old age statement and was bottled before the series was discontinued in 2018

name: Blanton’s Medicinal 2022 Release
description: Medicinal Whiskey Charity’s mission is “Fighting childhood illness with the power and passion of whiskey enthusiasts.” The organization selects barrels and organizes fundraisers that center around them to raise money for children’s hospitals. In 2021 they raised over $170,000 and in 2022 they raised nearly half a million. This is the third barrel of Blanton’s they have selected, and we’re honored to have a bottle to explore and share with our readers.   This particular barrel could be best described in a single word: balanced. It touches on all the right flavor notes one might come to expect from Blanton’s, a little oak, honey, caramel, raisin, hints of spice, and some savory notes. The whiskey doesn’t veer too far in any one direction, which makes it an ideal sipper and representative of the Original Single Barrel brand. It’s another great selection from the team and supports a great cause.

name: Macallan 25 Year Old Sherry Oak Pre-2018 Bottling
description: A pre-2018 bottling of Macallan’s signature sherry oak series matured for 25 years in exceptional quality sherry casks. This presentation of the 25 year old age statement was first launched in 2012 before being changed in 2018. Presented in a wooden box this era featured whisky tints, an innovation from Macallan whisky maker Bob Dalgarno which highlighted the natural dark colour of the sherry matured spirit.
baxus_class_name: Macallan 25 Year Old Sherry Oak Pre-2018 Bottling

name: Linkwood 1973 29 Year Murray McDavid
description: A small batch release of Linkwood from Murray McDavid, this edition was distilled in 1973 and matured for 29 years. It was bottled in 2002 at 46% Abv in their flagship “Mission” label which saw deep vintage and age statements featured. Murray McDavid was first established in 1996 by a number of industry figureheads, with the company later buying Bruichladdich in 2000. To create cashflow for the business and eventually renovate the ruined Islay distillery, Murray McDavid independently bottled unique Scotch whisky casks from all across the country.

name: Glendronach 1990 30 Year Single Puncheon #7006
description: A 1990 vintage single cask expression of Glendronach matured for 30 years in a PX sherry puncheon. Bottled in 2020 cask #7006 was bottled at 51.4% Abv.

name: Glendronach 2008 11 Year Single Puncheon #4189 For Garden State Select
description: A 2008 vintage single cask expression of Glendronach matured for 11 years in a PX sherry puncheon. Bottled in 2020 at 60.4% Abv it was chosen exclusively for Garden State Select.
baxus_class_name: Glendronach 2008 11 Year Single Puncheon #4189 For Garden State Select

name: Yamazaki Mizunara Cask 2013 Release
description: A 2013 special release from Yamazaki crafted from rare Japanese oak Mizunara casks.

name: Orphan Barrel 22 Year Lost Prophet
description: Distilled in the early 1990s George T Stagg distillery (now known as Buffalo Trace), this well matured Kentucky bourbon sat resting quietly for 22 years in the warehouses of Stizel-Weller. Distilled from a rye based mashbill it was eventually bottled in 2014 by Diageo as part of their Orphan Barrel series.

name: Torabhaig 3 Year - 2021
description: Torabhaig, the second-ever licensed Single Malt Scotch Whisky distillery on the Isle of Skye, offers this young yet incredibly impressive single malt. Though aged for a relatively short three years in first-fill bourbon barrels, the appeal of this spirit is undeniable.

name: Four Roses Single Barrel The Wise Old Dog's Stolen Whiskey Barrel 1
