description: Four Roses Single Barrel "The Wise Old Dog's Stolen Whiskey Barrel 1" is a unique offering from the renowned Four Roses Distillery. This particular selection is part of their Private Selection series, which allows retailers to choose specific barrels for a distinct taste profile. The bottle showcases the distillery's commitment to quality and craftsmanship, featuring a hand-selected single barrel bourbon that is bottled at barrel strength. The design includes the iconic Four Roses logo embossed on the bottle, emphasizing its premium nature. This edition, chosen by The Wise Old Dog, highlights the distillery's dedication to producing complex and elegant bourbons, making it a prized addition for collectors and enthusiasts alike.
series: The Wise Old Dog's Stolen Whiskey Barrel 1
baxus_class_name: Four Roses Single Barrel The Wise Old Dog's Stolen Whiskey Barrel 1

name: Ben Nevis 1999 18 Year Single Butt For The Whisky Exchange Creative Whisky Co
description: A 1999 vintage single cask expression of Ben Nevis matured for 18 years in a sherry butt. It was bottled at 50.8% Abv exclusively for The Whisky Exchange by the Creative Whisky Co.
baxus_class_name: Ben Nevis 1999 18 Year Single Butt For The Whisky Exchange Creative Whisky Co

name: Laphroaig 32 Year Cask Strength Sherry Casks
description: A (very) special anniversary bottling, this is old-style brooding Laphroaig. Fully mature and rich, it shows that classic roiling mass of kelp, oil,  and brine, always balanced by sweetness: in this case autumn berry fruits. Malt adds a crunchiness.
baxus_class_name: Laphroaig 32 Year Cask Strength Sherry Casks

name: Springbank 35 Year Millennium Collection
description: A 35 year old expression of Springbank bottled in March 1999 as part of the highly coveted Millennium Collection. This collection saw a line up of highly aged Springbank releases bottled to celebrate the year 2000 including a 25,30,35,40,45 and 50 year old single malt!

name: Islay 16 Year Black Friday The Whisky Exchange
description: This expression was bottled for The Whisky Exchange by Elixir distillers, who founded the company in 1999, to celebrate Black Friday 2021. It is from an undisclosed Islay distillery which has been matured for 16 years in oak before there was 2000 bottles produced at a strength of 53.2% abv.
baxus_class_name: Islay 16 Year Black Friday The Whisky Exchange

name: Old Fitzgerald 1970 6 Year Bottled In Bond Quart
description: A full quart of Old Fitzgerald produced at the Stitzel-Weller distillery crafted from Pappy's original mashbill and jug yeast. Distilled in 1970 this was matured for 6 years and bottled in bond in 1977 at 100 proof.
baxus_class_name: Old Fitzgerald 1970 6 Year Bottled In Bond Quart

name: Weller C.Y.P.B 2021 Bottling
description: A special edition Weller product crafted with help from the wider whiskey community. Buffalo Trace asked the public to "Craft Your Perfect Bourbon" by completing a questionnaire. Once this campaign ended it was revealed the perfect bourbon came from a wheated mashbill, aged for 8 years, matured on the highest floors of the rickhouse and would be bottled at 95 proof. Buffalo Trace then released Weller C.Y.P.B using this recipe for barrels.

name: Laphroaig 10 Year 1970s Bottling
description: A 1970s era bottling of Laphroaig's signature 10 year old bottled at 70 imperial proof/40% Abv. 1970s era bottlings are exceptionally sought after for the high volume of tropical, fruit heavy notes found in the distillate. Older, pre 1990s warrant era bottlings are noted for focus on fruit character instead of pure peat. This era of Laphroaig was crafted using locally harvested Islay barley, smoked using local peat harvested by Laphroaig and malted at their own distillery malt floors. This strong control of process allowed Laphroaig to make especially fantastic distillate from the 1950s-1980s, with a bigger focus placed on peat in distillates from the mid 1980s and onwards.

name: Laphroaig 30 Year Ian Hunter Story Book 2
description: A 30 year old expression from Islay legend Laphroaig matured for 30 years in Spanish oak Oloroso sherry casks. This is the second edition of The Ian Hunter Story, a series which celebrates the last member of the Johnston family to own and manage Laphroaig.
baxus_class_name: Laphroaig 30 Year Ian Hunter Story Book 2

name: Craigellachie 31 Year Old
description: First launched in 2014 as a travel retail exclusive bottling, the Craigellachie 31 year old is a flagship release from this Speyside distillery and is crafted from 1st fill and refill casks. In 2017 the 31 year old won world’s best single malt at the world whisky awards.

name: Bourbon De Luxe Bottled in Bond
baxus_class_name: Bourbon De Luxe Bottled in Bond

name: Chequers Blended Scotch 1960s Bottling
description: A 1960's era bottling of Chequers blended Scotch whisky crafted from stocks held by DCL.

name: Mortlach 1991 Single Cask #5887 Bottled 2015 Mackillop's Choice
description: An independently bottled Mortlach single malt Scotch whisky, distilled in August 1991 and left to mature in a single Sherry cask. It was left to mature for 23 years before being bottled for Mackillop's Choice in January 2015 with an outturn of 610 bottles.
baxus_class_name: Mortlach 1991 Single Cask #5887 Bottled 2015 Mackillop's Choice

name: Laphroaig 30 Year Ian Hunter Story Book 1
description: A 30 year old expression from Islay legend Laphroaig matured for 30 years in first fill bourbon casks. This is the first edition of The Ian Hunter Story, a series which celebrates the last member of the Johnston family to own and manage Laphroaig.
baxus_class_name: Laphroaig 30 Year Ian Hunter Story Book 1

name: Ardbeg 1967 30 Year Single Cask #1142 Signatory Vintage
description: A legendary Ardbeg, distilled on 22nd March 1967 and matured in sherry butt #1142 for 30 years before bottling on 2nd April 1997 by Signatory Vintage. Only 530 bottles were produced.
baxus_class_name: Ardbeg 1967 30 Year Single Cask #1142 Signatory Vintage

name: Littlemill 1965 Bottled 1998 Scott’s Selection
description: A 1965 vintage release of the closed distillery Littlemill. It was bottled in 1998 by Scott’s Selection at 58.9% Abv exclusively for the US market. Littlemill claimed to be Scotland’s oldest working distillery before its eventual closure in 1992. The distillery was a pivotal Lowland style malt whisky but suffered amid the Scotch whisky downturn in the 1980s.

name: Glenrothes 2005 15 Year Single Cask Purim Edition 2021 Douglas Laing
description: This whisky was distilled in September 2005 and laid to rest in a single ex-Sherry Butt for 15 years before being bottled in February 2021. Earmarked from an early stage an ideal component in blended Scotch whiskies, Glenrothes has long been a key part of big brands such as Cutty Sark and Famous Grouse. Its relationship with the former, lead to a three decade-long association with London wine-merchants, Berry Brothers & Rudd, who first approached Highland Distillers about licensing the Glenrothes single malt brand in 1983, eventually trading the Cutty Sark blend with Edrington for full ownership of it in 2010. The distillery itself remained with Edrington through, and the two were reunited when the now hugely successful brand was returned in 2017. Releases from independent labels like this have also always been highly regarded. One of 390 of The Purim Edition 2021 .
baxus_class_name: Glenrothes 2005 15 Year Single Cask Purim Edition 2021 Douglas Laing

name: Glen Moray 1986 Single Cask #4696 Commemorative 2004 Bottling
description: A 1986 vintage single cask expression of Glen Moray bottled in 2004 at 64.4% Abv to commemorate the visitor centre. This bottle was hand filled from cask #4696.
series: Commemorative Bottling of new Visitors Centre
baxus_class_name: Glen Moray 1986 Single Cask #4696 Commemorative 2004 Bottling

name: Van Winkle Family Reserve Rye 13 Year 2012 Bottling
description: Now produced at Buffalo Trace, the Van Winkle name has long been associated with great American whiskey. The Family Reserve Rye is one of the oldest rye whiskeys available today, and being a part of the prestigious Van Winkle family has led to its status as an extremely sought-after spirit.
baxus_class_name: Van Winkle Family Reserve Rye 13 Year 2012 Bottling

name: Kentucky Tavern 1917 15 Year Old
description:
A very very popular label throughout the 20th century, Kentucky Tavern was the flagship brand from Glenmore distillers out of Owensboro.

Glenmore would grow into a thriving business throughout the 1900s, with its founder, James Thompson, emigrating from Ireland to the US in 1871. He originally started work with the precursor firm to Brown-Forman, before eventually acquiring the Monarch distillery in 1901 and renaming it Glenmore.

Thompson made his brother-in-law, H.S. Barton the the master distiller of Glenmore and they produced their whiskey even through prohibition, being one of just six granted a license.

In 1944 the firm acquired Yellowstone and built the brand alongside Kentucky Tavern to be some of the most highly praised premium bourbons of the era.

Kentucky Tavern was typically bottled as an 8 year old product, so this 15 year bottling produced under the ownership of James Thompson and its first master distiller is exceptionally special!

name: Glengoyne 30 Year 2017 Release 700ml
description: A 30 year old expression from Glengoyne fully matured in sherry casks. Bottled in 2017 at 46.8% Abv.

name: Lagavulin Distillers Edition 16 year - 2008
description: A rare vintage 1991 1.0-litre bottling of the 16 years old Laguvulin s Double Matured Special Release Distillers Edition from the year 2008. This stunning 16-years-old Islay single malt whisky of the Classic Malts Selection from the Islay legend Lagavulin was distilled in the year 1991, double matured for up to 6 months in European Pedro Ximenez Sherry oak casks - these give the whisky more fruit, such as raisins and dry fruits and a syrupy character.

name: Jane Walker Black 12 Year - 2018
description: From the producer: "Jane Walker by Johnnie Walker is a new, limited-edition whisky from Master Blender Emma Walker that heroes whisky from Cardhu – a nearly 200 year old distillery in the heart of Speyside that flourished under the leadership of Elizabeth Cumming."

name: Weller Antique 107 Single Barrel Select
description:
Weller Antique 107 Single Barrel Select is a premium expression from Buffalo Trace Distillery's renowned Weller line of wheated bourbons. This offering showcases the full potential of individual barrels, bottled at a robust 107 proof (53.5% ABV) without chill filtration. As a single barrel selection, each bottle represents the unique characteristics of its source barrel, providing a one-of-a-kind tasting experience that can vary subtly between selections.

Typically chosen by retailers, bars, or whiskey clubs, Weller Antique 107 Single Barrel Select allows connoisseurs to explore the nuances of Buffalo Trace's wheated bourbon mashbill at its full, uncut strength. While not age-stated, these selections are generally aged for about 6 years, developing a complex flavor profile that balances the sweetness of wheat with the depth of well-aged bourbon.

The Antique 107 expression is particularly prized for its intensity and rich mouthfeel, offering a more robust experience compared to other Weller offerings. Its high proof and lack of chill filtration preserve the bourbon's natural oils and flavor compounds, resulting in a full-bodied whiskey that showcases the distillery's craftsmanship. Often described as the "Goldilocks" of the Weller lineup, Antique 107 strikes a balance between age, proof, and price point.

Due to its limited availability and the reputation of the Weller brand, Weller Antique 107 Single Barrel Select has become highly sought after by bourbon enthusiasts, often commanding premium prices and generating significant excitement when released. The single barrel format highlights the nuances in flavor that can occur between barrels, offering an opportunity to explore the depth and variety within the Weller profile.

name: Glen Moray 2010 Single Cask Bottled 2022 The Private Cask Collection
description: A 2010 vintage single cask expression of Glen Moray finished in a cask that previously held peated whisky, which had prior held PX sherry. Bottled in 2022 at 55.9% Abv as part of the distillery's The Private Cask Collection.
baxus_class_name: Glen Moray 2010 Single Cask Bottled 2022 The Private Cask Collection

name: Van Winkle Family Reserve Rye 13 Year 2013 Bottling
description: Now produced at Buffalo Trace, the Van Winkle name has long been associated with great American whiskey. The Family Reserve Rye is one of the oldest rye whiskeys available today, and being a part of the prestigious Van Winkle family has led to its status as an extremely sought-after spirit.
baxus_class_name: Van Winkle Family Reserve Rye 13 Year 2013 Bottling

name: Ardbeg Drum Committee Release
description: A 2019 special edition from Ardbeg bottled exclusively for the Ardbeg Committee. This release was matured in bourbon barrels before being finished in rum casks from the Americas and bottled at 52% Abv.

name: Glenlivet French Oak Finish 12 year
description: A discontinued Glenlivet, matured for 12 years including a finishng period in select Limousin French oak casks. Uniquely finished in French Limousin Oak, from the Dordogne region of France, renowned for bringing flavours to fine wines and cognacs. An elegant 12 year old with a balanced dry, nutty and spicy oakiness.

name: Macallan Cask Strength Early 2000s Bottling
description: An early 2000s presentation of Macallan's non age stated cask strength expression. This batch was bottled at 58.6% Abv exclusively for the US market in a 750ml format. This series of bottlings was discontinued in 2013.

name: Douglas Laing Macallan Premier 28 Year
description: The ceramic bottles of the Premier Barrel bottlings were inspired by the "good old days" of the Victorian Music Hall. The bottles were modeled after the Whiskeycantern of the late 19th century. In fact, these look more like old-fashioned hot water bottles that keep warm in cold winter nights. A job that this single malt can still take on.

name: Imperial 1990 30 Year Single Cask #1048 Single Cask Nation
description: A 1990 vintage single cask expression of Imperial matured for 30 years in a bourbon barrel. Bottled in January 2020 at 46.6% Abv with just 151 bottles produced.
baxus_class_name: Imperial 1990 30 Year Single Cask #1048 Single Cask Nation

name: Oban Bay Reserve The Night's Watch Game Of Thrones
description: The sworn brothers of The Night’s Watch take an oath and pledge their lives to protect the Seven Kingdoms and guard the realms of men from the terrors that lurk beyond the massive and ancient ice barrier known as The Wall. They face a frozen wasteland which legends say is filled with wildlings, giants, and the terrifying forces of The Night King and the long night he brings. They are the swords in the darkness and the watchers on the wall. Oban sits beneath the steep cliff that overlooks the bay in the frontier between the West Highlands and the Islands, separating land and sea, just as Castle Black sits between Westeros and what lies beyond The Wall. This liquid’s richness is balanced by a woody, spicy dryness that could undoubtedly keep The Night’s Watch warm on even the coldest of nights.
baxus_class_name: Oban Bay Reserve The Night's Watch Game Of Thrones

name: Glentauchers 1989 27 Year Old Single Hogshead Cadenhead’s
description: A 1989 vintage single cask expression of Glentauchers matured for 27 years in a hogshead. It was bottled at 52.9% Abv as part of Cadenhead's warehouse tasting tour. This special tasting allows visitors to Cadenhead’s in Campbeltown to taste a variety of hand picked casks and then purchase a favourite. As such they are usually only available to those who make the trip to the bottler’s warehouses.
baxus_class_name: Glentauchers 1989 27 Year Old Single Hogshead Cadenhead’s

name: Jane Walker 10 Year - 2020
description: From the producer: "Jane Walker by Johnnie Walker is a new, limited-edition whisky from Master Blender Emma Walker that heroes whisky from Cardhu – a nearly 200 year old distillery in the heart of Speyside that flourished under the leadership of Elizabeth Cumming."

name: Macallan Edition No. 1 - 2015
description: Edition No. 1 is the first in a series of annual limited releases showcasing our skill and expertise in selecting and maturing our precious spirit in the very best oak casks...eight European and American cask style.

name: Macallan 1989 Single Hogshead #13636 Bottled 2019 Douglas Laing
description: This Speyside was distilled back in 1989, following which it's spent three decades maturing in a single refill hogshead. This bottling is part of Douglas Laing’s XOP line-up, and it’s limited to just 230 units.
baxus_class_name: Macallan 1989 Single Hogshead #13636 Bottled 2019 Douglas Laing

name: Heaven Hill 1999 Single Butt #MoS19033 Bottled 2019 Malts Of Scotland
description: A 1999 vintage single cask expression of Heaven Hill bourbon finished in a sherry butt. Bottled in 2019 at 55.2% Abv by Malts Of Scotland.
baxus_class_name: Heaven Hill 1999 Single Butt #MoS19033 Bottled 2019 Malts Of Scotland

name: Chichibu The US Edition 2019 Release
description: A special vatting of 7 casks produced at the Chichibu distillery in Japan bottled exclusively for the US market. The second US edition, this 2019 release was crafted from a mixture of barley types including floor malted tipple, braemar and peated concerto. Bottled at 55.5% Abv with 1556 bottles produced.

name: Ichiro's Malt & Grain Limited Edition Batch 2 For The USA
description: A world blended whisky from Chichibu crafted with spirit sourced from Ireland, the USA, Canada, Japan and Scotland.
baxus_class_name: Ichiro's Malt & Grain Limited Edition Batch 2 For The USA

name: Glen Grant 1970 43 Year Single Single Cask #3497 Duncan Taylor
description: Distilled by Glen Grant in 1970, this whisky had no idea that one day it would be sitting in a luxurious decanter, held by a Tantalus made from the cask which aged the whisky for 43 years. Sometimes life deals you a good card, especially if you're a great whisky. This release was bottled by Duncan Taylor.
baxus_class_name: Glen Grant 1970 43 Year Single Single Cask #3497 Duncan Taylor

name: Pappy Van Winkle 20 Year Family Reserve 2009 Bottling
description: A 2009 bottling of Pappy Van Winkle 20 year old bourbon. This era of Pappy was crafted from barrels produced at the Stitzel-Weller distillery, the legendary closed distillery that produced Old Fitzgerald. This 2009 era release was bottled at Buffalo Trace after Julian Van Winkle moved his operations to there.
baxus_class_name: Pappy Van Winkle 20 Year Family Reserve 2009 Bottling

name: Glen Grant 1948 Single Butt #2154 Bottled 2018 Gordon & Macphail
description: The oldest release from the famous Glen Grant distillery, bottled by Gordon & MacPhail for its Private Collection series, is a stunning 70-year-old Speyside single malt that has been aged in a single, first-fill sherry butt. Filled on the 11th of June 1948 it was left to mature in a sherry cask for over seven decades, being bottled on the 19th of October 2018.
baxus_class_name: Glen Grant 1948 Single Butt #2154 Bottled 2018 Gordon & Macphail

name: Kilchoman 2006 14 Year Single Cask For Impex
description: A 2006 vintage single cask expression of Kilchoman matured for 14 years in a bourbon barrel. Cask 18/2006 was bottled at 53% Abv and chosen exclusively for Impex for the American market.
baxus_class_name: Kilchoman 2006 14 Year Single Cask For Impex

name: Michter's Barrel Strength Toasted Barrel Rye - 2020
description: From the distiller: "While our Michter’s team distills according to tried and true Kentucky practices, it continually experiments as it pursues Michter’s goal of making the greatest American whiskeys. Following years of research on different barrel finishes for rye whiskey, we are proud to offer this release of our Michter’s US1 Toasted Barrel Rye. To make it we take our US1 Kentucky Straight Rye at barrel strength and then age it for an additional period in a second custom barrel. This second barrel is assembled from 24 month air-dried wood and then toasted to our specifications. The result is a unique rye whiskey that we take pride in offering to you. The strength of the majority of the barrels selected for the 2020 release ranges from 107.2 to 111.2 proof."
baxus_class_name: Michter's Barrel Strength Toasted Barrel Rye - 2020

name: Orkney 2003 17 Year Single Butt #2398 For Water Of Life Single Cask Nation
description: A 2003 vintage single cask expression of a secret Orkney distillery matured for 17 years in a 2nd fill Oloroso sherry butt. Bottled in 2021 at 54.4% Abv by Single Cask Nation in collaboration with The Water Of Life.
series: Single Cask Nation Stones of Stennes
baxus_class_name: Orkney 2003 17 Year Single Butt #2398 For Water Of Life Single Cask Nation

name: Kilchoman 2007 11 Year Single Cask Shop Exclusive
description: A 2007 vintage single cask expression of Kilchoman matured for over 11 years in an Oloroso sherry butt. It was bottled at 54% Abv exclusively for visitors to the distillery shop.
baxus_class_name: Kilchoman 2007 11 Year Single Cask Shop Exclusive

name: American Medicinal Spirits Special Old Reserve - 1932
description: Distilled in 1917 this bourbon was protected in bond by the American Medicinal Spirits Company from the Prohibition Act of 1920 which made alcohol production and consumption illegal. This was bottled in 1932, a year before the Prohibition was repealed.
baxus_class_name: American Medicinal Spirits Special Old Reserve - 1932

name: Kilchoman 12 Year Old Feis Ile 2020 Release
description: A small batch expression of Kilchoman crafted from casks distilled in 2007 and 2008. Matured exclusively in bourbon casks it was bottled at 54.2% Abv to celebrate the 2020 Feis Ile Islay festival.
baxus_class_name: Kilchoman 12 Year Old Feis Ile 2020 Release

name: George T. Stagg 2018 Release
description: From the distiller: "George T. Stagg built the most dominant American distillery of the 19th century, during a time known as the Gilded Age of Bourbon. Uncut and unfiltered, this robust bourbon whiskey ages for nearly a decade and boasts the bold character that is reminiscent of the man himself."

name: Double Eagle Very Rare 20 year - 2019
description: This very limited 20-year-old bourbon is matured twice as long as Eagle Rare 10-year-old bourbon and features two beautifully-sculpted crystal glass eagles in the Double Eagle decanter.

name: George T. Stagg 2014 Release
description: A high proof expression of bourbon from Buffalo Trace bottled under the George T Stagg label as part of their annual Buffalo Trace Antique Collection. This 2005 release was matured for over 15 years and bottled at a huge 131.8 proof.

name: American Medicinal Spirits 1916 Special Old Reserve Bottled 1933
description: Distilled in 1917, this bourbon was protected in bond by the American Medicinal Spirits Company from the Prohibition Act of 1920 which made alcohol production and consumption illegal. This was bottled in 1933, the year Prohibition was repealed.
baxus_class_name: American Medicinal Spirits 1916 Special Old Reserve Bottled 1933

name: Ambassador 25 Year 1960s Bottling
description: A 1960s era bottling of Ambassador's 25 year old age statement blended Scotch whisky. This blend was associated with Taylor & Ferguson who held the original licenses to Glen Scotia and the Scapa distilleries. As the 20th century passed Ambassador essentially became an export branded version of Ballantines.

name: Glenglassaugh 2012 7 Year Single Cask #563 For Abbey Whisky
description: A 2012 vintage single cask expression of Glenglassaugh matured for 7 years in an Oloroso hogshead. It was bottled at 58.7% Abv exclusively for Abbey whisky.
baxus_class_name: Glenglassaugh 2012 7 Year Single Cask #563 For Abbey Whisky

name: Dailuaine 2012 9 Year Single Hogshead #312989 Single Cask Nation
description: A 2012 vintage single cask expression of Dailuaine matured for 8 years in a bourbon cask before a further year in a 1st fill sherry hogshead. Bottled in 2022 at 55.1% Abv by Single Cask Nation.
baxus_class_name: Dailuaine 2012 9 Year Single Hogshead #312989 Single Cask Nation

name: Whistlepig 12 Year The Boss Hog Edition 1 Single Barrel #18
description: The first release of Whistlepig's highly praised Boss Hog series. This single barrel was matured for 12 and 3/4 years before being bottled at 67.4% Abv. This barrel was likely sourced from either MGP in Indiana or Alberta Premium in Canada, as Whistlepig first sourced their stocks from Canadian distilleries. Boss Hog 1 saw this rye whiskey finished in bourbon barrels.
baxus_class_name: Whistlepig 12 Year The Boss Hog Edition 1 Single Barrel #18

name: Macallan No.6 Lalique
description: No. 6 brings together the art of whisky making with Lalique exquisite craftsmanship to create a stunning whisky encased in the finest crystal decanter. This rich, complex single malt takes its unique natural colour and character from first fill sherry seasoned oak casks from Spain, handcrafted by the master craftsmen of Jerez de la Frontera, the home of sherry.

name: Glenrothes 1996 24 Year Single Cask #4296 My Name Is Whisky
description: Bottled to coincide with their book launch, this 1996 vintage single cask of Glenrothes was chosen by new Italian independent bottler My Name Is Whisky. A father and daughter team, My Name Is Whisky published a visual guide of rare Italian bottlings after visiting many esteemed collectors across Italy. This celebratory cask of whisky was matured for 24 years in a rare fino sherry cask and is bottled at 52.9% Abv. This line of bottlings celebrated various influential characters from across the whisky industry, with this cask celebrating Mark Watt who spent many years at Cadenhead’s before starting his own bottling business as Watt Whisky.
baxus_class_name: Glenrothes 1996 24 Year Single Cask #4296 My Name Is Whisky

name: Mortlach 1997 22 Year Single Sherry Cask #10090 My Name Is Whisky
description: Bottled to coincide with their book launch, this 1997 vintage single cask of Mortlach was chosen by new Italian independent bottler My Name Is Whisky. A father and daughter team, My Name Is Whisky published a visual guide of rare Italian bottlings after visiting many esteemed collectors across Italy. This celebratory cask of whisky was matured for 22 years in a sherry cask and is bottled at 56.9% Abv. This line of bottlings celebrated various influential characters from across the whisky industry, with this cask celebrating Giorgio D'Ambrosio who owned Bar Metro in Italy.
baxus_class_name: Mortlach 1997 22 Year Single Sherry Cask #10090 My Name Is Whisky

name: Ewan & Co. Islay Dew
description: When poured, the golden glow of the spirit is a promise of the warmth to come and the palate offers a journey from dry to sweet, with toffee, juicy barley and rich peat smoke.

name: Glenmorangie 1978 34 Year Pride
description: Extraordinary in every sense of the word and in every element, this stunningly presented single malt is the second release of Glenmorangie Pride. This 1978 vintage comes in an opulent Baccarat crystal decanter, the whisky itself moved to ex Bordeaux wine casks after an initial 19 year maturation period.
series: A 1978 vintage special edition from Glenmorangie featuring their signature Highland single malt whisky matured for 34 years! Matured for 19 years it was then recasked into the highest quality Claret red wine casks. Presented in a 1 litre Baccarat crystal decanter this edition was bottled in 2012 at 47.4% Abv with just 700 produced.

name: Highland 1962 53 Year Alexander Murray & Co
description: A huge 1963 vintage expression of Highland single malt whisky matured for 53 years. It was bottled at 40.3% Abv by Alexander Murray & Co. The source of this whisky was never confirmed but distilleries with stocks this deep likely include, Glen Grant, Glenlivet, Macallan and Glenfarclas.

name: Macallan Fine Cacao - 2022
description: A single malt whisky characterised by a milk chocolate profile, which pairs in perfect harmony with the finest chocolates for a rich tasting experience.

name: Glenmorangie Quarter Century 25 Year - 2007
description: From the distillery: "Complex, multi-layered varying sweetness one of those great whiskies where the genius that shaped the picture becomes clear only on fifth or sixth time of viewing. The rarest and oldest member of the Glenmorangie family, this is a single malt of notable class and intensity. Full bodied and sumptuous, the Glenmorangie 25 Years Old is the real embodiment of our continued dedication to perfection. Matured in a range of casks including American white oak, Oloroso sherry casks and French Burgundy casks before being blended back together in exact quantities, the Glenmorangie Quarter Century is complex, bursting with deep flavours, and a perfect testimony to our knowledge and experience."

name: Johnnie Walker Blue Sa-Shin-Do
description: A special edition bottle of Johnnie Blue label, the icon of whisky worldwide. This Blue Label is bottled in a porcelain decanter that was bottled for the South Korean market. On each of the four sides of the decanter is a depiction of a guardian god from Korean mythology.

name: Rosebank 1990 29 Year Vintage Series First Edition
description: Rosebank is a much-sought after Lowland single malt. The distillery was initially shortlisted by United Distillers as their Lowland entry to the Classic Malts series when it was slated for launch in 1988, but was eventually substituted for Glenkinchie on the belief that it provided better opportunities for tourism. Rosebank was then shut down in 1993, but has recently been acquired by Ian Macleod Distillers, who have a view to resurrecting this classic lost distillery in the near future. This whisky was distilled in 1990 and aged for 29 years. It was bottled in 2020 and made exclusive to Global Travel retail. One of 200 bottles.
baxus_class_name: Rosebank 1990 29 Year Vintage Series First Edition

name: Macallan Rare Cask - 2020
description: From the distillery: "Rare Cask is crafted from the finest and rarest sherry seasoned oak casks, unearthed by The Macallan Whisky Mastery Team using their knowledge, skill, passion, and creativity in their quest to seek out the extraordinary. This single malt whisky reveals the remarkable art and science of the Whisky Maker in selecting unique oak casks that exhibit a distinctive and complex flavour profile. They were curated for maturation by The Macallan Master of Wood and delivered to the exacting specifications of The Macallan Whisky Mastery Team to create Rare Cask. This luxurious expression highlights the magic and science in The Macallan’s intricate whisky making process, as the whisky maker identifies the exceptional oak casks which impart the intense and highly complex flavour profile."

name: Pappy Van Winkle 23 Year Family Reserve 2009 Bottling
description: A 2009 bottling of Pappy Van Winkle 20 year old bourbon. This era of Pappy was crafted from barrels produced at the Stitzel-Weller distillery, the legendary closed distillery that produced Old Fitzgerald. This 2007 era release was bottled at Buffalo Trace after Julian Van Winkle moved his operations to there.
baxus_class_name: Pappy Van Winkle 23 Year Family Reserve 2009 Bottling

name: Jews & Booze AmaR'ye 4 Year
description: A tribute to basketball great Amar’e Stoudemire, and is called "AmaR’ye". It is a barrel of MGP straight rye with a mash bill of 95% rye and 5% malted barley that was bottled by Good Times. It was originally barreled on August 22, 2016, and aged for about 4 years, 9 months in a char #4 barrel. It was dumped from the original barrel into a barrel that previously held peach brandy on May 25, 2021. It was finished for 6 weeks and was finally dumped and bottled on July 6th. 110 Proof.

name: Lagavulin 8 Year
description: Originally released to commemorate the distillery's 200th anniversary, this eight-year-old has now been added as a permanent addition to the core range.

name: Pappy Van Winkle 20 Year Family Reserve 2014 Bottling
description: A 2014 bottling of Papy Van Winkle 20 year old bourbon crafted from a historic wheated recipe now distilled by Buffalo Trace. Each release of Pappy is hand selected by Julian Van Winkle, the grandson of the original Pappy. Although originally produced using barrels from the closed Stitzel-Weller distillery, since 2002 Julian has had an agreement with Buffalo Trace to use their stocks once his stored barrels ran dry.
baxus_class_name: Pappy Van Winkle 20 Year Family Reserve 2014 Bottling

name: Wild Turkey Master's Keep One 2021 Release
description: Released in 2021, this special edition release from Wild Turkey as part of their Master's Keep series was crafted from barrels aged between 9 and 14 years. This parcel of mature barrels was then vatted together and further matured in toasted casks.
baxus_class_name: Wild Turkey Master's Keep One 2021 Release

name: Buffalo Trace 2009 6 Year Old Experimental Collection Infrared Light Wave Barrels
description: Distilled in 2009 this expression from Buffalo Trace was crafted from their #1 rye mashbill and was matured for 6 years in unique infrared light barrels. The barrels were treated for 15 minutes with short & medium length infrared light waves then a light #1 char was used. Bottled in 2016 at 45% Abv as part of the experimental collection.
baxus_class_name: Buffalo Trace 2009 6 Year Old Experimental Collection Infrared Light Wave Barrels

name: Macallan 30 Year Sherry Oak 2020 Release
description: The 2020 edition of Macallan's signature age stated expression of 30 year old sherry oak. This release is matured exclusively in the finest French oak ex-sherry casks and is bottled at 43% Abv.

name: Yamazaki 25 Year Bill Amberg Edition
description: Winner of the “World’s Best Single Malt” award in the World Whiskies Awards 2012, the Yamazaki 25 is a coveted and increasingly rare item. This particular bottle is an extra special edition, as the case holding the bottle was created by Bill Amberg, the world-famous leather craftsman. The leather case includes 25 saddle stitches to represent each year of maturation.  One of Yamazaki’s greatest and rarest releases as only 100 bottles of this were ever made.

name: Linkwood 1978 37 Year Cask Strength
description: A 1978 vintage small batch expression of Linkwood matured for a huge 37 years! Bottled at a cask strength of 50.3% Abv in 2016 with just 6114 bottles produced.

name: Knockando 1994  21 Year Master Reserve
description: The 1994 vintage 21-year-old Master Reserve expression from the wonderful Knockando distillery which lies near the River Spey. Matured in bourbon and sherry casks it was bottled at 43% Abv.

name: Jews & Booze Dramba 7 Year
description: This whiskey comes in fairly intensely with all of the sodas including that tingly mouth feel. There are notes of orange soda first, followed by cola in the mid-palate. That is joined classic wheat whiskey notes of caramel and butterscotch.

name: Larceny Barrel Proof 6 Year - 2020
description: Released three times per year in January, May, and September, each offering is a bold yet balanced special Small Batch Bourbon rich with depth and distinction. Much like Larceny Small Batch and Old Fitzgerald Bottled-in-Bond, Larceny Barrel Proof is a welcome reminder of just how good wheated Bourbons can be.

name: Bond & Lillard Batch 1 7 Year
description: Bond and Lillard is an elegant bourbon distilled and bottled at the Wild Turkey distillery from a proprietary mash recipe. This is the first batch of their Whiskey Barons collection, and is bottled at a standard 100 proof.

name: Vintage Bourbon 17 Year
description: Vintage Bourbon 17 Year Old is handmade in Kentucky. This Vintage Bourbon is selected from the very rarest lot of barrels. Each barrel is hand-picked and chosen according to the strictest criteria for taste, aroma, and bouquet. The extra years spent aging imparts flavor and taste characteristics not found among other bourbons. Unfortunately, the many extra years of barrel aging also limit the quantities from each barrel to only a few precious bottles.

name: The Lakes The Whiskymaker's Reserve No. 5
description: The 5th expression of English single malt whisky from The Lakes distillery located in the Lakes district. This special reserve was matured in Spanish & American oak ex-sherry and red wine casks before being bottled at 52% Abv.
baxus_class_name: The Lakes The Whiskymaker's Reserve No. 5

name: Angel's Envy Cellar Collection 375ml Set
description: A three bottle set of Angel's Envy releases as part of their cellar collection. This set includes their Kentucky bourbon finished in Oloroso sherry, madeira and Tawny port casks. Each bottle is a 375ml format.

name: Blood Oath Pact No. 10
description: The 10th expression of Blood Oath bourbon from Luxrow. This edition features Kentucky bourbon finished in cabernet franc and merlot wine casks.

name: Colonel E.H. Taylor Barrel Proof Batch 10
description: The 10th batch of barrel proof bourbon from Buffalo Trace bottled as part of their EH Taylor label. This release was bottled at 127.3 proof in 2021.
baxus_class_name: Colonel E.H. Taylor Barrel Proof Batch 10

name: Rabbit Hole Dareringer Founders Collection Cask Strength Sherry Finish
description: A cask strength expression of Rabbit Hole's sherry barrel finished expression. Bottled at 51.1% Abv.
baxus_class_name: Rabbit Hole Dareringer Founders Collection Cask Strength Sherry Finish

name: A.H. Hirsch 1974 20 Year Finest Reserve Red Wax
description: A 1974 vintage expression of pot still produced straight bourbon whiskey from the original Michter's distillery in Pennsylvania. Adolph Hirsch commissioned 400 barrels to be filled by Michter's master distiller Dick Stoll. These barrels were left to mature in Pennsylvania until Michter's shut its doors in the 1980s. The stocks were purchased by liquor legend Gordon Hue, who then contracted Julian Van Winkle to bottle the barrels. A number of different versions of this 400 barrel batch were released, some with wax tops and a hand-full exclusive to the Japanese market. The stocks eventually changed hands. This is the bourbon heralded by Chuck Cowdery as "The best bourbon you'll never try" in his book. The mythos of the Michter's pot still product has become legend and resulted in this 1974 batch being amongst the most sought after bourbon.
baxus_class_name: A.H. Hirsch 1974 20 Year Finest Reserve Red Wax

name: Mount Vernon Blended Whiskey 1950 Bottling Quart
description: A 1950 bottling of Mount Vernon blended whiskey bottled by National Distillers in a large quart sized format. 32% of the blend is straight whiskies with 67% of the blend neutral grain spirits.
baxus_class_name: Mount Vernon Blended Whiskey 1950 Bottling Quart

name: Ardbeg 1993 Single Cask #1289 Bottled 2014 Mackillop's Choice
description: This very rare 21 year old Islay single malt was laid down at the Ardbeg distillery on the 2nd September 1993 and bottled for the Mackillop's Choice series in December 2014 at 54.3% Abv.
baxus_class_name: Ardbeg 1993 Single Cask #1289 Bottled 2014 Mackillop's Choice

name: Glenlivet 2006 12 Year Single Cask #901275 For K&L Signatory Vintage
description: One of only 301 produced, this rare bottling by Signatory Vintage has been aged for 12 years in a First-Fill Sherry Butt before being bottled as part of the exclusive bottler’s Un-Chillfiltered Collection.
baxus_class_name: Glenlivet 2006 12 Year Single Cask #901275 For K&L Signatory Vintage

name: Speyside 2007 12 Year Sherry Butts For K&L Wine Signatory Vintage
description: A 2007 Speyside single malt from indie bottler Signatory Vintage that was made at a mystery Speyside distillery and matured in a refill sherry butts for 12 years, before being bottled in 2019 as part of its Un-Chillfiltered Collection. This vatting of casks was chosen exclusively for K&L wines in the US.
baxus_class_name: Speyside 2007 12 Year Sherry Butts For K&L Wine Signatory Vintage

name: Westport 1995 21 Year Hogsheads Carn Mor
description: A 1995 vintage small batch vatting of two hogsheads from Westport, a code name for teaspooned Glenmorangie. Matured for 21 years this batch was bottled in 2016 at 46% Abv by Carn Mor. Westport is officially a blended malt but is generally understood to be purely Glenmorangie with a tiny amount of another distillery included to discount it being sold to brokers as a single malt.

name: Carsebridge 1963 43 Year Lonach
description: Lonach is a series by Duncan Taylor that blends underproof casks (below 40% alcohol) with higher strength casks to make sure the result can still be called whisky. This is a vatting of 1963 distilled single grain whisky from Carsebridge distillery matured for 43 years and bottled at 43% Abv.

name: Old Forester 12 Year Birthday Bourbon 2016 Release
description: The 2016 Birthday Bourbon barrel selection commemorates the 15th anniversary of the first-ever release. Unlike various previous selections, where barrels were drawn from different warehouses and/or floors and locations within a warehouse, the 2016 release has uniquely matured together on the same floor within the same warehouse.
baxus_class_name: Old Forester 12 Year Birthday Bourbon 2016 Release

name: Speyside Distillery 1994 Single Hogshead #65 Bottled 2016 Carn Mor
description: Introducing a remarkable Single Malt from the Speyside Distillery. Bottled by Morrison and MacKay as part of their Càrn Mòr Celebration of the Cask series. Aged for 22 years in a Hogshead cask, it was bottled on 16.05.2016 at a strength of 58.2% Vol. Limited to just 175 bottles, this 700 ml expression is a true collector's gem.
series: Càrn Mòr Celebration of the Cask
baxus_class_name: Speyside Distillery 1994 Single Hogshead #65 Bottled 2016 Carn Mor

name: Blair Athol 1995 20 Year Single Butt #HL12149 Hunter Laing
description: Blair Athol 20 Year Old 1995 vintage Highland single malt Scotch whisky. Single sherry butt #12149 bottled November 2015 by Hunter Laing & Co. for the Old Malt Cask series. 597 bottles.
baxus_class_name: Blair Athol 1995 20 Year Single Butt #HL12149 Hunter Laing

name: Foursquare 2010 12 Year Exceptional Cask Selection
description: A blend of rums distilled in the copper double retort pot still and the continuous twin column still of Foursquare and aged for 12 years in ex-bourbon casks.

name: Bunnahabhain 1995 Single Hogshead #2535 Bottled 2014 Carn Mor
description: Bunnahabhain 1995 MMcK is a captivating Single Malt whisky from the renowned Bunnahabhain Distillery. Bottled by Morrison and MacKay for their exclusive Càrn Mòr - Celebration of the Cask - Black Gold series. Aged for 18 years in a Sherry Hogshead cask (#2535), it has a strength of 47.1% Vol. Limited to just 95 bottles, this 700 ml expression is a rare and treasured find.
series: Càrn Mòr - Celebration of the Cask - Black Gold
baxus_class_name: Bunnahabhain 1995 Single Hogshead #2535 Bottled 2014 Carn Mor

name: Glenrothes 2006 Single Butt #5673 Bottled 2017 Carn Mor
description: Presenting the Glenrothes 2006 MMcK, a distinguished Single Malt from Glenrothes Distillery. Bottled by Morrison and MacKay for their renowned Càrn Mòr Celebration of the Cask series. Aged for 11 years in a Sherry Butt cask (#5673), it boasts a strength of 65.5% Vol. Limited to 610 bottles, this 700 ml expression offers a truly exceptional experience.
series: Càrn Mòr Celebration of the Cask
baxus_class_name: Glenrothes 2006 Single Butt #5673 Bottled 2017 Carn Mor

name: Dailuaine 1992 Single Cask #3135 Bottled 2016 Carn Mor
description: Dailuaine 1992 MMcK is an esteemed Single Malt whisky from the renowned Dailuaine Distillery. Bottled by Morrison and MacKay for their exclusive Càrn Mòr Celebration of the Cask series. Aged for 24 years in a Bourbon Barrel cask (#3135), it possesses a strength of 53.7% Vol. Limited to merely 203 bottles, this 700 ml expression is a scarce and extraordinary discovery.
series: Càrn Mòr Celebration of the Cask
baxus_class_name: Dailuaine 1992 Single Cask #3135 Bottled 2016 Carn Mor

name: Filmland Spirits "Town at the End of Tomorrow" 9 Year
description:
Filmland Spirits "Town at the End of Tomorrow" Bourbon is a captivating expression that marries the art of whiskey-making with a flair for storytelling. This limited release, aged for nine years, embodies the spirit of classic B-movies while delivering a rich and complex bourbon experience. 

Crafted from a mash bill of 78% corn, 13% rye, and 9% malted barley, this bourbon is bottled at 94 proof, allowing its robust character to shine. The aroma invites you in with notes of caramel, vanilla, and warm baking spices, hinting at its time spent in American White Oak barrels. On the palate, it unfolds beautifully, revealing layers of rich toffee, dried fruits, and a touch of spice, all balanced by a smooth, lingering finish.

The name "Town at the End of Tomorrow" evokes a sense of nostalgia and adventure, reflecting the whimsical nature of the brand. This bourbon is not just a drink; it’s an experience that transports you to a cinematic world while celebrating the craftsmanship behind each bottle. Perfect for sipping neat or in classic cocktails, it stands as a testament to the creativity and passion of Filmland Spirits, making it a must-try for bourbon enthusiasts and film lovers alike.
baxus_class_name: Filmland Spirits "Town at the End of Tomorrow" 9 Year

name: Five Brothers
description:
Heaven Hill's Five Brothers Bourbon is a tribute to the founding Shapira brothers—David, Ed, Gary, George, and Mose—who established Heaven Hill Distillery in 1935. This small-batch bourbon embodies the distillery's rich heritage and commitment to quality, featuring a blend of bourbons aged between five and nine years, with each year representing one of the brothers. Bottled at 90 proof, Five Brothers Bourbon showcases a traditional mash bill of 75% corn, 13% rye, and 12% malted barley.

The bourbon is characterized by its inviting aroma, which includes notes of oak, baking spices, roasted nuts, vanilla, caramel, and dried dark fruits. On the palate, it reveals a harmonious balance of flavors, including peanut brittle, baking spice, and a hint of citrus, complemented by a warm, spicy finish. The whiskey's complexity and depth make it a versatile choice, suitable for sipping neat or using in classic cocktails.

The packaging of Five Brothers Bourbon is equally noteworthy, featuring a vintage-inspired design that includes a black-and-white photograph of the Shapira brothers in their youth, along with elegant labeling that nods to the 1930s. This bourbon is available exclusively at the Heaven Hill Bourbon Experience and select retailers in Kentucky, making it a unique addition to any bourbon enthusiast's collection.

name: North British 1989 Single Hogshead #40328 Bottled 2014 Carn Mor
description: A 1989 vintage single cask expression of North British single grain whisky. Matured in a sherry hogshead cask #40328 was bottled in 2014 at 56.3% Abv by Morrison Distillers as part of their Carn Mor label.
series: Càrn Mòr Celebration of the Cask
baxus_class_name: North British 1989 Single Hogshead #40328 Bottled 2014 Carn Mor

name: Jamaican Rum 1993 Single Cask #8266 Bottled 2022 Samaroli
description: A 1993 vintage single cask expression of rum sourced from an undisclosed Jamaican distillery. Matured for almost 29 years it was bottled at 52% Abv by Samaroli. This cask is rumoured to be sourced from the Hampden Estate and has been primarily matured in Europe.
baxus_class_name: Jamaican Rum 1993 Single Cask #8266 Bottled 2022 Samaroli

name: Bowmore 2001 Port Cask Finish Bottled 2016 Samaroli
description: A 2001 vintage expression of Bowmore finished in a port cask. It was bottled in 2016 at 46% Abv by Samaroli.
baxus_class_name: Bowmore 2001 Port Cask Finish Bottled 2016 Samaroli

name: Redbreast Kentucky Oak
description: A special edition release from Redbreast crafted from their signature Irish single pot still whiskey. This spirit was then finished in American oak casks sourced from the Taylor family elk cave farm and bottled at 101 proof.

name: Redbreast Missouri Oak
description: A special edition from Redbreast crafted using their Irish single pot still whiskey that has been finished in caks sourced from Ozark forests of Missouri and bottled at 101 proof.

name: Glenrothes 1989 Single Hogshead #11192 Bottled 2014 Carn Mor
description: One of only 266 bottles, this Black Gold Edition Glenrothes 24 Years Old was distilled on 23rd June 1989 and bottled on 31st March 2014 from a sherry hogshead.
series: Càrn Mòr - Celebration of the Cask - Black Gold
baxus_class_name: Glenrothes 1989 Single Hogshead #11192 Bottled 2014 Carn Mor

name: Ledaig 1992 Single Cask #151 Bottled 2022 Samaroli
description: A 1992 vintage single cask expression from Tobermory matured for almost 30 years in a sherry cask. It was bottled in 2022 at 43% Abv by Samaroli.

name: Macduff 1997 24 Year Single Cask #5260 Samaroli
description: A 1997 vintage single cask expression of Macduff matured for 24 years. It was bottled at 50% Abv by modern independent bottler Samaroli.

name: Ancient Ancient Age 10 Year
description: While the Ancient Age brand is now owned and produced by Buffalo Trace, this bottle dates back to before the brand was distilled there. Instead of the typical "10 Star," this bottle proudly displays "10 Year" on its label, marking it apart from the brand today.

name: Peerless The Merchant’s Cask 3 Year - 2016
description: Kentucky Peerless Distilling Co. was originally incorporated in 1907 in Henderson, KY by business man Henry H Kraver. Like so many other distilleries, Peerless ceased production in 1917 due to the passing of the 18thAmendment, Prohibition. The company lay dormant for more than 100 years until Mr. Kravers great grandson, Corky Taylor, had an idea and vision to revitalize his family’s brand. In 2014, Kentucky Peerless Distilling Co. began reconstruction on an old building in the heart of Whiskey Row in Louisville, KY where the distillery can be visited by tourists today. On March 15th, 2015, for the first time since 1917, Kentucky Peerless Distilling Co. was back to be a fully operational brand, filling the first barrel since the company went out of business almost 100 years before. Today, Peerless produces Rye and Bourbon whiskey, with their Rye whiskey receiving high remarks from Whiskey Advocate and being named in the top 20 whiskeys of the year in 2017.

name: Angel’s Envy Rye Ice Cider Finished
description: A special edition release from Angel's Envy crafted from rye whiskey finished in French oak ice cider casks from Vermont based Eden Specialty Ciders. Matured for 7 years, this release was finished for a year in the ice cider casks before being bottled at 107 proof.
baxus_class_name: Angel’s Envy Rye Ice Cider Finished

name: Wild Turkey 8 Year "The Spirit of 76" Decanter
description: A special edition ceramic decanter from Wild Turkey containing their signature 8 year old bourbon at 101 proof. This 1976 bottling features a ceramic Turkey and celebrates the bicentenary of the USA's founding in 1776. Wild Turkey followed the trend set by bigger brands like Jim Beam in the 1970's and began filling unique ceramic decanters with their bourbon to help bolster sales to non whisky but collector focused demographics. The first line of Turkey decanters were released in 1971 and the final editions were filled in 1989.
baxus_class_name: Wild Turkey 8 Year "The Spirit of 76" Decanter

name: Ancient Age One Liter
description: Ancient Age Bourbon is a classic American whiskey crafted at the renowned Buffalo Trace Distillery, one of the oldest continuously operating distilleries in the United States. Known for its smooth and approachable profile, Ancient Age Bourbon offers a balanced blend of sweet and spicy notes. It features a nose of caramel, vanilla, and a hint of oak, followed by a palate with flavors of toffee, honey, and a subtle spice. The finish is smooth and satisfying, making it an ideal choice for both bourbon enthusiasts and newcomers alike. This bourbon is aged for a minimum of three years, allowing it to develop a well-rounded character that embodies the rich tradition and craftsmanship of Buffalo Trace.

name: Hazelburn 2001 18 Year Virtual Open Day 2020
description: The Hazelburn 18 Year Old, bottled for the Virtual Open Day in 2020, is a limited-edition single malt whisky from the Springbank distillery in Campbeltown, Scotland. Distilled in December 2001, it was matured for 18 years in fresh bourbon casks and bottled at a strength of 47.4% ABV. This release was part of Springbank's adaptation to the challenges of 2020, offering a virtual celebration in place of the traditional Campbeltown Malts Festival. Only 792 bottles were produced.

name: McCormick Platte Valley Corn Bottle In Bond
baxus_class_name: McCormick Platte Valley Corn Bottle In Bond

name: Bowmore 1989 30 Year Single Cask #1986 Single Cask Nation
description: A 1989 vintage single cask expression of Bowmore matured for a huge 30 years in a bourbon barrel. Bottled at 44.1% Abv in 2019 this cask was chosen by Single Cask Nation.
baxus_class_name: Bowmore 1989 30 Year Single Cask #1986 Single Cask Nation

name: Wild Turkey Master's Keep Unforgotten
description: A special release from Wild Turkey as part of their Master's Keep series. This blend of Kentucky bourbon and rye whiskies was finished in ex-rye casks and bottled at 52.5% Abv.

name: Prometheus 26 Year Cache 1 The Glasgow Distillery
description: A peated Speyside expression chosen by The Glasgow Distillery Company. This release was matured for 26 years in 1st fill Spanish oak sherry casks. Bottled at 47% Abv as part of their Singular Fine & Rare Whiskies label.
baxus_class_name: Prometheus 26 Year Cache 1 The Glasgow Distillery

name: Remus Repeal Reserve Series 1-4 Set 200ml
description: A 4 bottle set from MGP of their flagship Remus Repeal Reserve series. This set includes 4x200ml bottles featuring the Remus Repeal series from the 1st to the 4th release. Each edition is blended from various vintages and mashbills, with the series 1 bottled at 47% Abv and series 2-4 bottled at 50% Abv.

name: Kilchoman 2010 Single Cask Bottled 2015 For Impex
description: A 2010 vintage single cask expression of Kilchoman finished in a PX sherry cask. It was bottled in 2015 at 58.6% Abv exclusively for Impex and the US market.
baxus_class_name: Kilchoman 2010 Single Cask Bottled 2015 For Impex

name: Grand Marnier Cuvée Speciale 1827-1977 Cent Cinquantenaire 50 year - 1977
description: The 150-year anniversary edition “Cuvée Spéciale Cent Cinquantenaire” is produced with a blend of 50-year-old Cognac, sold in hand-painted bottles, and marketed using the slogan “Hard to find, impossible to pronounce, and prohibitively expensive.” Apparently production of this first batch was limited to just 2000 bottles.
baxus_class_name: Grand Marnier Cuvée Speciale 1827-1977 Cent Cinquantenaire 50 year - 1977

name: Tobermory 25 Year Oloroso Cask Finish
description: A 25 year old expression of Tobermory whisky from Mull finished in Oloroso sherry casks and bottled at 48.1% Abv.

name: Bowmore 1998 17 Year Stillmen's Selection
description: Distilled on 22nd June 1998 and matured in Bordeaux Wine Barriques for 17 years at the legendary No.1 Vaults (one of the world's oldest Scotch Warehouse) of Bowmore, this is a Distillery Exclusive bottling with only 1500 bottles being released.  This has been released under the Craftmen's Collection (and specifically celebrating the Stillmen's role in keeping an expert eye on middle cut or the heart of the distillation). Rich mahogany in color with red stone fruits and baked apple on the nose bursting with tangy stewed fruits on the palate and a lingering sea salt on the finish.

name: Ardbeg Perpetuum Distillery Release
description: A 2015 limited release from Ardbeg crafted from both young and old spirit. This release celebrates the 200th anniversary of the distillery and was crafted from bourbon and sherry matured spirit from before the distillery's 1990s closure and more recent younger whisky. This is the distillery release version of Perpetuum and was made available exclusively to Ardbeg committee members.

name: Glenfarclas 2003 Single Cask #1448 Bottled 2012 For Nickolls And Perks
description: This 2003 Family Casks was bottled to celebrate Nickolls & Perks’ 215th Trading Anniversary. It was distilled in 2003, matured in a single sherry cask #1448, then bottled at 57.5% in August 2012. There were only 333 bottles released.
baxus_class_name: Glenfarclas 2003 Single Cask #1448 Bottled 2012 For Nickolls And Perks

name: Bowmore 1989 25 Year Single Hogshead #10581 Douglas Laing
description: This limited edition 25 year old Islay single malt was distilled at Bowmore in November 1989 and specially bottled in December 2014 for Douglas Laing's Xtra Old Particular range. Drawn from single cask number 10581 at a natural strength 55.1% ABV, this is one of just 576 bottles of its kind.
baxus_class_name: Bowmore 1989 25 Year Single Hogshead #10581 Douglas Laing

name: Glenfarclas Golden 30 year
description: This is a superb single malt from the Glenfarclas distillery, aged for 30 years. Three decades of maturation have resulted in a fantastically full-bodied, satisfyingly Sherried and all-around awesome flavour profile.

name: Four Roses 2016 Small Batch Limited Edition
description: Master Distiller, Brent Elliott, and former Master Distiller Jim Rutledge (retired) collaborated to select the Limited Edition Small Batch blends. The 2016 release is a blend of two 12-year old bourbons and one 16-year old bourbon. The 2016 Release was a finalist in the Ultimate Spirits Challenge with 97 points.
baxus_class_name: Four Roses 2016 Small Batch Limited Edition

name: Four Roses 2014 Small Batch Limited Edition
description: In 2014, Four Roses celebrated 130 years of their iconic brand and as such have released a special commemorative bottling of their Limited Edition Small Batch during Bourbon Heritage Month. A blend of 10 year old OBSV bourbon, 13 year old OBSF bourbon, 14 year old OESV bourbon, and 16 year old OESK bourbon, Master Distiller Brent Elliot described his choice of recipes as follows: “From the beginning of the process, I focused on building around the unique fruit flavors in our F and V yeast strains, and these flavors shine through in the finished product. As a contrast, I also included a spicy, older batch. By mingling these different flavor profiles, I think we achieved a wonderfully balanced, complex and unique Bourbon. I could not be happier with the result and can’t wait for you to taste it.”
baxus_class_name: Four Roses 2014 Small Batch Limited Edition

name: Glen Elgin 18 Year Single Cask Duthies Cadenhead's
description: An 18 year old expression of Glen Elgin bottled by Cadenhead's at 46% Abv as part of their historical Duthies label.
baxus_class_name: Glen Elgin 18 Year Single Cask Duthies Cadenhead's

name: Ardbeg Alligator 700ml
description: Released in June 2011 Ardbeg Alligator takes its name from the aggressive charring of the American casks the whisky was matured in. This charring level is known as the Alligator char because the cracking of the wood under the heat looks similar to the skin of an Alligator. The Ardberg Distillery lies on the most Southernly part of Islay and on the rugged shores of the Atlantic Ocean. Ardberg is revered around the world as the peatiest smokiest most complex whisky of them all. Yet it does not flaunt the peat: rather the peat gives way to the malt the natural sweetness of which subtly intrudes producing perfect balance.
series: Alligator - Exclusive Committee Reserve for Discussion

name: Ardbeg Rollercoaster- Ardbeg Committee 10th Anniversery Edition - 2009
description: A mix of malt cold wood smoke and a hint of new make. Has a very young feel - similar to Talisker 10 in this respect. Balanced striking sweetness. Quite big with a peat tingle though it doesn't quite take off as expected. Instead it rests on its laurels in a sea of spices tangy starburst sweets and oily smoke. Light new make character remains. More coastal at the finish sweetness cool smoke medium to short.
baxus_class_name: Ardbeg Rollercoaster- Ardbeg Committee 10th Anniversery Edition - 2009

name: Blanton's Straight From the Barrel 2016 Bottling
description: Not only one of the world’s best bourbons, Blanton’s Straight from the Barrel is one of the world’s best whiskeys. Created for connoisseurs familiar with cask strength whiskeys, this enormous taste profile reaches depths of flavor found only in the rarest of spirits. On the nose we get notes of dark chocolate, caramel and butter with earthy undertones of walnut and hazelnut.  The palate delivers intrepid notes of warm vanilla, oak, toasted nuts and a rich spiciness with hints of butterscotch or honey.  The high alcohol by volume is intense and powerful yet inviting. The deep and resonate finish on this bourbon is nothing short of legendary. Straight from the barrel is best served neat or with a splash of water. Un-filtered, un-cut, unbelievable.
baxus_class_name: Blanton's Straight From the Barrel 2016 Bottling

name: Blanton's Single Barrel 1999 Bottling
description: Blanton’s Original was the first bourbon to be bottled from a single barrel back in 1984, revolutionising American whiskey and bringing it back to its former glory. Every batch is unique and the bottling strength of 46.5% helps maintain the authentic character of each barrel.

name: Octomore 02.1
description: In 2002, Bruichladdich's master distiller Jim McEwan decided he wanted to create the peatiest whisky in the world, adding Octomore to its range of unpeated (Bruichladdich) and very peated (Port Charlotte) whiskies. In addition to its extraordinary phenol content, Octomore is also characterized by an innovative approach to the blending and aging of these spirits. This is the second release.

name: Loch Dhu 10 year The Black Whisky - 2000
description: This was distilled at Mannochmore from 1996 to '97. This 10 year old is known as "The Black Whisky", so named for its very dark appearance. The producers attribute the colour to the use of double charred casks. Perhaps there's a drop or two of spirit caramel in the equation.
baxus_class_name: Loch Dhu 10 year The Black Whisky - 2000

name: Michter's 10 Year Single Barrel Rye 2018 Bottling
description: A 2018 bottling of 10 year old rye bottled from a single barrel by Michter's. Prior to 2015 Michter's was contract producing its spirits at an undisclosed Brown-Forman distillery, rumoured to be Early Times/Old Forester. In 2015 the company established their full scale distillery in Shively, slowly transitioning to their own spirit. This 2018 bottling will have been crafted from spirit contract distilled by Michter's at the undisclosed Brown-Forman site.
baxus_class_name: Michter's 10 Year Single Barrel Rye 2018 Bottling

name: E.H. Taylor Warehouse C Tornado Surviving
description: On Sunday evening April 2 2006 a severe storm with tornado strength winds tore through Central Kentucky damaging two Buffalo Trace Distillery aging warehouses. One of the damaged warehouses was Warehouse C a treasured warehouse on property built by Colonel Edmund Haynes Taylor Jr. in 1885. It sustained significant damage to its roof and north brick wall exposing a group of aging bourbon barrels to the elements. That summer the exposed barrels waited patiently while the roof and walls were repaired meanwhile being exposed to the Central Kentucky climate. When these barrels were tasted years later it was discovered that the sun wind and elements they had experienced created a bourbon rich in flavors that was unmatched. This was truly a special batch of barrels and though the Distillery does not hope for another tornado it feels lucky to have been able to release this once in a lifetime product.
baxus_class_name: E.H. Taylor Warehouse C Tornado Surviving

name: Glenfiddich 1975 44 Year Single Cask #4706
description: A 1975 vintage single cask expression of Glenfiddich matured for 44 years and bottled at 48% Abv exclusively for the US market.

name: Michter's 10 Year Single Barrel Bourbon 2019 Bottling
description: A 2019 bottling of 10 year old bourbon bottled from a single barrel by Michter's. Prior to 2015 Michter's was contract producing its spirits at an undisclosed Brown-Forman distillery, rumoured to be Early Times/Old Forester. In 2015 the company established their full scale distillery in Shively, slowly transitioning to their own spirit. This 2019 bottling will have been crafted from spirit contract distilled by Michter's at the undisclosed Brown-Forman site.
baxus_class_name: Michter's 10 Year Single Barrel Bourbon 2019 Bottling

name: Michter's 10 Year Single Barrel Rye 2016 Bottling
description: A 2016 bottling of 10 year old rye bottled from a single barrel by Michter's. Prior to 2015 Michter's was contract producing its spirits at an undisclosed Brown-Forman distillery, rumoured to be Early Times/Old Forester. In 2015 the company established their full scale distillery in Shively, slowly transitioning to their own spirit. This 2016 bottling will have been crafted from spirit contract distilled by Michter's at the undisclosed Brown-Forman site.
baxus_class_name: Michter's 10 Year Single Barrel Rye 2016 Bottling

name: Michter's 10 Year Single Barrel Bourbon 2018 Bottling
description: A 2018 bottling of 10 year old bourbon bottled from a single barrel by Michter's. Prior to 2015 Michter's was contract producing its spirits at an undisclosed Brown-Forman distillery, rumoured to be Early Times/Old Forester. In 2015 the company established their full scale distillery in Shively, slowly transitioning to their own spirit. This 2018 bottling will have been crafted from spirit contract distilled by Michter's at the undisclosed Brown-Forman site.
baxus_class_name: Michter's 10 Year Single Barrel Bourbon 2018 Bottling

name: Ardbeg Supernova - 2010
description: One of the most exciting whisky releases from 2010! The 2010 edition of Supernova, stronger, more pungent in flavour, and more earthy than the previous year's release.

name: Ardbeg 1998 Still Young
description: The second release in Ardbeg's journey to the new 10 year old, Still Young was released in 2006.

name: Bowmore 1982 26 Year Single Cask #85162 Duncan Taylor
description: This 26 year old Islay single malt was laid down at the Bowmore distillery in October 1982 and bottled in September 2009 by Duncan Taylor for their Rare Auld series. Drawn from single cask number 85162 at a natural strength 50.5% ABV, this limited release is one of just 203 bottles.
baxus_class_name: Bowmore 1982 26 Year Single Cask #85162 Duncan Taylor

name: Cardhu 1984 27 Year Single Octave #863289 Duncan Taylor
description: This Cardhu was distilled in 1984 and finished in an Octave cask (a small cask) for a few months to add complexity and flavors then bottled by Duncan Taylor in 2012.
baxus_class_name: Cardhu 1984 27 Year Single Octave #863289 Duncan Taylor

name: Bunnahabhain 1991 25 Year Single Cask #3810019 Duncan Taylor
description: Distilled in 1991 this single cask expression of Bunnahabhain was matured for 25 years. It was bottled in 2017 at 48.2% Abv by esteemed independent bottler Duncan Taylor as part of their Dimensions series.
baxus_class_name: Bunnahabhain 1991 25 Year Single Cask #3810019 Duncan Taylor

name: Bowmore The Devil's Casks - Limited Release III - 2015
description: The 3rd release from the Devil's Casks trilogy from Bowmore - matured in first fill sherry casks. Bottled in 2015 at 56.7% ABV. The story goes that the devil was spotted in the church at Bowmore, the civilians chased where, as the legend goes, the devil had escaped in a cask.
series: The Devil's Casks - Limited Release III
baxus_class_name: Bowmore The Devil's Casks - Limited Release III - 2015

name: Glenlivet 25 Year XXV 1st Fill Oloroso Sherry. 2007 Release
description: Finished in Oloroso sherry casks, Glenlivet XXV (25 Year Old) is a delightful dram that has certainly got better with age. A rich nose of sultana and cherry as well as baked apple comes through before a delightful smooth palate of sherried peels, walnuts, toffee and dried fruits. Truly lovely.
baxus_class_name: Glenlivet 25 Year XXV 1st Fill Oloroso Sherry. 2007 Release

name: Fettercairn 22 year
description: A 22-year-old single malt from Fettercairn, matured in ex-bourbon casks, creating aromas of banana bread, oranges, plum, raisins, figs and ginger bread on the nose. The palate offers notes of spiced pears, caramelised orange, coffee, liquorice, cherry and plum that linger in the finish.

name: Three Ships 12 Year Master Distiller's Private Collection
description: A 12 year old expression of single malt South African whisky from Three Ships. This release is the first in the Master Distiller's Private Collection and is matured in American oak casks before being bottled at 46.3% Abv.
baxus_class_name: Three Ships 12 Year Master Distiller's Private Collection

name: Three Ships 11 Year Shiraz Cask Finish
description: An 11 year old expression of South African single malt from Three Ships. This release is finished in South African shiraz wine casks and bottled at 51.4% Abv with 2994 bottles produced.
baxus_class_name: Three Ships 11 Year Shiraz Cask Finish

name: Bain's 18 Year Fino Cask Finish
description: An 18 year old expression of single grain whisky from the James Sedgewick distillery in South Africa released as part of their Bain's label. This release was finished in a fino sherry cask and bottled at 50.5% Abv in a 1 litre format.

name: Hirsch Cask Strength Cognac Finish
description: A cask strength expression from Hirsch crafted from Kentucky bourbon finished in Cognac casks. This release was bottled at 63.5% Abv.

name: Three Ships 12 Year Double Wood Blend
description: A 12 year old expression of South African whisky matured in American oak and Amontillado seasoned sherry casks. This special release from three ships was bottled at 49.6% Abv with 2760 bottles produced.
baxus_class_name: Three Ships 12 Year Double Wood Blend

name: New Riff 4 Year Single Barrel - 2018
description:
New Riff Distilling, founded in 2014 in Newport, Kentucky, is a family-owned whiskey distillery dedicated to producing high-quality spirits that honor traditional bourbon-making techniques while introducing innovative practices. The brand emphasizes a commitment to quality by adhering to the Bottled-in-Bond Act of 1897, ensuring that all its whiskeys are aged for at least four years and bottled at 100 proof without chill filtration.

New Riff's flagship offerings include a Kentucky Straight Bourbon and a Kentucky Straight Rye, both crafted using non-GMO grains and a sour mash process that incorporates spent grains from previous distillations. The bourbon features a mash bill of 65% corn, 30% rye, and 5% malted barley, resulting in a rich flavor profile with notes of cherry wood and vanilla. The rye whiskey, made from 95% rye and 5% malted rye, delivers a vibrant, spicy character with minty and peppery aromas.

The distillery prides itself on its independence, allowing it to innovate without external pressures or shortcuts. New Riff has quickly gained recognition within the whiskey community for its robust flavors and commitment to craftsmanship, making it a notable player in the modern American whiskey landscape.

name: George T. Stagg 2011 Release
description: A bottling of George T. Stagg, a 15 year or older bourbon from Buffalo Trace crafted from their #1 low rye mashbill. This barrel proof bourbon is bottled each year as part of Buffalo Trace's Antique Collection. This 2011 bottling is released at 142.6 proof.

name: Four Roses OESV 18.5 Year Private Selection
description: The Four Roses OESV 18.5 Year Private Selection is a highly esteemed bourbon, known for its exceptional aging and unique flavor profile. This particular selection, often referred to as "Happy Mother's Day," was specially selected by OMWP (One Man Wolf Pack) and aged for 18 years and 5 months. Bottled at a robust 60.5% ABV, it showcases the OESV recipe, which is known for its delicate fruit and caramel notes. The bourbon offers a complex nose with hints of brown sugar and apricot, while the palate delivers a rich, deep caramel sweetness, complemented by flavors of orange chocolate, apple peel, and woody baritone notes. The finish is long and memorable, with a minty freshness and traditional sweet caramels, brown sugar, and dark chocolate, making it a standout choice for bourbon enthusiasts and collectors alike.
baxus_class_name: Four Roses OESV 18.5 Year Private Selection

name: Wild Turkey 101 Proof 8 Year 375ml - 1987
description:
The 1980s Wild Turkey bourbon bottled in a 375ml format represents a unique and collectible expression from a pivotal era in the distillery's history. This smaller bottle size, often referred to as a "half-pint" or "flask" size, offers a compact yet potent representation of Wild Turkey's craftsmanship during this period.

Typically bottled at the iconic 101 proof (50.5% ABV), this 375ml Wild Turkey from the 1980s showcases the rich, robust flavor profile that the brand became renowned for under Master Distiller Jimmy Russell's guidance. The nose likely presents a harmonious blend of classic bourbon notes - vanilla, caramel, and oak - complemented by the signature Wild Turkey spice and hints of leather and tobacco. On the palate, enthusiasts might expect a full-bodied experience with flavors of butterscotch, dark fruits, and a pronounced spiciness characteristic of Wild Turkey's high-rye mashbill. The finish would likely be long and warming, with lingering notes of oak, vanilla, and a touch of medicinal cherry - a hallmark of Wild Turkey from this era. While the 375ml size might be smaller, it doesn't diminish the complexity and depth of the bourbon inside. These bottles are particularly prized by collectors not only for their compact size but also as representations of Wild Turkey's quality during a time when aged stocks were plentiful and the bourbon industry was on the cusp of significant changes.

name: Michter's Barrel Strength Toasted Barrel Rye - 2023
description:
User Review:
Nose: Meaty and nutty notes immediately. Dark, lean, raw red meat. Caramelized molasses. Pepper. Leather. Walnuts. Malty nose; smells like this is going to be heavy and syrupy. Floral notes are heavy too; like pressed flower petals, or some kind of extract. A powdered chocolate weaves into the rye spice. Slight graininess. I want this to be sweeter, but the heavy meatiness is still lingering. Wait... Suddenly things are lighter. Actual cotton now mixing with a sweet cotton candy. What just happened? It's like I'm smelling a completely different whiskey now. I swear it can't be, because I haven't put this glass down yet. Caramel and vanilla are now here to party. A bright, shining singular cherry is being displayed. Better experience than I've previously had with this. Maybe it needed a longer rest time. Slight tannic note like I've experienced out of a madeira finish comes out late. Ok, finally (!) there is a hint of marshmallow I was hoping for on the toasted barrel. It has evolved very well in the glass, with the later scents being more enjoyable than the early ones. A dusty old oak that reminds me of my grandmother's attic I would play in as a kid.


Palate: Instant syrupy plum mouth coating that also thins quickly, leaving caramel and a bright linen / citrus. The spice of cinnamon and allspice are well checked by these lighter flavors. A good chew reveals much more hot cherry and clove. After a few sips it falls a little flat; while the finish is very long & lingering it just feels like a sting with little flavor coming along with it. Very drying, I can feel my tongue start to become abrasive against my gums. With how the initial nosing went, I was expecting a lot of different things that did not transfer to the palate. The citrus has been a constant, but the parts of this pour that I really enjoy are so fleeting. There one moment, gone the next. A rollercoaster pour to say the least. With how hit or miss a glass of this is for me, I am going to air on the side of caution and give this one the lower end of the two ratings it has received from me in several reviews. The nose is really fun but I am always left confused on tastings.
baxus_class_name: Michter's Barrel Strength Toasted Barrel Rye - 2023

name: Very Olde St. Nick Winter Maple Whiskey
description: A blend of Kentucky & Indiana bourbon whiskeys finished in maple syrup barrels with French oak staves. This blend also contains some form of natural flavour additives. Bottled by Preservation distillery out of Bardstown as part of their legendary Olde St. Nick series.
baxus_class_name: Very Olde St. Nick Winter Maple Whiskey

name: Volcan De Mic Tierra X.A Tequila
description: A blend of reposado, anejo and extra anejo tequilas from Volcan in Mexico presented in a stunning bottle design with a volcano in the punt.
baxus_class_name: Volcan De Mic Tierra X.A Tequila

name: Augusta 8 Year Single Barrel #155 For Baxus Old Route 8
description: An 8 year old expression of Kentucky bourbon bottled at 57.75% Abv by Augusta. This single barrel was chosen by the Baxus team and has a mashbill of 78% corn, 13% rye and 9% malted barley.
baxus_class_name: Augusta 8 Year Single Barrel #155 For Baxus Old Route 8

name: Chivas Regal Manchester United 13 year - 2019
description: Produced as a tribute to the 13 English league titles won with Manchester United under the management of Sir Alex Ferguson, this Chivas Regal was finished in selected American Rye casks.

name: Few Spirits Single Barrel
description: A single barrel expression of bourbon from Few Spirits bottled at 101 proof.

name: Joseph Magnus Triple Cask Batch #382
description: A triple cask finished expression of bourbon whiskey from Joseph Magnus. This batch was finished in sherry and cognac casks before being bottled at 100 proof.

name: Ardbeg 25 year - 2022
description: Bottled from incredibly rare casks filled during some of the Distillery’s darkest days, this is Ardbeg at its most intricate, balanced and, beguiling. Majestic aromas of smoked cream and earthy bonfires are masterfully interwoven with layers of pine and fragrant candle wax. Hot pepper rises on the palate twisting around lemon sherbet sweetness while hints of carbolic soap and tar flow into a long aftertaste characterised by delicate aniseed entwined with lingering cream and fudge. Non chill-filtered with a strength of 46%

name: Whistlepig "The Béhôlden" 21 year - 2023
description:
America is no longer béhôlden to dusty decanters & tartan tradition.
Behold a whiskey of singular repute, sired from stills of storied past - absolved of obsolescence and conscripted to the quest for a new era of Single Malt. An advent of age unprecedented, indebted to its provenance, yet beholden only to the farthest bounds of creation.

The Béhôlden is the first-ever super-aged North American Single Malt, matured more than twice as long as any other on the continent. Aged for 21 long years in American Oak to add a rich maple and dried fruit to a bready, nutty base. Finished in WhistlePig Rye barrels bringing savory spice and subtle smoky notes, a game-changer for progressive palates.
